d6668fc7-b972-48d2-b477-22ddf438060d.description:
THIS IS DEMO!

Realistic Animated Water Mod

This mod include 4 animated wave blocks 15x15
One of them have 1x1x1 collision for custom usage.

You will also need to make timer and logic gate set to turn it on/off every 1.2 seconds.

ATTENTION! [ For Advanced users ONLY ]
For this mod to work as in screenshot, you need to edit partmaterials.json
To do that:
1. Go to SM Dir>Data>Objects>Materials open #FFFFFFpartmaterials.json
2. Scroll to bottom and search for "Glass", there will be 3 parts of it, with "defines": [],
3. Replace them with "defines": ["POSE_0_ANIM"], and last one replace with "defines": [ "ENV_MAP",#FFFFFF"POSE_0_ANIM"#FFFFFF],
4. Open mod file on steam workshop local files folder:
Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\1128796196
5. Replace PoseAnimDifAsgNor with Glass

Note: It will disable glass effect in rest of the objects ( beside blocks ), but water will work and look as in these screenshots
d6668fc7-b972-48d2-b477-22ddf438060d.name: Animated Water waves mod [ Realistic Water Mod ]

5ccaedab-25ab-4d36-8d61-94fd1bce8af4.description:
This mod is a work-in-progress (WIP). 

This mod contains twenty six (English Alphabet) letters, and all ten numbers.

NOTES:
[list]
 [*]The part does not currently have a "sticky" tag, but don't exploit this. I will be fixing that soon and you don't want your creation to fall apart.
[/list]

This mod was created because I wanted to have flat panels that had letters on them. Similar to the letter-blocks found in The Modpack, and the surface panels found in one of the The Modpacks.

DISCLAIMER:
[list]
 [*]This is the first time I have attempted to make a mod for Scrap Mechanic. If something doesn't work, for instance the names and descriptions, it is probably an error that I have yet to fix.

67d37449-0f30-470b-b2c4-a97c54c68d39.description:
X's Detail Mod adds around 310 parts to your game! These parts are especially useful to detail your creations or build things at micro-scale.
(No, you are not the first one to notice that some parts in this mod look very much like parts in the Modpack Polygons. I've talked with Durf about this. No worries.)

If you feel like you miss a type of part, suggest it in the comments and maybe it will be in the next update! (I cannot guarantee this, though)
All parts can be rotated and placed on every side. Extra detailing abilities!

[h1]Features[/h1]
[b]Slopes (wedges)[/b]
The vanilla game only has one slope piece, the wedge, but this mod adds many more!
The sizes range from 1x1 to 1x10. There is also a 2x3 slope.

All slopes are named like this: "S1x4" (for a 1x4 slope).
Some slope parts have an additional number after them ("S1x8:6" for example). That means that it's the 6th block of the part. You can use this for extra detailing or to paint the slope part in multiple colors. An example of this is visible in an image above, where different parts of the slope are painted in dark and light green.

[b]Plates[/b]
There are many mods that add plates or panels, but none is as extensive as X's Detail Mod. It offers plates in 4 thicknesses (1/2, 1/3, 1/4 and 1/8 block).
Plates are in many different shapes.

The naming of these parts may be a bit confusing, but there's some logic to it if you look closely.
All panels are named like this "P2:fb"
The number is the thickness of the panel. P2 means panels that are half a block thick, P8 means 1/8 of a block. You get it.
Then, the letter "f" is the shape of the block. There are many different shapes. In the image above, all of the available shapes are shown.
Last, "b" means bottom. 'Plates' in the normal understanding of the word all have b. There is also "m", which means middle. You could see this as a wing block.
Then you have "r", which stands for 'raise' and can be used as a transition between bottom plates and middle plates. Last, there is 's', for slope, which can be used to
67d37449-0f30-470b-b2c4-a97c54c68d39.name: X's Detail Mod

545670e3-8acf-4b1e-b021-520326a32aef.description:
Thanks to Nightmare Fuel for the new textures!

[b]W, S, A and D converter[/b]
Make a WASD-converter, using only 4 blocks. Just hook up the driver seat to the WASD converter blocks, and then take the output from those blocks and connect them to whatever you want, such as a thruster.

Thanks to TechnologicNick for finding out how to make the A and D converters!

[b]Remote Connection Sender[/b]
This block remotely sends a logic signal to any Remote Connection Receiver block with the same color.

[b]Remote Connection Receiver[/b]
This block listens to the signals of Remote Connection Sender blocks with the same color.

[b]Memory Bit[/b]
The memory bit is a block that can be turned on or off from a logic gate or button input.
Memory blocks lose their state when they are put on the lift. However, they now do save their state when you close the world!

[b]Steam Train Chimney[/b]
This block emits dark smoke particles when moving (the faster the train moves, the faster the chimney puffs out smoke), and also emits white smoke when being triggered by logic. Does not work perfectly.

[b]Power combiner[/b]
Combines power inputs (drivers seats, switches, logic gates, power reversers).

[b]Power distributor[/b]
Evenly distributes a power input over all the connected outputs.

[b]Power combiner distributor[/b]
Works as a power combiner and distributor in one block.

[b]Power direction reverser[/b]
Reverses the direction of power. Connecting a switch into this block and then this block into an engine makes the engine run in reverse. Combining this block with a power combiner and using some logic gate magic, you can make the direction an engine runs in changable with a switch.

[b]Location Finder[/b]
Prints exact location of the block to /console when you press E on it.

[b]Particle Machine[/b]
Use particles in your creations again! Open /console and paint it one of the following special colors and press E to configure it. Set interval to 0 to use logic triggering.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/AH6joW4.png[/img]

d0af4b10-fd48-40d1-b153-4f836631c4d8.description:
This mod adds advanced scripted sensor blocks.

Position Pulse Sensor
- gives out a 1-tick pulse every time it moves by the specified amount of blocks in one axis
- using logic gates colored with the colors of the second row of the paint tool you can set the amount
- by default, this amount is set to 4 blocks
- connect a red, green or blue logic gate to specify the axis (X, Y or Z)
- by default, the X axis is measured

Directional #FFFFFFPosition Pulse Sensor
- gives out a 1-tick pulse every time it moves by the specified amount of blocks in one axis [b]in the positive or negative direction[/b]
- using logic gates colored with the colors of the second row of the paint tool you can set the amount
- by default, this amount is set to 4 blocks
- connect a red, green, blue, dark #FFFFFFred, dark green or dark blue#FFFFFF logic gate to specify the axis (X, Y, Z, -X, -Y, -Z)
- by default, the X axis is measured#FFFFFF

Be sure to comment and rate!

This mod was created with the new Lua scripting in versions 0.3.0 and up. Currently it only works with the test build as of 19.05.2018.
This mod and all of its contents may not be copied or used without permission.

I intend to update this mod with many useful sensor in the next few days:
- velocity PWM with local velocity version
- acceleration PWM with local acceleration version
- other types, but i have to do some research into the brand new lua api to see if they will work

check out shinevision's mod which helped bring this mod to live: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1388857911

search tags:
speed sensor, sensor, lua, script, position, location, pulse
d0af4b10-fd48-40d1-b153-4f836631c4d8.name: Advanced Sensors by DasEtwas

da1c8e0d-5b68-41df-ac1b-503544f5c54c.description:
[h1][b]In this mod there will be tons of Analog items![/b][/h1]

[h1][b]Analog sensors:[/b][/h1]
Accelerometer, --Measures the velocity and puts out a analog value based on that.
Potentiometer, -- A block where you can specify its analog output using a file in `Scrap Mechanic/Release/Potentiometer_Value.json`.

[h1][b]Analog Logic like:[/b][/h1]
OpAmps/comparators,
Digital To Analog Converter,
Analog To Digital Converter.

[h1][b]//Comming Soon//[/b][/h1]
Gyroscope --To measure angles (XYZ).

[h1][b]///WARNING///[/b][/h1]
Connecting Analog stuff to engines will make them go SUPER FAST, even at low speeds, you have been warned ;)
i guess that could also be a good thing/handy?

[h1][b]How to use them:[/b][/h1]

#FFFFFF[b]Digital To Analog Converter (DAC)[/b]#FFFFFF
This block takes the amount of inputs and divides that over 1024 (This mods "Voltage" resolution) For example, if you connect 4 switches, and you turn on 2, the "Voltage" is 512 (1024 / 4 * 2 = 512) 4 = amount of switches/logic connected, 2 = the amount that is on.
#FFFFFF
#FFFFFF[b]Comparator[/b]
This block has 2 Analog INPUTS, if the SECOND input "Voltage" is higher then the first input "Voltage" then it turns ON. (if you have a DAC that outputs 512 as first input, then as second input a DAC with the output of 1024 it will turn on because the second inputs value is greater then the first input).#FFFFFF

[b]Potentiometer[/b]
To set the value go to: [i]Scrap Mechanic/Release[/i] And open the file called [i]Potentiometer_Value.json[/i] Open it and edit the value to whatever you want!

#FFFFFF[b]Accelerometer[/b]
(Velocity To Analog) This block, converts velocity, to a analog 1024 range, the number after the name means the sensitivity, so for slow moving objects use the 50, for things that go super fast, use the 100.
(There are 2 #FFFFFFAccelerometer block. 50 and 100#FFFFFF)

#FFFFFF[b]Always ON/OFF Bit (FOR DAC)[/b]
This block is always on, and is useful to set DACS to their correct value without being reset by a lift.
#FFFFFF
#FFFFFF[b]Analog To Digital Converter[/b]
da1c8e0d-5b68-41df-ac1b-503544f5c54c.name: Analog Electronics Mod By Shinevision

57449221-a932-4e5d-8cd1-0ae05fe0b228.description:
[h1][b]This mod adds an electromagnet.[/b][/h1]
When powered, it attracts other powered electromagnets. It's strength increases exponentially when the distance to the other electromagnet decreases.

If you have problems with magnets shooting in all directions, try to add more weight to them!

[b]NOTE: This only works in the test branch! (0.3.0)[/b]

[b]UPDATE 1:[/b]
[list]
[*] The strength of an electromagnet can now be changed by powering it using an engine.
  This makes it easier to attract objects with a lower mass.

[*] Added a polarity.
  The magnets now has 3 modes, which you can cycle through by pressing [E].
    - The mode with the magnet symbol attracts all other electromagnets.
    - The north mode with the 'N' symbol attracts all other electromagnets with a 'S' symbol, and repels all other electromagnets with a 'N' symbol.
    - The south mode with the 'S' symbol attracts all other electromagnets with a 'N' symbol, and repels all other electromagnets with a 'S' symbol.

[*] Updated the icon to match the part.
[/list]

[b]UPDATE 2:[/b]
[list]
[*] The visuals should now work for multiplayer. (Although I haven't tested this)
[/list]

[b]UPDATE 3:[/b]

[*] Changed the physicsMaterial to reduce particles. (Thanks to kAN Gaming for showing me this)
[*] When a magnet is connected to a Driver's Seat, it is powered when you enter the seat.
[*] Updated the script to now work with Build 374. (7th July, 2018)
[/list]

[b]UPDATE 4:[/b]
[list]

[*] Did some optimisations.
[/list]

348bc729-1ee8-434a-94a0-992090380ed1.description:
(Previously Vehicle Indicators)
Adds various blocks that allow making vehicles with precise weight distributions or allow to "change the physics" of drag.

[b]Creation Center of Mass Finder[/b]
- creates particles to display the local axis of the indicator around the CoM of the entire creation
- shows the center of mass with a particle

[b]Body Center of Mass Finder[/b]
- creates particles to display the local axis of the indicator around the CoM of the body the indicator is on
- shows the center of mass with a particle

[b]Center of Thrust Finder[/b]
- shows the thrust vector of all vanilla thrusters on the creation at the center of thrust

[b]Modes[/b]
The indicators can be switched through modes using the [Use] button. There are 4 Modes, which change the size of the displayed axis.

[b]Drag Reducer[/b]
- lowers the inherent drag of the game from 2.5% speed per frame to 0.5%
- makes gliding planes and driving cars fast easier
- may be unbalanced, because creations now don't magically come to a stop as fast
- [b]may only be placed once on an entire creations[/b] (place it once more if you want fun and glitches)

[b]Scale[/b]
- logs the mass and weight of the whole creation in the console when used
- rounded to 3 decimal places

[b]Thrust Scale[/b]
- logs the length of the vector sum of all thrusts of all thrusters on a creation when turned on in newtons when used
- rounded to 3 decimal places

[b]Note[/b]
On very large creations (5k+ blocks, intricate shapes) following blocks may cause a drop in framerate:
CoM finder, BCoM finder, Drag Reducer
348bc729-1ee8-434a-94a0-992090380ed1.name: Engineer's Toolbox

a5ca9037-cc1a-4491-957a-1d49d7058613.description:
This mod introduces buoyancy to Scrap Mechanic!
This includes working water (floatation physics), Working helium (lighter than air buoyancy), and an activator for each to lessen lag! 

Just place an activator of your choosing on your creation and it will do as stated in their descriptions! If your creation is bobbing up and down in the water add an Drag Block. Drag blocks make a drag at the position where they are placed, so if you want a stable creation that does not bob, then place multiple evenly from the center of mass. This will make an extremely stable craft.

For those of you who cannot find your water block, please hold the wire tool; a white dot will appear where it is located.

I would like to thank a large portion of the people who helped me with the lua for this, namely: Mr Batch, Golen, TechnologicNick, shinevision, and MJM Builds.

I would especially like to thank DasEtwas for helping me fix various portions of this mod with the use of his code.

Most recent update changes- 

Fixed activator blocks affecting each other's buoyant force. 

Added Ballast block

Plans for next update-
Working rudder and propellor.

This is a creation made as an example for those who do not know how to make a boat using the mod:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1411211202

This is a creation made as an example for those who do not know how to make an airship using the mod:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1415060038

This mod is for the Spudgun update only and will not work on other versions.

09d32a5a-bfeb-4e4d-a58b-7e117de2cced.description:
[b]This is a beta version of the mod, the full version will be released soon![/b]
Made with help of the Scrap Mechanic Mods community: https://discord.gg/qxFUd3j

[h1]Please make regular backups of your worlds as this mod may in some cases crash the game and make the file unloadable.[/h1]

[h1]Update 7[/h1]
#FFFFFF - Fixed some bugs.#FFFFFF

This mod makes it possible to send data between contraptions in limited radius. This is especially useful if you want to send data locally for example on an automatic intersection or garage door.

[h1]How to use[/h1]To use just place the send & receive block, paint them the same color and BOOM you have a working short-range communication. To check if the receive block is connected to the send block just connect the receive block to any logic block (light, logic gate etc.).
To send data you will also need the input & output blocks. Connect the input block to the send block and paint it to set a channel. Then connect the output block to the receive block and paint it the same color as the input.
To change the range of the receive block (16 blocks by default) click [b][E][/b] on it. To see the value open /console.

[h1]Update 1[/h1]
 - Custom range - press [b][E][/b] to change. Open [b]/console[/b] to see selected value.
 - The default range has been changed from 12 to 16 blocks, old creations will automaticly be set to 16 blocks, but you can change that manually.

[h1]Update 2[/h1]
 - Max range increased to 32 as requested by players.

[h1]Update 3[/h1]
 - Updated range system - Dynamic step size, and bigger max range - 128 [ for those who need more ;) ]
 - Minor tweaks and bug fixes.

[h1]Update 4[/h1]
[b] - FIXED IT![/b]

[h1]Update 5[/h1]
 - Send blocks can now be turned off by connecting a logic input to it. Only if the logic input emits a signal, the Send block will be active.

0557555d-5856-45b0-9883-f219756760af.description:
The Intelligentia Mod add artificial intelligence to Scrap Mechanic. Most AI’s are designed to work for turrets, but can be used in other situations as well.

Items in this mod:
-	Multiple AI types
-	Various proximity sensors
-	AI output
-	Player imitator

Any parts in this mod are subject to revision, if you have any suggestions leave them in the comments. Suggestions could contain new blocks, new features and/or bugs.

Turret AI:
Turret AI’s come in multiple variations. Some of these variations are good at close range, others at long. Some adjust their shooting height to accommodate potato drop, others give lead to target. The mod contains loads of different variations that can be used for more than 1 purpose. They can be programmed to ignore you or player imitators by connecting the AI to the player imitator or by interacting with the block.

Proximity sensors:
Proximity sensors are a neat thing to have when your setting up a defence system, because this will make sure the turrets don’t target players that are across the map. Of course there are more uses for this block. This block can also be programmed to ignore players and player imitators.

AI output:
This block is used to get a response from any AI in this mod. They have to be coloured in the right colour to get a wasd-output. Colours can be found in the video thumbnails.

Player imitator:
Not much to say about this block, the name explains all. This block will imitate a player making the AI and proximity sensors think it is a player making them target/sense it.

Magnet block:
Feels very atracted to players and anything that acts like them. This block will brake your creation and accelerate towards players.

Modular AI parts:
*Full guide comming soon*

For further information look at the video or the example turret:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1416329627

I’ve spend a lot of time on this mod, so I hope you enjoy it.

UPDATES:
1.2
- Added Modular AI parts
- Improved Magnet block

1.1
- Added Magnet block
0557555d-5856-45b0-9883-f219756760af.name: Intelligentia Mod

4fcfdb20-5c8d-4ed5-9c07-2341914b0698.description:
This mod adds a Gyro Sensor that compares the direction of the Gyro Sensor to the direction of the camera of the player.

Connect it to electric engines to create a turret that you can control using your camera. You can also connect it to a logic gate to do some other stuff.

OUTPUTS:

* Yaw (Positive) = Player is looking to the left
* Yaw (Negative) = Player is looking to the right
* Pitch (Positive) = Player is looking down
* Pitch (Negative) = Player is looking up
* Roll (Positive) = The Gyro's side to the right of 'TOP' is higher than the side to the left of 'TOP'
* Roll (Negative) = The Gyro's side to the right of 'TOP' is lower than the side to the left of 'TOP'

HOW TO CONNECT:
Driver's Seat -> Gyro Sensor -> Gyro Outputs -> Electric Engines -> Bearings

HOW TO MAKE A TURRET:
It works the best if you apply the Yaw first, then the Pitch and finally the Roll.
Example: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1428584382
4fcfdb20-5c8d-4ed5-9c07-2341914b0698.name: Camera Controls

2a8ddb37-50f3-4ac3-b8b6-e8ae1cd0f053.description:
Works in 0.3.0 the test version only!

Scripted custom parts including:
- Tilt Sensor: Sends a signal if the axis of rotation is not in default state.
- Gyro Sensor: Sends a signal when the object is rotating over the axis.
- Speedometer: Sends a signal when the object is moving in the axis direction.

The colored part is the positive value of the signal, negative values can be read by engines.

aaaaaaaa-aaaa-affa-aaaa-aaaaaaaaaaaa.description:
Heavy WIP

Place the AERO block on a creation and it will make it behave like every block has drag on its 6 sides.
You may use multiple AERO blocks if you want your bombs or similar to be able to decouple and still have the physics.
This block calculates a rough estimate of forces (air drag) on the 6 sides of each cube of the creation. Not to be confused with an actual computational fluid simulation. It is not compatible with Wings mod blocks, as their effect will overlap.

Use with caution and always save your creation!!

To be updated in the future.
aaaaaaaa-aaaa-affa-aaaa-aaaaaaaaaaaa.name: Aerodynamics

a3c41fda-ebfe-42f5-9271-3d93b205fc70.description:
35+ Detailed jet engine parts for making cool looking creations.

This mod includes:

-Smooth Parts

-Jet Thrusters

-Rocket Engines, including the SpaceX Merlin Rocket Engine.

-Rocket Boosters

-Inlets

-Miscellaneous Components

The thrusters in this mod are pretty powerful and are great for creation building and detailed creations. The main point of them are that they are pretty and fit great with spacecraft, jets and similar vehicles that require high detail jet models with a barebones or sleek look. Have fun!

If you like this mod, please give it a thumbs up rating, favourite it and give me a comment with suggestions or other feedback. Thanks!

Updates:

-Added big & small rectangular inlet parts and thrusters
-Added the SpaceX Merlin Rocket Engine, suggested by Elon Dude 73 (Thanks!)
-Major overhaul of almost all textures, removing the boring solid colors of laziness, and giving the parts a nice chrome theme! My personal favourite color combo is the maroon red ;)
-Added several new parts, 3 new thrusters, 1 new inlet, 2 parts made for more smoothly transitioning between ducts and blocks, 1 part intended to join 2 rectangular ducts to 1 circular duct, and last but not least, a diagonal rectangular duct part.
a3c41fda-ebfe-42f5-9271-3d93b205fc70.name: Thrust Mod

72ce997a-afd2-4a7c-8adb-c6faa5f7e673.description:
[h1]Read the instructions carefully before commenting[/h1]

[h1]What this mod is NOT[/h1]
A general purpose tool to add any feature to the game, as in editing game code or injecting proprietary [b]code[/b].

[h1]What this mod is[/h1]
Injector parts allow receiving input from the Injector Application by direct memory editing.
The Injector Application is only the middle man between the output signal of the Scrap Mechanic Injector mod parts and the software that sends instructions to the Injector Application on which output values to set for all Injector parts on a specific channel.
Injection in this case means editing the games memory. It does not mean adding new code which executes in the memory of the game. Concretely only 8 bytes of memory per part (one double float) is written every update.

[h1]How it's done[/h1]
When started, the Injector application searches for injector parts. An injector part contains a unique key with seemingly random values, which consists of 2048 numbers. If the application finds this unique key in the game's memory, it remembers it as a part of an injector part's script and will update the input and output values 40 times a second. Every time before updating (reading and writing output/input values), the entire key is checked to be correct. This is done to ensure that the part's script was not deleted (because the part was removed) to prevent writing into memory at places it shouldn't write into at.

[h1]How to use it[/h1]
1. Subscribe
2. Open the explorer and navigate to the path
  "<your steam folder>\SteamApps\workshop\content\387990\1612610240"
  Your steam folder is probably in "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam". This is the mod's folder. It contains the Injector application.
3. Move the application whereever you want, just to be easier to find. It can also stay where it is. I suggest creating a shortcut to this folder, because updates of the mod will add the new version of the application in there again.
4. Read the readme.txt included with the mod. It is also inside the application
72ce997a-afd2-4a7c-8adb-c6faa5f7e673.name: Injection

9fff7997-6e5f-441d-a5f9-b700984f2d42.description:
This mod adds a small explosive tank spawner. It works just as the Explosive Spawner from Challenge Parts Mod, but obviously spawns the smaller tank and also:
- the part is black by default
- only one tank can be spawned at a time to prevent a new tank spawning on the previous one and blowing your contraption up
- the tank is spawned a bit above the spawner surface, so the spawner can be hidden under one row of blocks, and the explosive will spawn above them
- the spawned tank can be lifted and deleted
9fff7997-6e5f-441d-a5f9-b700984f2d42.name: Small explosive spawner

2b2465c4-940d-4b20-b4c6-da864fceb488.description:
This mod adds a Creation Destructor Block, that erases any body it is placed onto (all connected blocks). It can be useful not only to save a few clicks by not using the Lift to erase creations, but it makes cleaning the world after cannon fights much easier. Also, Crations built on the ground can be lifted to be erased. This block easily cleans the ground of any leftovers.

UPDATE: The mod now contains two more destructor blocks!
The YELLOW one destroys any block it touches that is not a part of the creation it is connected to, and the RED one destroys any creation it touches that is not the creation it is placed on! Use it for jousting, automatic cleaners, derby cars and much more ;)
Also, now the hitbox for the Destructor Block is tiny, so you can erase laying small pipes etc.
2b2465c4-940d-4b20-b4c6-da864fceb488.name: Destructionization Block

cb218a31-a0ae-4146-a092-5b8680ec6cd9.description:
Die PietSmiet Parts Mod erweitert Scrap Mechanic um 6 Dinge. 2 neue Blöcke, 2 Radkappen und 2 Schilder. 

Der eine Block ist zerstörbar, verhält sich also wie Pappe im Spiel (im Screenshot links).
Der andere Block ist nicht zerstörbar durch die Kartoffelkanone oder Explosionen (im Screenshot rechts).
Beide Blöcke sind leicht.

Die Radkappen sind auch beide leicht und sind unterschiedlich groß um an bei Radgößen zu passen.

Die Schilder sind leicht und gleich groß mit unterschiedlichen Motiven

Blöcke, Radkappen und Schilder können gefärbt werden. Das PietSmiet Logo bleibt dabei immer weiß bzw grün an den Radkappen.

Viel Spaß damit!
cb218a31-a0ae-4146-a092-5b8680ec6cd9.name: PietSmiet Parts

9afb01ea-5cd9-4513-9839-35f0bdd6387b.description:
Test release featuring new blocks. May conflict with my other releases.
Stuff you should know before using:
1.'input types' are columns in the paint tool, to get a different input paint the block,
2.Everything works with 0 delay unless you add it through the delay block,
3.Loops are only possible if you use delay inside of them.
4.All the block specific information can be found in their description either in the inventory or their GUI,
5.Preview image only features few parts and modes, since it wouldn't fit them all.
Have fun testing!

If need some help or just want to, you can join my Discord server:
https://discord.gg/wJJuRWW

Update notes:
-Added WSAD converter
-Added Angular and Linear PID Controllers

1f9903ff-a384-4cae-9365-7a28d9262303.description:
Automaticly mirrors parts placed on the creation!


1. place down mirror mod part on the creation/lift
2. place a part on a side to find out which way it mirrors
3. have fun

features:
- can mirror blocks & parts
- parts can be recolored and the mirrored part will also recolor
- blocks or parts can be removed and the mirrored blocks and parts will also remove
- can be placed on an existing creation, it will look for mirrored stuff and when modifying stuff it'll be able to modify the mirrored stuff
- stuff can be welded to it and it'll PERFECTLY mirror it! (no flaws!)

SUPPORTED MODS:
- vanilla parts.  Configured by: Brent Batch   Time wasted: 2 hours
- Modpack Polygons!  Configured by: Brent Batch  Time wasted: 5 hours
- The Wings Mod! Configured by: DasEtWas   Time wasted: 4 hours
#FFFFFF
Guide to support more mods: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5VuLQEuy1BI (around 8:00) YOU can also help to support more mods! :o#FFFFFF
> configuration now asks for confirmation when you're about to overwrite an existing configuration mirror rotation!


flaw:
- DO NOT USE MULTIPLE MIRRORS ON ONE CREATION!
- coloring resizeable blocks on a creation with the mirror block still attached works but can cause sudden glitches due to a 'feature' in scrap mechanic. the best way to avoid this is to not recolor surfaces which contain multiple colors. when it does happen it is best to remove the mirror block and manually fix it or stop coloring and do something else. (at all cost: do not start adding blocks to fix it while the mirror block is still attached, you can make it worse this way)

todo:
- add bearing/piston/spring support
1f9903ff-a384-4cae-9365-7a28d9262303.name: The Mirror Mod

e7c350ee-40f4-4375-aa03-0e15ccfd5434.description:
[h1]Safety and liability[/h1]
This mod provides an executable for writing to parts of memory dedicated by the "Peer" part. The mod's folder contains detailed networking information in the readme.txt.

This software is provided without warranty of any kind.
For further information, visit the mod's folder and review NOTICE.txt and readme.txt.
The contents of these files may change at any time and as a user you need to make sure to keep yourself updated on this information in case of an update.

[h1]Usage as a mortal being[/h1]
[b]This mod is only a kind of "entry point" for other mods in form of other programs, which can just use this mod's files to manipulate the output/get the input of the "Peer" block.[/b] To actually control something with a Peer block, you need some program to run the mod's executable files and send it commands. How the program can do this is documented in readme.txt.

Place the Peer ingame, [b]connect it to a seat[/b] and connect it to your desired thing to receive the Peer's output, [b]get in the seat[/b] and let some application do the rest for you.

[h1]Usage by other applications[/h1]
The executable may be used as a slave process to read/write peer data.
The API is subject to change.

See your local mod's folder for more information (readme.txt):
/SteamApps/workshop/content/387990/1771470800

[b]Create issues or pull requests if you want to help contributing updates. Refer to the [url=https://github.com/DasEtwas/scrap-mechanic-mods]GitHub repository[/url] at for licensing and contributing.[/b]
e7c350ee-40f4-4375-aa03-0e15ccfd5434.name: Syringe - Foreign Application I/O Bridge

86232f23-f2dc-4cc0-b50d-bf2e7e83819c.description:
This block is desinged to be for example a controller for a thruster in a lift. You can supply it with a value to reach and it will try to reach it, but of course you will also need to supply it with the value it is currently at. It will output a number and with it you can turn for example a number of thrusters on.

As an extra you can give it the average of all current values and it will try to balance it all.

This blocks is a very special one, it uses the CoreInputBlocks mod to get values it needs. The "1" InputBlock is the value it will try to reach. The "2" InputBlock is the value it is currently at, and the "3" InputBlock is the average of all current values.
86232f23-f2dc-4cc0-b50d-bf2e7e83819c.name: Helicarrier Main Controller

The Mechanics Extended Interactables Mod (or MEI for short), is my personal modpack in which I will put any parts I make from now on. This mod features a lot of functional parts and has minimal aesthetic parts. From advanced targeting algorithms to simple life-enhancing parts, this mod will have it all!

Testing phase:
Please note that this mod isn't even close to being done. If any errors do occure, please give me a brief description the issue (title). An indepth description of what happend (distance to a shape, settings of the shape and anything you think is required). Lastly, check the console using /console in the chat, if there are any errors this will speed up the bugfixing massively.

Documentation and Guides:
There are no guides available right now.
1d996192-3ded-419e-808e-9d9feffea9ee.name: Mechanics Extended Interactables Mod

21354860-56ca-4726-ace7-306d0ec04259.description:
If you didn't already know, this game is stupidly broken and the devs broke lights and are too "busy" to fix them. Lights reset to their default settings every time the world is reloaded, so, I made 39 versions of the vanilla lights each with a different color as its default so you can make builds with lights that aren't always orange. I am not doing any modded lights unless they are recommended to me and I get permission from the mod maker(s).

Please let me know about any problems you run into and ask any questions you have. If you want a quicker response, DM me on Discord at ShrooToo####1548.

Tell me if you have any recommendations for modded lights to add to this mod.


How to read the color names (ie: Red:2):
-The color represents the column and the number represents the row.
-The columns go in this order in the paint tool:
Grey, Yellow, Lime, Green, Cyan, Blue, Violet, Magenta, Red, Brown
-There is not Brown:2 in this mod because it would be the same as the vanilla lights.
21354860-56ca-4726-ace7-306d0ec04259.name: Pre-Colored Lights

7bbf508f-70de-4cd2-ac84-3a94e2d3a8c7.description:
[h1][b]Custom HANDHELD tools[/b][/h1]
This mod provides a part that allows you to load CUSTOM [b]HANDHELD[/b] TOOLS!

Custom tools currently included in this version:
* ExplosionGun (also allows for rocketjumping ;)
* Flamethrower (fire not compatible with modpack weapons or modpack beta)
* more planned after the surival update (or when you guys ask for it and show some love) such as: handheld watergun, handheld napalm launcher, jetpack and more.

Instructions:
* load your world with this mod
* place down the Weapon Crate
* place down your lift
* press 'R' to load up the handheld tool selector
* choose the 'custom tools tab' and select your tool of choice.

Warning: this mod is very experimental and might crash. if you want to give feedback, please provide the following: how did it happen/what did you do to make it happen? what happened? a screenshot of the error.

NOTE: once a custom tool is selected you cannot use the lift, use the 'r' menu to go back to the lift.(have the lift selected when pressing 'r'!!!)

Current Flaws:
* sometimes you cannot select a different hotbar item when having a custom tool selected, swap back to lift to fix.
* the gui might crash and show buttons without a background, reloading the game is the only fix(alt+f4)
* an error about the spudgun might be spammed in chat upon equipping the explosiongun, you can ignore this. it's possible to fix this by equipping the flamethrower and then the explosiongun again.

Like the mod?
[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]
Don't forget to leave a thumbs up!
7bbf508f-70de-4cd2-ac84-3a94e2d3a8c7.name: custom handheld tools modpack

c0344d93-7492-46c8-88be-a61699e57041.description:
This mods contains 21 awesome cannons with shooting animations and custom projectiles.

[code][h1][b]This mod contains:[/b][/h1]
- Tank cannon
- Flak cannon
- Naval cannon
- 2nd tank cannon
- M1 Abrams cannon
- Schwerer Gustav cannon (mortar)
- Aircraft cannon
- 2nd naval cannon
- 3rd tank cannon
- Railgun
- 2nd railgun (has better effects and it's more powerful)
- M109 cannon (howitzer)
- Rocket launcher
- Smart cannon (works with the number logic from 'The Modpack')
- Small smart cannon
- Orbital cannon
- Smart rocket launcher (you can use The Modpack to input some stuff)
- Flare (heat decoy) launcher
- EMP Cannon (disconnects logic)
- Smart Rocket Detector
- Shell Ejector
- Laser Cannon
- Small Rocket Pod
- Large Rocket Pod[/code]

[code][h1][b]Language support:[/b][/h1]
- English: by default
- Russian: by default
- German: by default
- Polish: Thanks to Driver for the translation![/code]

[code][h1][b]Contributors:[/b][/h1]
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198361178618]Questionable Mark[/url][/b] - creator of all the textures, UV maps for models, scripts and a behaviour of the projectiles
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198134257237]Gratiskatze[/url][/b] - creator of the most cannons, creator of the logo, beta-tester and German language translator.
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198296305997]Brent Batch[/url][/b] - creator of the most scripts and creator of the Global Script.

[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198280635682]Driver[/url][/b] - creator of an EMP Cannon model and Polish language translator.
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198196145217]Seemomster[/url][/b] - creator of the 2nd Tank Cannon.[/code]

If you want to support us and you like this mod you can leave your thumbs up on this mod and add it to your favorites.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1951321613
or try the Fast Transporter:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1949302359
and build your own track or download the Testtrack:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1951662619

I have created three discussions. One where you can share your vehicles. Anotherone where you can leave feedback or suggestions and the last to ask questions.

fd7032f0-f1f5-495c-8998-04437c7fc7be.description:
This is a reupload of the Ropes Mod that got deleted

The Ropes description is in German too!

Works with Modpack [Beta]

!!!WIP!!! 
This mod is in an early stage of development! Some things may and some things will change!

How to use:
Place the block on any surface. Aim it at a creation (the ray is perpendicular to the surface you placed the block on) and activate it with a signal from a WHITE element.

Colors of inputs and what they do:
White - seek for a target
Light gray - break the rope
Light yellow - reel the rope in
Yellow - reel the rope out
Any other color - analog input. You can connect a seat, but i recommend to use any mod with analog stuff. "X's scripted objects" for example.
The block outputs a signal when the rope is attached.
fd7032f0-f1f5-495c-8998-04437c7fc7be.name: Ropes [BETA]

05cd2f06-55d5-4db7-acd7-2f7a43f91605.description:
Don't be turned away by the lack of an image, I just kinda suck at making images/thumbnails so I decided not to try (for now).

This mod adds powerless suspension from 1-8 in length and also one with a length of 16.

Why might you need powerless suspension? Well, unlike powerless pistons which have a length of 1 on the lift, powerless suspension is at its full length on the lift. It also has no collisions.

If you want to allow something to move like it's on a linear rail, the range of powerless suspension options may be of use to you. I only did the ones from 1 to 8 in length because it's a colossal pain to model this in a program (Blender) where the box select doesn't work correctly.

The models are from Lord Pain's Interactive Parts Mod:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=877698157
and are used with permission.
05cd2f06-55d5-4db7-acd7-2f7a43f91605.name: LD's Powerless Suspension

9ae1aea8-9ead-420c-9e7c-c54522e98904.description:
Includes:
- Unsigned counter block. Doesn't go below 0.
- Min One counter block. Doesn't go below 1.
- Clamp One logic block. Takes one input, will only output between 0 and 1 (inclusive).
- Echo block. Outputs whatever you input into it. Good for, dunno, order of operations stuff with math blocks when you need to paint things, but might want to use a particular value more than once. Stylish, unlike using a number block. :3

More to come!

Requires The Modpack for the counter blocks. Be careful about using this without it, as the error messages can be spammed.
9ae1aea8-9ead-420c-9e7c-c54522e98904.name: LD's Logical Doodads

2e2ca66f-cc15-46d8-ac3e-ee524490e9b5.description:
Here's the official MQE mod.

Version: 1.5.0a

Currently adds:

Paper - Highly paintable, yet light material. Lighter than wood or cardboard, yet destructible. It's actually so light it glitches the weight indicator.

Steel - Highly paintable. Like paper, but it has diamond studs on it and is so heavy it glitches the indicator.

Fabric - Decoration material with the same weight as wood

Ceramic - Like a smoother, heavier version of Concrete.

Tiles - Ceramic tiles in a checkers pattern

Artificial Wood - Plastic version of wood which is lighter and better to paint yet less

Gravel - Paintable, pebble-based plastic version of Concrete.

Plastic - Light version of Concrete, and terribly smooth. However, it doesn't paint as well as other blocks.

Plastic Bricks - Like the Artificial Wood, but bricks.

Adds blocks for numbers 0-9 and they are as light as paper.

Circuit Blocks - PCB-looking blocks which are good for wallpapers in Hi-Tech homes.

Blueprint - Destructible block which is nearly weightless. Good for decoupling systems or other scenerios where blocks need deleted.

Square Mesh - Like a heavier, stronger version of Blueprint.

Diamond#FFFFFF Mesh - Like a heavier, stronger version of Blueprint with the mesh tilted 45 degrees.

Dirt - Opaque, destructible medium weight block.

Sand - Destructible heavy block.#FFFFFF

Updates are becoming more frequent due to demand.

If you use this in your creation, I would appreciate it if you let them know so they don't get greeted with a nasty "MODS MISSING" sign when they download it.



Goodbye!
2e2ca66f-cc15-46d8-ac3e-ee524490e9b5.name: MQE Mod

6dac784c-57cc-461e-ac63-d5d0a389738e.description:
The Glitch Welder part from my SciFi mod. For those who just want to use this part.

-Place the glitch welder on a creation.
-Paint parts light-cyan blue then 'Press [E] to use' to cut/paste.
-Paint parts light green to paste as static in the world.
-Paint the glitch welder itself the color you want to spawn the parts. (Unpainted welder spawns unpainted parts).
-Attach a button to re-paste the last items copied over and over. (You may need to delete the welder to clear this function's memory if it is spawning more things than you want).
6dac784c-57cc-461e-ac63-d5d0a389738e.name: Glitch Welder

#FFFFFFHello, this is my new mod with over 1000 parts, it replaced my old mod (MOTHERUSSIA), but don 't worry all the buildings should work the same way.

7033efb6-2b3b-4ec7-b6f4-c6f403f74489.description:
This mod allows you to get the survival day and night cycle in creative.
How to use the mod:
1) place the block on the ground
2) connect a number input

Input Values:
The value can be any number. Only the fractional part will have an effect (mod).
e.g. 0.5 => 0.5 | 1.5 => 0.5 (noon)
In case of negative values the fractional part will be taken aswell but added to 1.
e.g. -0.1 => 1 + (-0.1) => 0.9 (evening / night)

Reference Values:
0.0 = night
0.25 = morning
0.5 = noon
0.75 = evening

Have fun with this mod!
7033efb6-2b3b-4ec7-b6f4-c6f403f74489.name: Day Night Cycle

8fd50aec-3776-4d18-8d03-803db9474205.description:
This mod is the first version that allows you to create portals (the visuals are not nice but it works xD)
NOTE: Due to the broken mod tool i cant create icons. The parts have just empty bockes as icons in the inventory!
Currently there are 4 types of portals:
- One Way Portal
- Addressable Portal
- Walkable Portal
- Warp Drive

I had to remove the first version of the portals mod because i wasnt able to update it... uuids stayed the same so everything you have build unitl now should still work!

How to use the One-Way-Portal?
- place 2 portals
- connect the first to the secound
- press 'e' on the first portal

here you can find an example: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2093969853

How to use the Addressable Portal?
- place an addressable portal
- place a switch (color: white)
- connect the switch to the portal
- activate the switch (powers the portal and allows you to port from and to the portal)
- place 2 value counter blocks (color: darkgray | color: black)
- connect the blocks to the portal
- configure the id and destination how every you like :)
- press 'e' on the block and you will be teleported to the destination you set


How to use the Walkable Portal?
- just like the Addressable Portal but instead of interacting with the block you walk through the smoke to be teleported (addressing works the same)

How to use the Warp Drive?
- connect the different inputs (coordinate and warp signal)
- set the coordinates
- activate the warp signal (one tick is enough)

Have fun with this mod :D ill add atleast one more portal type and i try to work on the visuals as soon as i have time for that. I will also make a guide when i have a little bit of time for that ^^
8fd50aec-3776-4d18-8d03-803db9474205.name: Portals

02b41d35-17ff-4b97-9103-957e092193b1.description:
Adds "creative mode" to survival for those wanting to play the new mode but not grind as much to build creations.

*NOTE: Mod support is not currently active for Survival Mode.  Manual install of this mod is required.  Code has been checked and everything functions properly, but make a backup of save as well as "craftbot.json" before swapping with modded file.

Manual install is required.
- Navigate to: Program Files->Steam->steamapps->common->Scrap Mechanic->Survival->CraftingRecipes
- Make copy of "craftbot.json" and save it somewhere safe (make a new folder called "backup" and store it in the same directory and put it in there)
- In another window Navigate to: #FFFFFFProgram Files->Steam->steamapps->workshop->content->xxxxxxxx
- Copy "craftbot.json" from this folder to the CraftingRecipes folder

Mod Contents
- Adds current in game assets to the Craft Bot
- All recipes have no cost
- Recipes take 3 seconds to complete
- Includes spud weaponry, seeds, and food
02b41d35-17ff-4b97-9103-957e092193b1.name: Survival Creative Mode

1da788ae-f08e-4e74-831e-3a16b952ca64.description:
-- Scrap Mechanic Survival MOD --
These are Secret Containers found in the code of Scrap Mechanic Survival.  All of the Containers work with the vacuum pump.  
The Chemical container can be put in the chemical lake with a vacuum pump to receive chemicals.
The Fertilizer Container holds fertilizer so you can use a vacuum pump to auto fertilize your plants.
The Seed Container holds seeds so you can replant using Vacuum pumps and not have to make large chests.


-- How to install? --
1.Locate Scrap Mechanic Folder:
	a)Open Steam
	b)Go to Scrap Mechanic in your Library
	c)Click Gear on the right
	d)Click Properties
	e)Click Local Files
	d)Click Browse Local Files
2.Copy Survival And Data folder to Scrap Mechanic Folder
3.If Windows/Mac/Linux wants you to confirm if you want to replace files, confirm it (if it does not, you propably messed something up :( )
4.Open Scrap Mechanic and Enjoy!

-- NOTES --
The Fertilizer Container is labeled Consumable Container is the game and there is nothing I can do without changing a few more game files.
1da788ae-f08e-4e74-831e-3a16b952ca64.name: Secret Containers Mod

5f6eac08-fecc-469b-8a3e-75bc05d1e6cb.description: replace the craftbot.JSON in Desktop\steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Survival\CraftingRecipes with the one in this mod folder. BACK UP YOUR GAME.

535cc389-bd59-4ce0-8b11-4042412c6337.description:
[h1][b]PLEASE READ THE FULL DESCRIPTION[/b][/h1]
This mod adds the survival bots to creative :)

[h1][b]Important for anyone who downloaded the mod already![/b][/h1]
This mod got a major update! It changed from a normal mod to a gamefile mod (to fix all bots and allow custom ones).
Before using the new mod you need to install the mod! For that i have created a simple installation guide that you just need to follow along (if anything is unclear or doesnt work for any reasons on you system you can let me know).

[h1]How to install the mod?[/h1]
1) go here: 
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2102860762\BotsModFiles
2) copy the folder (the MyBotsMod folder)
3) paste the folder in: 
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Survival
4) execute the installer file in the folder you just pasted

If you need help you can check out this video: https://youtu.be/mcizLTuP1Zk


[h1]How to use the mod?[/h1]
this is a simple setup with instructions:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2103973862

or

simple instructions by patitocafe:
- connect a button to the spawner
- paint the spawner (in the desired color)
- shoot the button with a spud gun to spawn 1 unit

[h1]Colors[/h1]
The color code referes to the markings (last picutre above) first x than y.
1 | 1 - blue tapebot
1 | 2 - blue tapebot (with tape variation)
1 | 3 - blue tapebot (with tape variation)
1 | 4 - blue tapebot (with tape variation)
2 | 2 - worm
3 | 2 - boss bot

93aa452a-a385-4425-b3b4-60c2b5d95e42.description:
This mod only contains instructions to add a craftable Component Kit to your CraftBot. It doesn't do anything per se because modding Survival isn't supported yet.

[h1]Recipe[/h1] 

Component Kit [x1] = Circuit board [x10] (Time: 30s)

[h1]Instructions[/h1]

1. Go to the folder your game is installed:

[code]
<STEAMDIR>\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Survival\CraftingRecipes
[/code]

2. Copy the file craftbot.json to another directory to make a backup, if things go wrong.

3. Edit file craftbot.json with a text editor (i.e. notepad)

4. After the last item block, add a comma and another item. Example:

[code]
        },
	{
		"itemId": "5530e6a0-4748-4926-b134-50ca9ecb9dcf",
		"quantity": 1,
		"craftTime": 27,
		"ingredientList": [
			{
				"quantity": 10,
				"itemId": "f152e4df-bc40-44fb-8d20-3b3ff70cdfe3"
			}
		]
	}
]
[/code]

Please notice that the first and the last lines in the example already exist. You'll just need to add a comma, add the code enclosed with {} and preserve the "]" final line. If you want to know more about the file format, look up for "JSON format" in a web search.

5. Save and launch the game. Your Craftbot should have the new recipe after the last item as this mod's screenshot shows.

#FFFFFF[h1]FAQ[/h1]

[b]Does this mod work with Multiplayer?[/b]

As long as every player in the server has the file modified, it should work without any problems.

[b]The item disappears after a game update or file integrity check[/b]

Since the craftbot.json is automatically generated by the game on updates and checks, you may need to add the code again if the craft disappears from the Craftbot.

Hopefully this will change when the game supports modding Survival mode.
93aa452a-a385-4425-b3b4-60c2b5d95e42.name: Craftable Component Kit (Survival)

f4221f2c-a8bc-4dc7-ab1b-2e9443c95fce.description:
The Survival Player Forestry and Farming Mod brings new plantable crops, plantable trees to the mechanic's arsenal. This mod also introduces regrowable trees, treatable by fertilizer.

Features:

-All trees with a stump left standing will regrow after a period of in-game time.
-All trees are now plantable in soil, with tree seeds being an uncommon drop from chopping down an existing tree or breaking a tree log
-Corn is now plantable, and seeds can be obtained from breaking existing corn, or harvesting planted corn
-Corn is now plantable, and seeds can be obtained from breaking existing cotton, or harvesting planted cotton
-Beehives can now be cultivated, and queen bees which can be used to start your new hives can be obtained from breaking existing beehives, or harvesting player cultivated hives.
-All plants will provide a raid penalty comparable to existing plants
-The MAXIMUM raid level will increase from level 10 to level 15 to accommodate the increase farmables
-Trees can be fertilized to reduce their grow-time in game

This Survival mod must be installed manually.
this mod can be found in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2123450361\

Within the install folder is a video showing the installation steps.

This mod is compatable with 10K's 'Survival Recipe with Balance'.
This mod is not completely compatable with 10K's 'Survival Harvesting Boost'

Indiviual Mods should be evaluated to determine conflictions. Always remember to make a backup!

Stock files have been included with this pack in the 'stock' folder, which can be pasted over the 'Survival' Folder to reverse any changes back to SM defaults, this will not revert them to a pre-existing change by another mod.

Many mods contain changes to the 'vacuum.lua' file, such as oil pump mods. within the mod folder is a 'vacuum fix' folder, pasting the survival folder inside it in the same was as the main mod will allow the new seeds to be planted by vacuum. This will conflict with mods that alter the vaccum pump.
f4221f2c-a8bc-4dc7-ab1b-2e9443c95fce.name: Survival Player Forestry and Farming Mod

a0d72e0c-8cb2-483b-a4b4-ebeef99ee6ef.description:
Ever just wanted to be big and red? Ever just wanted to be made of metal like the others? Ever just wanted to have the ability to shoot a nasty chemical? Well if you have all of the above, this mod is (probably) for you!

You get the premise, "Be a Farmbot" turns you into a Farmbot, more specifically the red one. (but green)

Current version this works in is 5.1, right now it doesn't work for creative i don't think.

[h1]Latest Updates[/h1]
[list]
[*] Changed Skin color to red
[*] Changed Thirdperson camera position
[/list]

[h1]Instructions:[/h1]
[list]
[*] Step 1, Go to your steamapps\workshop\content\387990\ and search (ctrl + f) Farmbot Playermodel (or look for the folder named 2125986549)
[*] Step 2, Copy the folder named "Farmbot Simulator" and paste it in your Scrap mechanic folder (Not the data or survival folder).
[*] Step 3, Run the batch file named "Installer".
[/list]

If you wanna uninstall it, just simply run the Installer's opposite cousin. (the Uninstaller)

[h1]What this mod does[/h1]
[list]
[*] 1, You're red instead of skin colored!
[*] 2, You can now die in style!
[*] 3, The ability to crush robot skulls with your feet! (and also cut them in half)
[*] 4, Kill other Farmbots!
[*] 5, Die instantly when you run out of water!
[*] 6, Shoot a corrosive chemical instead of pesticide and watch the robots melt in it, (and also shoot water) while not having to worry as much about its ballistic trajectory! (though it has limited range now)
[*] 7, Sink down to the bottom of the ocean like the titanic!
[*] 8, Spawn in a random location every time you die like a real Farmbot! (this does not affect bed spawns)
[*] 9, Shoot explosives out of your pesticide launcher when you have a small explosive in your inventory!
[/list]

Theres more but i'm not gonna bother listing them. It ain't much, but I think its pretty decent. Enjoy it while you still can.
a0d72e0c-8cb2-483b-a4b4-ebeef99ee6ef.name: Be The Farmbot

This mod will make everything in the Craftbot, Dressbot, Cookbot, Mechanic Workshop and the little Craftbot in the space ship free to craft. Even those bots will be free to craft!. I will try to keep this mod updated if new recipes come into the game. I will not be updating it for test branches though because they might change.

To Install:

1. Subscribe to the mod. This will download all the files you need. (Apart from Scrap Mechanic XD)

2. Go into your Steam Library and right-click on Scrap Mechanic, Manage -> Browse Local Files...

3. Open another file explorer window and go to you're steam directory, mine is E:\Steam. Go into
\steamapps\workshop\content\387990*

4. In the 387990 folder click "Data Modified" to sort by most recent. Open the 2128084157 folder, it may be different for
you.

5. In that 2128084157 there should be these items: Cache [Folder], CraftingRecipes [Folder], description.json [File],
HarvestCore.lua [file] and preview.jpg [File].

6. Back onto the other file explorer window that has Scrap Mechanic's directory open, go Survival -> CraftingRecipes
and copy all those files in there to a safe directory, somewhere in you're documents maybe.*

7. Onto the 2128084157 file explorer window, open CraftingRecipes and copy all those files into the Survival ->
CraftingRecipes window. Click replace if you're prompted.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---- The mod is now installed, the steps below are extra features that are not required ----
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This makes harvesting haybot spines quicker:
---------------------

1. On the 2128084157 folder, copy HarvestCore.lua.

2. On the Scrap Mechanic file explore window, go to Survival -> Scripts -> game -> harvestable. Move the
HarvestCore.lua file in there to a safe directory like step 6 above.*

3. Drag HarvestCore.lua from the 2128084157 folder into the Survival -> Scripts -> game -> harvestable folder, click
rep

c1fac845-4824-487f-9a56-9267a8b9de61.description:
[h1]Scrap Mechanic Simple Radar for Survival[/h1]
[b]Since the devs haven't added this feature yet, i made my own...[/b]

[h2]Chat commands:[/h2]
[table]
[tr][th]Command[/th][th]Description[/th][/tr]
[tr][td]/map zero[/td][td]Will home the radar to where you are standing[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]/map compass[/td][td]Toggles the compass[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]/map angle[/td][td]Toggles the angle to home[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]/map distance[/td][td]Toggles the distance to home[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]/map position[/td][td]Toggles the position of the character[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]/map cell[/td][td]Toggles the current cell the player is at[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]/map all[/td][td]Turns on the whole info display[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]/map none[/td][td]Turns off the whole info display[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]/map crash[/td][td]Homes the crash site[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]/map master zero[/td][td]Will home all players to current position[/td][/tr]
[/table]

I am planing on making a better interface with graphical elements, but i'm having a bit of trouble with it, since i'm confident in python but the game comes in lua, if you want to help me with that send me a msg.

If you have questions DM on Discord at [b][u]NightmaresInd##0828[/u][/b] or send me a msg on steam [b][u]FC:53124465[/u][/b]

[h2]Road map for this tool[/h2] (if the devs or someone else don't make their own before):
[list]
[*]Make an interface
[*]Add multiplayer support
[*]Save positions and remember them for each save
[*]Add beacons to mark stuff
[*]Make a hotkey instead of chat commands
[*]Add enemy detection
[/list]

[h2]Changelog:[/h2]
[list]
[*][b]v1.1.1:(Stable Release)[/b]
[*][u]No longer needing to go to github to download[/u]

[*][b]v1.1.0: (Beta/Test version)[/b]

[*]Maybe works with multiplayer? don't have anyone to test it with

[*][b]v1.0.3:[/b]
[*]New games now don't start as devs

[*][b]v1.0.2:[/b]
[*]Position now stays fixed to map coordinates

[*][b]v1.0.1:[/b]
[*]Initial Release
[*]Angle to Home
[*]Distance to Home

[*][b]v0.0.2:[/b]
[*]Home zeroing

[*][b]v0.0.1:[/b]
[*]Compass
[*]Position
[*]Cell
[/list]

a5162e4d-ea33-468f-96b5-4e6ed2d40394.description:
Slightly more advanced flight dynamics for wings.

[b]Disable the original Wings mod before enabling this one.[/b] This is an alternative option, not an add-on, and will not work if both mods are enabled.

Planes you built with DasEtwas's wings mod can still be loaded in using this mod and vice versa, but the behavior of wings is different, so there's no guarantee the planes will work as well in either mod.

If you want to know exactly what I've changed, I've bumped up the air density, but the wings now stall out if the angle of attack is too high. When stalled, wings produce less lift and more drag. There's a small transition window between unstalled and completely stalled.

Thanks to DasEtwas for letting me use and modify his code, and for making [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1390938191]the original wings mod.[/url]
a5162e4d-ea33-468f-96b5-4e6ed2d40394.name: Advanced Wing Dynamics

9995a827-a7b7-43dc-8876-235cc9c080d6.description:
This mod adds basic economy functionality to your world. Place the Economy Installer part in the world to load the commands.

#FFFFFFRecommended: Use the Player IDs Command mod to get player IDs.#FFFFFF

[b]Commands[/b]
Get your current balance: 
/balance

Transfer money to another player:
/transfer <playerId> <amount>

[b]Admin commands[/b]
The following commands can only be run by the host, or players with the permission xesau/economy-mod:admin

Set the balance of a player:
/set-balance <playerId> <amount>

Get a player's balance:
/balance <playerId>

Set the currency symbol to something different:
#FFFFFF/economy-config currencysymbol <symbol>

Set the default amount of money players start out with:
#FFFFFF/economy-config defaultbalance <amount>

Enable or disable whether negative balance is allowed
#FFFFFF/economy-config allownegativebalance <true/false>

[b]API[/b]
This mod also has an API. You can access the EconomyManager service using
local economyManager = sm.interop.services.get('xesau/economy-mod:EconomyManager')
Functions:
- #FFFFFFeconomyManager:getBalance(player)#FFFFFF
- #FFFFFFeconomyManager:setBalance(player, amount)#FFFFFF
- #FFFFFFeconomyManager:canWithdraw(player, amount)#FFFFFF
- economyManager:withdraw(player, amount)
- #FFFFFFeconomyManager:deposit(player, amount)#FFFFFF
(Player parameter can be a Player userdata or a player's ID number)
9995a827-a7b7-43dc-8876-235cc9c080d6.name: Economy Mod

5523dd59-a7cb-4d25-80cb-db99e3259c45.description:

d2e718e3-ca15-442a-8461-5efefbf5691e.description:
Wie installiert man
Aus der Steam-Bibliothek: Klicken Sie mit der rechten Maustaste auf Scrap Mechanic und wählen Sie "Eigenschaften". Navigieren Sie zur Registerkarte "Lokale Dateien" und klicken Sie auf "Lokale Dateien durchsuchen". Gehen Sie zwei Ordner zurück zu "Steamapps" und dann zu "Workshop" und öffnen Sie schließlich den Ordner "387990". Sortieren Sie nach dem neuesten und gehen Sie in den neuesten Ordner (vorausgesetzt, Sie haben gerade den Mod abonniert). Der Rest der Anweisungen befindet sich in "README.txt".

Klebenotizzettel
v1. Funktioniert mit 0.4.6_test
---------
How to install
From Steam library: Right click Scrap Mechanic and select "Properties." Navigate to the "Local Files" tab and click "Browse Local Files." Go back two folders to "steamapps," and then go to "workshop," and finally open the folder named "387990." Sort by newest and go into the most recent folder (assuming you just subscribed to the mod). The rest of the instructions are in "README.txt."

Patch Notes
v1. Works with 0.4.6_test

7711859a-c842-4c82-811e-15654c435525.description:
Creative Commands adds a number of commands to creative mod that enhance your gameplay.
To register the commands, place the Creative Commands Installer part in your world once.

/tp <player> and /tp <x> <y> <z> - Teleport to players or coordinates 
/fly - Enable or disable flying mode
/speed <speed> - Change your walking or flying speed (0 to 10)
/warp <warp> - Teleport to a warp
/set-warp <warp> - Creates a warp at your position
/remove-warp <warp> - Removes the specified warp
/set-time <day|night|time> - Change the time of your world to any, like 4:20
/gravity <gravity> - Change the gravity in your world (1 is default)
/debug-info - Display position, rotation and more

This mod depends on sm.interop, which has to be installed manually.

[b]Permissions[/b]
If you use a permission manager mod, you can allow/deny the following permissions. By default all permissions are allowed for all players in creative mode.
- xesau/creative-commands:fly
- xesau/creative-commands:speed
- xesau/creative-commands:gravity
- xesau/creative-commands:debug-info
- xesau/creative-commands:set-time
- xesau/creative-commands:warp
- xesau/creative-commands:manage-warps
7711859a-c842-4c82-811e-15654c435525.name: Creative Commands

f5ea8495-80cd-4d03-9d42-8d1bd16140bf.description:
hm yes, haybot simulator

nother manual install mod. can't have a haybot playermodel when you can't even edit the character in a normal mod.

[h1]Updates[/h1]
After a very short amount of time, this mod's been updated to 4.8! Not much has changed, though.

[h1]Instructions:[/h1]
Step 1, Go to workshop\content\387990\ as usual and search (ctrl + f) "Haybot PM Location"
Step 2, Copy the Folder named "Haybot Simulator" Inside that folder and paste it in the Scrap mechanic folder (the one that doesn't say data)
Step 3, Run the installer (the one that says changer)
Step 4, Go inside the Manual folder
Step 5, Copy the Char_Male folder, rename Char_Male to Char_Male1 in the Survival characters and paste the folder in the Survival characters folder.

Boom done. [h1]For what it changes:[/h1]
1, Craftable Sledgehammer (you start with the default haybot attack which makes it harder to break down trees manually)
2, Haybot PM Change (obviously)
3, 100 to 50 health (meaning tapebots instakill you)
4, 20+ Damage (on the haybot attack atleast, meaning you 2 shot other haybots and 1 shot totebots)
4.5, Still cant kill farmbots
5, Death Effect (except you still tumble and your ragdoll doesn't go bye bye)
6, You drop the same loot a haybot does when you die (that includes the loot chance)
7, Your death spawns gibs and a Scrap Metal harvest
and thats basically it.
f5ea8495-80cd-4d03-9d42-8d1bd16140bf.name: Haybot Playermodel

3be7a303-2935-4d72-9fe7-dd57490b6f0b.description:
Replaces the Sledgehammer model with a Haybot's pitchfork.

Installation: Go to the mod folder which is at: SteamLibrary\steamapps\workshop\content\387990 
and find the folder containing this mod.

Then follow the following steps that are also written in a readme file:

1) Navigate to SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Data\Character\Char_Tools\Char_sledgehammer

(You can get to the Scrap Mechanic folder quickly by right clicking the game in steam
and going to Manage -> Browse local files

2) If you want to backup the old Sledgehammer model, then select the two files in the folder you just navigated to that are called "char_sledgehammer" and place them in
a new folder called "backup" or something.

3) Take the two files called "char_sledgehammer" from the mod folder that you just installed and place them in the game folder we just navigated to in step 1.

4) Done.
3be7a303-2935-4d72-9fe7-dd57490b6f0b.name: Haybot Fork

e332b242-082a-4911-94db-64684c8e7195.description:
PS: Download Modscrap modpack to get this item in survival game.

LOGIC TRANSMISSOR / RECEIVER

Using transmissor you can send your logic signal to receiver of same color.


LOGIC DECODER

With Logic Decoder you can decode signals received sent by buttons, levers and interactives itens connected in transsissor.

TIPS:

- More height, more range. To the transmissor and receiver.
- Paint of same color to connect transsmisor and receiver.
- You can use how many transmissors and receivers as you need.
- You can use with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2155819061]Remote Control[/url] to increase signal.

-  Connect in transmissor buttons, levers or others interactables.
-  Connect in receiver logic decoder.
-  Connect in logic decoder what you want control from transmissor.
-  Paint button in transsmissor and decoder in receiver with same color.


Found a bug? Let me know.
e332b242-082a-4911-94db-64684c8e7195.name: Logic Transmissor

e4dbeadf-56e9-4ce5-b05e-e3073737abb0.description:
PS: Download Modscrap modpack to get this item in survival game.

REMOTE CONTROL

With remote control you can control your car or whatever you want wihout get out.

1. Connect Remote Control to the seat.
2. Connect FPV Camera to engine and bearings.
3. Paint Camera and Remote Control with same color.

TIPS: 

-  Paint it black to control of the seat view, others colors will use Camera FPV.
-  More height more range for the Remote Control and Camera FPV.

-  Connect [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2155818606]Logic Receiver[/url] to the Camera FPV to increase range.
-  When using a [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2155818606]Logic Receiver[/url] the range varies according to the height of the receiver.

- Connect [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2155818606]Logic Transmissor[/url] to the Remote Control to increase range.
-  When using a [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2155818606]Logic Transmissor[/url] the range varies according to the height of the transmitter.


Found a bug? Please let me know.
e4dbeadf-56e9-4ce5-b05e-e3073737abb0.name: Remote Control

a8af11ae-2e3c-49da-8701-06e4cdc4a8c4.description:
[b] Modification générale du jeu pour une expérience orientée construction. Moins de grind, plus de ressources. Ce mod a été créé pour la communauté du Youtubeur Gaming Skill, tout à été fait en fonction de ses préférences, cette fois-ci je n'est pas repris de fichiers de mod d'autres créateurs hormis ceux du mod [url= https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2104296443. ][u]Farmable Resources[/u][/url] Merci au créateur de ce mod, si vous voulez le soutenir n'hésitez pas à aller sur la page de son mod. [/b]

[b] IMPORTANT :
Avant toute chose, pour éviter des problèmes causés par d'anciens mods que vous auriez installé, il est fortement conseillé de vérifier l'intégrité des fichiers en cliquant avec le bouton droit sur votre jeu dans la bibliothèque steam, en cliquant ensuite sur "Propriétés" > "Fichiers locaux" > "Vérifier l'intégrité des fichiers" [/b]

[h1] Pour installer : [/h1]
- Allez dans "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990" il est généralement présent sur le disque OS (C:), si il n'y est pas, c'est que vous
l'avez sûrement installer dans un autre disque de stockage, pour plus de facilité faites clic-droit sur votre jeu dans votre bibliothèque steam et aller dans Propriétés...
Allez dans l'onglet Fichiers locaux puis dans Parcourir les fichiers locaux... 
Remontez de deux pages en arrière dans le dossier et allez dans workshop\content\387990.
- Faites clic-droit dans un endroit vide du dossier et cliquez sur "Trier par > Modifié le" refaites de même et cliquez sur "Trier par > Ordre décroissant" il devrait y avoir un dossier appelé "2300610993" en premier, allez dedans et ouvrez l'image "preview" si c'est la miniature du mod c'est que vous êtes au bon endroit.
- Allez dans le dossier "Scrap Mechanic" et copiez le dossier "Data" et "Survival" puis collez-les dans le dossier "Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic" (remmontez de 5 pages en arrière dans le dossier et vous verrez le dossier "common") et cliquez sur remplacer. Vous avez fini l'installation !

[b][u]/!\[/u][/b] Pour désinstaller, il vous suffit d'aller dans les propriétés de votre jeu, dans fichiers locaux et de cliquez sur vérifier l'intégrité des fichiers locaux.
Aussi, il faudra réinstaller le mod à chaques mises à jour du jeu... [b][u]/!\[/u][/b]

[u] Liste des changements : [/u]
-Temps de craft réduits
-Augmentation du nombre de blocs obtenus dans le craftbot
-Nombre de blocs obtenus lors du raffinage augmenté
-Ajout du craft du kit de composant et du circuit imprimé
-Le raffinage manuel est deux fois plus rapide
-Augmentation de la valeur des stacks de blocs et autres composants
-Diminution du nombre de coups pour casser les arbres brûlés
-Augmentation de la nourriture/eau récupérer en consommant des aliments
-Diminution de la perte d'eau et de nourriture au fil du temps
-Vous pouvez garder votre souffle plus longtemps sous l'eau
-Les ressources (pétrole, palourdes, fleurs pigmentées, coton, maïs, ruches, bois brûlé) donnent plus
-Butin des robots augmentés
-Possibilité de détruire l'encrypteur bleu (celui qui empêche de casser et poser des blocs dans les entrepôts) grâce à un explosif. Vous pourrez ensuite récupérer l'intégralité des blocs de l'entrepôt.

[b] Chaine Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/c/GamingSkill [/b]

[b] Twitch : https://www.twitch.tv/juangskill [/b]
a8af11ae-2e3c-49da-8701-06e4cdc4a8c4.name: SMOOTH SURVIVAL EXPERIENCE (MODPACK) Update for 0.4.8

d1580abd-70f3-4556-ae54-0189da6e1938.description:
[h1]Description[/h1]
Here Is Scrap Experimental! Straight out of the lab.
It adds a bunch of more, "interesting" parts.
Ranging from thrusters that work on potato's,
To chests that have more storage than you can ever dream of

UPDATED WITH 0.4.7

[h1]NOTE[/h1]
This mod is a survival gamefile mod! its not intended for use in creative worlds

The beacon is known to be broken.


[h1]How to install the mod[/h1]
since theres no Official mod support
we have to use file modding.
[olist]
  [*]open the file browser and go to Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990
  [*]search for a file with the number [h1]2159284408[/h1]
  [*]open the scrap experimental folder and copy the survival and data folders to Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap_Mechanic
  [*]start scrap mechanic and enjoy the modpack
[/olist]

[h1]Update 1.4[/h1]
Take your creations to the skies with the Propellor part! 
use it with an engine to send your creations flying!
with the addition of the propellor i hope to make flying creations a bit more of core gameplay
(please note that the propellor part is pretty simplified, and will most definately go under heavy balancing changes further on!)

[h1]Part List![/h1]
[list]
  [*]the 2 generators (scrap and normal) to generate batteries
  [*]the biofuel station which makes potatos/kern into fuel
  [*]the drillblade (a multi function rock/tree harvesting blade)
  [*]the megastorage chest (a chest with 120 item slots)
  [*]the spud thruster (uses potatos for powerfull boosts)
  [*]the beacon block (broken as of now)
  [*]different modded spudlingguns
  [*]2 modded enemies
  [*]and last the propellor (a simple but usefull way of propulsion)
[/list]

If you encounter any bugs with the scrap exp. 0.4.7 port, do let me know
d1580abd-70f3-4556-ae54-0189da6e1938.name: Scrap Experimental

8fbd83a0-583b-4b5a-860b-ccff5cfc19d3.description:
[h1] Adds a host of new garments that are unlocked from garment boxes which drop from Haybots and Totebots! [/h1]
 
Big big thanks to [b] TechnologicNick [/b] for helping me with validating custom garments!

[img] https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif [/img]


[h1] Installation: [/h1]

[OLD] Tutorial: www.youtube.com/watch?v=Re_VJh3yGxc
(New tutorial video coming soon)
[Baby Woc Only] Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3EyRwNCzW5E

1) Go to the mod folder at: SteamLibrary\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2160088623 (a quick way to get here is by right clicking the game in steam and going 'Manage -> Browse Local Files' and then navigating two folders up to steamapps).

2) Select both the Survival and the Data folders and copy them.

3) Open the Scrap Mechanic folder which is located at SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic (can also be reached by right clicking the game in steam and going 'Manage -> Browse Local Files'.

4) Paste the two folders here. When prompted, seleect "replace existing files".

[h1] Disclaimers: [/h1]

- Other mods than alter textures or files that are also used by this mod may caused some custom garments to not work.

- Due to modding limitations, the custom garment boxes currently are a "Rare" garment box. All of the vanilla Rare garments will now be unlocked from "Epic" garment boxes. To balance this, Epic garment boxes will now drop more commonly from golden loot chests.##FFFFFF

[h1] Frequently Asked Questions: [/h1]

[b] 1) Can I play in multiplayer with people who did not install this mod? [/b]

No. Like most mods, your friends will need to have matching mods in order to play together. 
But have no fear! If you uninstall this mod and then re-install it again in the future, all of the garments you unlocked previously will remain unlocked for you.

[b] 2) How do I uninstall this mod? Or any mod? [/b]

The cleanest way to uninstall ALL your mods is to use the "verify integrity" feature in steam, found in the Scrap Mechanic properties in your Steam Library.
8fbd83a0-583b-4b5a-860b-ccff5cfc19d3.name: Fawx's Garments 4.8

/!\ Manual installation /!\

1. Go to Scrap Mechanic folder [Steam-->steamapps-->common-->ScrapMechanic     or just click browse local files on steam]

ede53d4b-4d73-4aab-bef9-d2a66562ec47.description:
These MODDED potato guns are all Over Powered. It helps keep your character alive.

All files need to be copied to:  
SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/Scrap Mechanic/Survival/Scripts/game/tools
These MODDED potato guns can be considered Over Powered. It helps keep your character alive.

This mod must be installed manually!

This mod can be found in:
Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2174556293

copy/replace to:
SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/Scrap Mechanic/Survival/Scripts/game/tools

Files are: Original LUA MODDED replacement file and a MOD file for the curious to edit/view. It is safe to edit/view the "FilenameMOD.lua" them without changing the MOD file by accident. The comments in the lua file are easily understood. Creation dates of both files are the same. So it will be easy to find any problems after an update.

What the mod does for the following potato guns.
Zoom function will ONLY work while aiming in First Person...

Accurized Potato Rifle:
Scope zoom increased, Faster Projectile, Longer Range, Harder Hitting, less repeat fire spread, a real Tack Driver.

Accurized Potato Gatling:
Scope zoom increased, Faster Projectile, Longer Range, Harder hitting, less repeat fire spread, very accurate.

Accurized Potato Shotgun:
Uses ONE potato per shot, Very small zoom increase, Faster moving 'fries,' Harder hitting, smaller repeat fire spread, accurate. What is in the sight ring while aiming in First Person (right mouse button) is what is going to be hit.

Special thanks goes out to 10K for getting me started down this MODDING rabbit hole. Just finding out where the Scrap Mechanic MOD tool was is a very big help.
ede53d4b-4d73-4aab-bef9-d2a66562ec47.name: Accurized Survival Potato Guns
