a0832dd3-a906-4810-8d33-a45befb22e64.description:
[h1]     There is the Dev mode + Godmode  [/h1]
[b]This mod allows you to have developer mode and be in godmode ![/b]

[h1] To install it : [/h1]
1- Go to
[code]C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2201945254\THE MOD IS IN THIS FOLDER[/code]
2- Copy the Survival folder
3- Paste it in the Scrap Mechanic folder

[h1] To uninstall it : [/h1]
1- Go to
[code]C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2201945254\THE MOD IS IN THIS FOLDER\MAIN[/code]
2- Copy the Survival folder
3- Paste it in the Scrap Mechanic folder

[h1] Commands you can do : [/h1]
[list][*]/ammo : Give ammo (default 50)
[*]/spudgun : Give the spudgun
[*]/gatling : Give the potato gatling gun
[*]/shotgun : Give the fries shotgun
[*]/sunshake : Give 1 sunshake
[*]/baguette : Give 1 revival baguette
[*]/keycard : Give 1 keycard
[*]/powercore : Give 1 powercore
[*]/components : Give <quantity> components (default 10)
[*]/glowsticks : Give <quantity> glowsticks (default 10)
[*]/tumble : Set tumble state
[*]/god : Mechanic characters will take no damage
[*]/respawn : Respawn at last bed (or at the crash site)
[*]/encrypt : Restrict interactions in all warehouses
[*]/decrypt : Unrestrict interactions in all warehouses
[*]/limited : Use the limited inventory
[*]/unlimited : Use the unlimited inventory
[*]/ambush : Starts a 'random' encounter
[*]/recreate : Recreate world
[*]/timeofday : Sets the time of the day as a fraction (0.5=mid day)
[*]/timeprogress : Enables or disables time progress
[*]/day : Disable time progression and set time to daytime
[*]/spawn : Spawn a unit: 'woc', 'tapebot', 'totebot', 'haybot'
[*]/harvestable : Create a harvestable: 'tree', 'stone'
[*]/cleardebug : Clear debug draw objects
[*]/export : Exports blueprint $SURVIVAL_DATA/LocalBlueprints/<name>.blueprint
[*]/import : Imports blueprint $SURVIVAL_DATA/LocalBlueprints/<name>.blueprint
[*]/starterkit : Spawn a starter kit
[*]/mechanicstartkit : Spawn a starter kit for starting at mechanic station
[*]/pipekit : Spawn a pipe kit
[*]/food
a0832dd3-a906-4810-8d33-a45befb22e64.name: Dev mode + Godmode

5de9a21b-d1e4-4b2b-9340-a3372803a6ff.description:
[b]Made for 4.8 (testing ver).[/b]
[b]Mod Ver 2.1:
 - Include a new CraftBot for modded parts! It is pink and you can't paint it :D[/b]

I have played Scrap Mechanic with a few mods and after a while I realize that I was only using what I want from each one, so I've stolen idea from other mods to build my own balance for the Survival.

[h1]MORE FUN, LESS GRIND[/h1]

[list]Changes:
[*] Made an Ultimate Crafting Bot, for now its can craft what the common craftbot can't (like the new wheels, components, circuits, couple lamps, more to come!)
[*] You can Craft the sunshake and it will give you a bit of hpbut refills a lot of water.
[*] Loot improvements (more components,  circuits, milk, corn, burned trhee etc etc etc..
[*] Double hp.
[*] Double Stack size for blocks.
[*] Increased Chests sizes.
[*] Cheaper hideout trades.
[*] Less food consumption.
[*] Faster Refining (and returns 15 instead of 10 of base material).
[*] Cheaper to craft the craftbot (faster starting).
[*] Wheel pack from: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=876772986][b]The Great Wheel Pack[/b][/url]
(I've ported it to survival and you can craft on the modded craftbot).

Copy Data and Survival folder (inside mod 2216920259) to your game folder.

Lives at fb.gg/oHaakar (mostly pt-br).
More to come.
made for 4.8 (testing ver).
5de9a21b-d1e4-4b2b-9340-a3372803a6ff.name: oHaakar's Survival Balance

SPACESHIP PARTS MOD

THIS MOD INCLUDE:

- All of the Spaceship parts from Survival mode
- Fixed up Survival spaceship model and cockpit as driver seat
- Level 5 Thruster which doesn't require fuel, if used in Survival mode

Pre-built flyable spaceship:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2226815493


SURVIVAL MODE USAGE:
1. Open SM game/Survival/Objects/Database/shapesets.json

2. search for:
"$SURVIVAL_DATA/Objects/Database/ShapeSets/effect_proxies.json"

3. Under it add:
$CONTENT_8a9b63a5-7685-4fe1-b18f-9db019b70e00/Objects/Database/ShapeSets/parts.json"

4. At end of ..effect_proxies.json" add " , " so it looks like this: ..effect_proxies.json",


NOTE:
- All objects are from the game, some of them have missing sides, its not a bug of the mod.
- All objects use vanilla UUIDs, which means if devs decide to add Spaceship parts to creative, you will be able to just disable this mod and use vanilla game parts.

a28ddaa4-2569-436b-8f5d-e8e309b5e7f0.description:
[h1]BUILDER BOT MOD[/h1]
This mod adds another character ( bot ) to the game, which can follow you and help you on your daily tasks.

[h1]Update Details:[/h1]
[list]
[*] Updated mod to work with 0.5+ version of the game
[*] Can be painted with a paint tool
[*] Thorws a corn if sees a Duck
[*] Sledgehammer and Saw blade tools now have the same color as Builder Bot
[*] Fixed a bug where Saw could appear when battle is initiated
[*] Simplified installation even more
[/list]

[h1]Features:[/h1]
[list]
[*] When you Press E on it, you can make him follow you
[*] You can change BuilderBot color by painting the chest
[*] It can refine resources such as wood, stone or metal
[*] It throws a corn if sees a Woc or Duck in front ( with 3 minutes intervals )
[*] It will attack Haybot,Totebot and Tapebots if present
[*] It turns on the light if its night time
[*] It uses a battery to refine resources, to re-charge, simply place 1 battery near it
[*] It will stop refining , if you get too far from it
[*] It will stop attacking enemies if they get too far from it
[*] You can make him guard some specific spot, if you make him stop follow
[*] It will refuse to follow or take commands, if you hit or shot him ( 10 seconds )
[*] You can paint Builder Bot with a paint tool
[/list]


[h1]Usage:[/h1]
Place a chest ( from the mod ) on the ground and press E on it, to spawn a bot


[h1]How to install Creative:[/h1]
1. Open SM game/Data/Character/charactersets.json wtih any text editor under "characterSetList": line copy:
[code]
"$CONTENT_a28ddaa4-2569-436b-8f5d-e8e309b5e7f0/Character/Char_builderbot/builderbot.json",
[/code]

2. Open SM game/Data/Scripts/game/CreativePlayer.lua
2.1 At top of the file copy:
[code]dofile "$CONTENT_a28ddaa4-2569-436b-8f5d-e8e309b5e7f0/Scripts/BuilderDoFile.lua"[/code]
2.2 Search for function CreativePlayer.server_onCreate( self ) , under it copy:
[code]onCreate_BotHook(self) [/code]
2.3 Search for function CreativePlayer.client_onInteract( self, character, state ) , before "end" copy:
[code]onInteract_BotHook

797ec3a3-749c-40fe-9977-88f09ee144f0.description:
The Builder's Wand helps you 

WARNING: This mod is in early Alpha. Things may break. Use at your own risk

[h3]Installation[/h3]
1. Manually install [b]sm.interop[/b]
2. Subscribe to this mod

[h3]Usage[/h3]
1. Put sm.interop's "Modded Tool Loader" in one of your hotbars.
2. Place the Builder's Wand Installer part somewhere in your world (it disappears automatically again).
3. Put the Builder's Wand tool (found under Mods -> Builder's Wand) in your inventory.
4. While holding the Builder's Wand, use left click and right click to create a selection.
5. Use one of the commands to transform your sellection.

[h3]Commands[/h3]
- /bw-set <block>: Fill your selection with the given blocks (find block names with /bw-blocks)
- /bw-replace <from> <to>: Change 
- /bw-color <color>: Change the color of all blocks in your selection to the given color. (<color> can be a ##hexnum or a color name from /bw-colors)
- /bw-delete: Delete all blocks in the selection
- /bw-wall <block>: DELETES everything from your selection, and replaces it with a wall of the specified block  
- /bw-box <bloc<>: DELETES everything from your selection, and replaces it with a box of the specified block

[h3]Plans for the future[/h3]
- Cut, copy and paste commands
- Specify colors in /bw-set and /bw-replace
- Not removing all existing blocks when using /bw-wall and /bw-box
- Fixing bugs
- sm.interop permissions integration

[h3]Mod support[/h3]
Currently supported mods: none
If you have a mod that adds regular blocks and you want people to be able to use those blocks with the Builder's Wand, send me a message on Discord: Xesau##1681

If you want to contribute to this mod, send me a message on Discord: Xesua##1681
797ec3a3-749c-40fe-9977-88f09ee144f0.name: Builder's Wand

63868d9a-a840-4119-bbae-3b5715869be0.description:
[h1] Shark Character [/h1]

This mod adds Shark character to the game, it swims in the water automatically

[h1] FEATURES:[/h1]
[list]
[*] They spawn in the water and swims around
[*] When is on the ground, it gets on the side with special animation
[*] It attacks Player and Wocs if they are swimming near them
[*] They can be fed with Woc Steak to keep them alive ( around )
[*] They won't attack you for 2 minutes if you give them Woc Steak, time adds up
[*] Have full set of animations
[*] It's the same shark which is on the RaftShark object, so it fits with game theme
[*] 7 different skins available
[/list]
[h1] How to use it: [/h1] 
1. Go to: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2257881822
( Your Steam location )

2. Copy content of shark.txt into: SM game/Survival/Character/characterdatabase.json under first { symbol

3. Open SM game/Survival/Scripts/game/survival_spawns.lua and search for:
[code]elseif tag == "GLOWGORP" then[/code]
4. Under that line add:
[code]
unit = sm.unit.createUnit(sm.uuid.new("3785ceca-df7f-42ee-a3a5-77a7a4752c28"), sm.vec3.new(node.position.x,node.position.y,-2.2),toYaw( node.rotation ),{game = 1} )
[/code]

[b]Done[/b]

If you don't see them straight away, keep looking, they will always sneak on you when you expect the least!
You can always use "/spawn 3785ceca-df7f-42ee-a3a5-77a7a4752c28" if you just want to see it
63868d9a-a840-4119-bbae-3b5715869be0.name: Shark Character

9c6b74b9-24d8-4b37-9324-f1539d4ef09c.description:
An outer space company discovered the auto-farming planet while you were living on it (or before you crash landed), and have modified the  existing rogue machines to become dangerous, roaming killing machines!

Name says it all, so in other words: "Suffer"

[h1]Updates[/h1]
1, Totebots now explode on death
2, Modified texture of Raidboss

[h1]Instructions[/h1]

Step 1, Go to libraryname\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2293645304\ (replace "libraryname" to wherever you store you're games, can be just steam)
Step 2, Nab Hardmode Enemies 4.8 and put it in the Scrap mechanic folder
Step 3, Run the Installer batch.

how 2 uninstall:
staircase 1, run the batch with an un

That's it.

[h1]Unit Changes[/h1]

1. Bots (excluding totebot) now have more health and damage (including farmbot)
2. The Haybot can slightly outrun you
3. You can no longer outrun the Farmbot
4. Totebots explode on death
5. Tapebots Overkill
6. Red Tapebots have a higher fire rate
7. """New""" (heavy quotation marks) Raidboss
8. Farmbots can now breach through Metal 3 and below easily
9. Tapebot Damage and Fire rate change in Raids
10. Farmbots can withstand more explosive damage
11. Farmbots react more quickly

[h1]Other Changes[/h1]

1. Mounted Spudguns deal less damage
2. Warehouse key drops from farmbots are no longer guaranteed
3. 4 more raid levels (i think)

pretty much. Good luck if you use this, and goodbye to you're precious crushers!
9c6b74b9-24d8-4b37-9324-f1539d4ef09c.name: [MANUAL] Impossible Difficulty Mod

d89de6c0-7d5f-44fe-b52c-dae5d51e928b.description:
This is fix for Motion mod by Mini, fixed textures, some blocks got fixed interaction after console was removed.
original mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1641758165&searchtext=motion+mod

original desc:
I'm happy to finally release this test version of new Mini's Mod, now Motion Mod.
This mod has all the blocks current Mini's Mod has and will replace it after testing phase while this will get more blocks for testing. As of now there are 47 blocks. 2/1/2019
All blocks still need the console to display their settings/messages, so remember to use /console if needed.

In this update I introduced new kinds of blocks, Vector blocks. I want to make this mod revolve around movement and physics as the name implies. That's why I made this custom data transfer system of vectors. It's basically bigger and more complex Modpack's Math blocks. They can collect, calculate and feed data into functional blocks to give more control over them. They and functional blocks are also fully compatible and can use said Math blocks in their inputs.

Another feature is the new textures. I decided to redraw the few blocks I had and made myself some patterns to keep the mod style uniform. You will likely notice how blocks are color and shape coded. They also have symbols that should be quite intuitive.

The next thing I'll be adding is a manual that I will link both here and in the main release after it's out. It will explain exactly what inputs different blocks have and what certain blocks do, since I tried to keep the descriptions as short as possible they don't provide all the informations needed.

Lastly, this is a test release. Remember to save your creation before each testing. Submit all the bugs in the bugs discussion. Please include a screenshot of the situation with the error message and if possible how it happend. If you can replicate the error consistently it would be really appreciated to post a link to the creation, it will help a lot with finding the problem as well as save some time.

=======
Small u
d89de6c0-7d5f-44fe-b52c-dae5d51e928b.name: Motion Mod Test Release Tex Fix

c2e61e22-2c92-4088-988b-546f906f2cb6.description:
[h1]This mod makes PVP in Scrap Mechanic possible! Who will you fight for?[/h1]
[h2]Features[/h2]
[list]
    [*][b]Weapons deal PVP damage[/b]
    [*][b]No name tags[/b]
    [*][b]Death messages in chat[/b]
[/list]
Use your creativity to kill your friends! Dr Pixel's PVP mod opens the game up to a whole new range of possibilities! Create your own PVP games and play against your friends!


[h2] Full Feature List[/h2]
[olist]
    [*] [h3]Melee[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]Hammer does 20 PVP damage
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]Ranged[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]Spudrifle & Spud Cannon deal 7 PVP damage
    [*]Spudgatling & Spudshotgun deal 4 PVP damage (per bullet)
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]GUI[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]No name tags (also in Creative)
	[list]
    [*]ENGLISH only! Change your game language to English to disable name tags
    [*]Change your game language to NOT English to enable name tags
	[/list]
    [*]Kill messages show attacker and victim
    [*]Death messages
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]Respawn[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]100 health instead of 30
    [*]80 food instead of 30
    [*]100 water instead of 30
	[/list]
[/olist]


[h1]How to install[/h1]
[h3]Watch my video on how to install mods![/h3]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZbfB5nJ_BaM
[olist]
    [*]Subscribe to the mod and wait for it to download.
    [*]Go to your Steam library and right-click Scrap Mechanic. Click "Manage" -> "Browse Local Files"
    [*]This should open the folder: [i]Steam\steamapps\common\[b]Scrap Mechanic[/b][/i]
    [*]Move two folders upward to the folder: [i]Steam\[b]steamapps[/b][/i]
    [*]Then navigate to "workshop" -> "content" -> "387990" where my mod should be in the most recent folder.
    [*]Open the "Copy to install PVP mod" folder and copy the "Survival" & "Cache" folders.
    [*]Repeat step 2
    [*]Paste the two folders in the [i]Steam\steamapps\common\[b]Scrap Mechanic[/b][/i] folder. You'll need to click replace files in destination when prompted.
    [*]You're down! Now go and spawn-kill your friends!
[/olist]
c2e61e22-2c92-4088-988b-546f906f2cb6.name: Working PVP in Scrap Mechanic! - PVP Mod

Go into your SM game folder (right click SM in Steam library, click properties, local files, browse local files)
Go back 2 folders, into "steamapps"
Open the "workshop" folder
Go into "content"
Open "387990"
And go into "2360572018"
The full instructions are in the "readme" file inside of that folder

0a3394e7-acf4-4ecb-a3c6-6b1e7bed2016.description:
This mod adds a True Hardcore Survival mode to Scrap Mechanic.

The major features are: longer grow times on most crops, more challenging raids at higher levels, more balanced bot attacks to players and objects, more balanced loot pools, more balanced crafting recipes, a progression system in crafting and trading for specific items and much more.

This video covers why all the changes were made: https://youtu.be/iSsQ8lKZcDc

This document contains all the changes in detail: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1pgTu5KQVamrs1jlpjSYhgeLRBG8vORsHMRUCmYHNlrM/edit?usp=sharing

Here is the mod file: https://github.com/2-Divine/Scrap-Mechanic-Hardcore-Mode-Test/archive/main.zip


To install the mod download the zip file. Extract the files then drill down to the folder that contains Data and Survival folders. Copy those folders into the Scrap Mechanic root directory. To uninstall verify the games files.

To provide feedback the best way to do so is in the Scrap Mechanic channel in my Discord: https://www.discord.gg/hgEAAtH

Special thank you to 2Divine and Khaiba for collaborating on this mod and making it possible!

To incorporate the updates below you will need to download the mod files again and move them to the Scrap Mechanic directory.

Update 1 (02/19/2021): Increased the number of slots for wooden crates from 5 to 10. Fixed the attack damage for bots against objects. If you already started a world with the mod you will need to pick up and place any wooden crates you already found in order for them to update and show the 5 additional slots.

Update 2 (03/04/2021): Increased the drop rate for Totebot Heads from 10% to 20%. Increased the drop rate for Haybot and Tapebot Heads (CPUs) from 12.5% to 20%. Increased the drop rate for Farmbot Heads (CPUs) from 20% to 33%. Reduced the number of Tapebot Heads (CPUs) needed to craft the Refinebot from 10 to 5. Reduced the number of Totebot Heads needed to craft the Resource Collector from 10 to 5.
0a3394e7-acf4-4ecb-a3c6-6b1e7bed2016.name: True Hardcore Survival

cb83e573-4508-4321-adac-ccab15cbb874.description:
Made for game version 0.5.x, current Mod version is 1.0.2
This mod adds more weapons into the game!

!!UPDATE INFO!!
For mod versions 1.0.2 and newer, this mod is now split into two parts : 
The Workshop part, which you download here AND
The FileMod part, which downloads automatically but needs to be installed manually!

WARNING : The FileMod part is currently incompatible with some other FileMods.
If you want a specific FileMod to work with this, leave a comment with the mod's name and I will try to make my mod compatible with it.
If you want to use this with another compatible FileMod, ALWAYS make sure to install this mod AFTER the other one!

How to install the FileMod part : 
1.Subscribe to this mod and start the game at least once to make sure it is downloaded.
2.If the game is running, close it!
3.Go into your Steam Library, right click Scrap Mechanic, 
   go to "manage" and click "browse local files". 
   This should open the .../steamapps/common/Scrap Mechanic folder.
4.Go back into the "steamapps" folder.
5.Go into "/workshop/content/387990/2422574725"
6.You should now see a couple folders and two ".bat" files, 
called "InstallModFiles.bat" and "UninstallModFiles.bat".
7.To install the custom handheld weapons, run "InstallModFiles.bat" and follow the instructions.
8.If you want to remove the custom weapons again, you can either use the "UninstallModFiles.bat"    OR go into steam and validate the game files.
If the installer does not work, please leave a comment and I will try to fix it.

Changelog : 
-Added an "Update Info" block. 
Whenever I release a mod update that requires you to manually change something (like updating the FileMod part), I will change the description of this block.
-Changed the sound effect of the Pesticide Cannon.
-Added FileMod installer and uninstaller.
-FileMod : Handheld Tape Gun
-FileMod : Handheld Explosive Tape Gun
-FileMod : Handheld Gatling Tape Gun
-FileMod : Handheld Explosive Gatling Gun

Planned for the next update : 
-Glow Cannon
-Other custom tools
-Even more guns?
cb83e573-4508-4321-adac-ccab15cbb874.name: More Weapons and Parts Mod

24657696-b68b-4189-a1a0-617e5f4d4ff5.description:
Girya is just a mod created for entertainment purposes, which does not try to offend someone or urge someone to take any action. All coincidences with the real world are accidental.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description of all items and their functions:
"Girya" - At any touch, the girya will explode.Paint it light red to create a black hole.
Paint it light blue for a very dangerous companion.
"Fake Girya" - Just Girya
"Mini Girya" - The first is light green Friendly, with it, the Girya just flies around you.
The second one is just green, with it the "Girya" will start attacking you with small bombs.
The third is dark green, with it the "Girya" will begin to reload faster.
The fourth is the darkest green, with it, "Girya" will start shooting at you with huge barrels with a small reload.
To kill "Girya", it is enough to shoot it 4 times.n"Shtanga" - Spins up to an incredible speed and, in the presence of a weight on the map, reads out hunting for it until the weight is destroyed.
"Girya Tag" - you can use it to make the bar fly just after it, while it weighs nothing and takes 1 to 1 block, which makes it easy to hang it on your car or your friend's car.
"Girya Manager" - One of the most important things in this mod that allows you to control all the parameters of the kettlebell and barbell. Can only be used by the administrator. 
"MiniGirya Tag" - you can use it to make the bar fly just after it, while it weighs nothing and takes 1 to 1 block, which makes it easy to hang it on your car or your friend's car 
 "MiniGirya Launcher"Shoots MiniGirya. You will need a button to use it correctly. To choose the type of MiniGirya to shoot just paint it in the desired color (Salad, Light Green, Green, Dark Green), then connect it to any type of button and enjoy.
24657696-b68b-4189-a1a0-617e5f4d4ff5.name: Girya

3201ead7-e2d2-4556-8605-300b72cb04f5.description:
` ~~~BBQ's Collection of Tweaks~~~`
 
I Started playing again, these settings started relaxed at first.. but this mod has become a non-grindy experience for the versed in knowing how to play the game.

Noteable Features Include:
Increased Stacks for most items:
Increased Loot quality and quantity from most sources:
Instant Refine Speed, semi balanced through hunger and thirst:
Minimally Increased Tire Friction:
Increased Crop Growth And Drop Rate:
Increased Raid Attacks, more enemies!:
Easier to fight Enemies "1 Hit Totebot, 3 Hit Haybot" :
Altered Health and Stats, will feel similar or worse! depends on how you play :)

Final Notes: 
1. For the Ultimate Experience, start a new world. i promise it doesn't take long to get far.

2. I do NOT suggest using this mod with your current save (unless you already started a new one with this mod), OR backed up your world, but even then some thing won't work corrently.

3. Please Comment with any problem you encounter, if/when all else fails you can always verify integrity. though it should not be necessary as i have included backupfiles for the original content.

4. Expect me to forget something and have to update a couple times before it's Final... things should be working 99% right now. 

04/09/2021: New update with balance adjustments because i started playing and some things were just wayy too overpowered haha oops, im thinking about creating new balancing for food/stats let me know what y'all think of that in the comments please and thank you!

04/12/2021: New Big update with many changes to many things, find out for yourself! PLEASE report any bugs you find in the comments. im sure we can figure out the issue/s fast and promptly but i can't do it alone anymore, there is so much to test lol

04/13/2021: Minor update to fix a few things, small imrpovements! also not sure if anyone figured it out yet, but you can pickup fruit crates with right click, actually been a feature for awhile LOL
3201ead7-e2d2-4556-8605-300b72cb04f5.name: BBQ's Collection of Survival Tweaks

This mod is made for the creative update 0.5+ (The update that adds water to creative mode)

!!! This mod only works for normal creative terrain worlds (Not for custom / flat creative worlds) !!!

!!! For this mod to work, the game files have to be changed !!!

Main File Content:
-Bigger creative world size

Add-on:
-Adds survival mode tiles to creative mode

---------------------------------------------

Instructions:
-Goto the mod folder location, located at "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2465505686"

-Open "readme.txt" for more instructions.


To uninstall the mod, go to steam and right click on scrap mechanic on the left. Then click properties... / game files / verify integrity of game files...

---------------------------------------------

Potential problems / issues:
(creative mode isnt made for a large world that this mod supplies. Therefore there are some problems that can show up. Here are the problems that showed up when i was testing.)

-when generating / loading world, Scrap Mechanic freezes:
When this happens, you just have to wait. This problem occurs, because the world is a lot bigger, and it takes longer to generate / load worlds.

-Terrain Assets not loading / invisible:
When this problem occurs, the best fix is to exit the world and rejoin (optional but recommended: lower draw distance).


(This mod was only tested on my computer, hope it works for other people / on other computers)
4f7e1020-1147-44ca-8f8a-214d825d17df.name: Better Creative World Mod

05278b5c-f9b8-441a-a644-d1b457eeb0c2.description:
To install:
Click Windows + R and write C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2465428948
Copy the folder Survival
Click Windows + R and write C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic
Paste the folder.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This does so:
Woc's have a maximum of 200 Health Points
If a Woc eats corn it gets restores 10 Health Points (1/20 of max HP)
1 Corn = 1 Milk
Also you might find some milk randomly laying on the ground. I don't know why that happens, but have your free milk.
Glowbugs have a maximum 100 Health Points
If a Glowbug eats cardboard it restores 5 Health Points (1/20 of max HP)
5 Cardboard = 1 Glow Goop
05278b5c-f9b8-441a-a644-d1b457eeb0c2.name: Arti's Better Animals

52cf174a-254c-4cee-8a1a-b44fb1c2baef.description:
To install:
Click Windows + R and write C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2465379355
Copy the folder Survival
Click Windows + R and write C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic
Paste the folder.

If you want to turn off commands, copy the Survival folder from No Commands Backup

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This mod allows you to have admin commands in survival

Commands:
/ammo "Give ammo (default 40)"
/spudgun "Give the spudgun"
/gatling "Give the potato gatling gun"
/shotgun "Give the fries shotgun"
/sunshake "Give 1 sunshake"
/baguette "Give 1 revival baguette"
/keycard "Give 1 keycard"
/powercore "Give 1 powercore"
/components "Give components (default 10)"
/glowsticks "Give components (default 10)"
/tumble "Set tumble state"
/god "Mechanic characters will take no damage"
/respawn "Respawn at last bed (or at the crash site)"
/encrypt "Restrict interactions in all warehouses"
/decrypt "Unrestrict interactions in all warehouses"
/limited "Use the limited inventory"
/unlimited "Use the unlimited inventory"
/ambush "Starts a 'random' encounter"
/recreate "Recreate world"
/timeofday "Sets the time of the day as a fraction (0.5=mid day)"
/timeprogress "Enables or disables time progress"
/day "Disable time progression and set time to daytime"
/spawn "Spawn a unit: 'woc', 'tapebot', 'totebot', 'haybot'"
/harvestable "Create a harvestable: 'tree', 'stone'"
/cleardebug "Clear debug draw objects"
/export "Exports blueprint $SURVIVAL_DATA/LocalBlueprints/.blueprint"
/import "Imports blueprint $SURVIVAL_DATA/LocalBlueprints/.blueprint"
/starterkit "Spawn a starter kit"
/mechanicstartkit "Spawn a starter kit for starting at mechanic station"
/pipekit "Spawn a pipe kit"
/foodkit "Spawn a food kit"
/seedkit "Spawn a seed kit"
/die "Kill the player"
/sethp "Set player hp value"
/setwater "Set player water value"
/setfood "Set player food value"
/aggroall "All hostile
52cf174a-254c-4cee-8a1a-b44fb1c2baef.name: Survival Commands

da9dbada-2fe3-42ec-9cce-95c1a6d45d55.description:
[h1]Player Emotes Mod[/h1]
This mod adds various dance and emote animations to player character.
Press R to open menu, Press and hold E to perform an action

[h1]Features:[/h1]
[list]
[*] Includes 16 emotes ( will be updated )
[*] Press R key to open emotes menu
[*] Press and hold E to dance ( does not get activated when pressing switches or lift )
[/list]

[h1]How to install Creative:[/h1]
1. Open SM game/Data/Scripts/game/CreativePlayer.lua with any text editor
1.1 Under CreativePlayer = class( nil ) line copy:
[code]dofile( "$CONTENT_da9dbada-2fe3-42ec-9cce-95c1a6d45d55/Scripts/DanceUnitDoFile.lua" )[/code]
1.2 Search for function CreativePlayer.client_onInteract( self, character, state ) , before "end" copy:
[code]onInteract_DanceHook(self,character,state) [/code]
1.3 Search for function CreativePlayer.client_onReload( self ) , before "end" copy:
[code]onReload_DanceHook(self) [/code]

2. Open SM game/Survival/Scripts/game/characters/MechanicCharacter.lua with any text editor
2.1 At the top of the file copy:
[code]dofile( "$CONTENT_da9dbada-2fe3-42ec-9cce-95c1a6d45d55/Scripts/DanceCharDoFile.lua" )[/code]
2.2 Search for self.animationsLoaded = true under it copy:
[code]onGraphicsLoaded_DanceHook(self)[/code]
2.3 Search for function MechanicCharacter.client_onEvent( self, event ) under it copy:
[code]onEvent_DanceHook(self,event) [/code]



[h1]How to install Survival:[/h1]
1. Open SM game/Data/Scripts/game/SurvivalPlayer .lua with any text editor
1.1 Under SurvivalPlayer = class( nil ) line copy:
[code]dofile( "$CONTENT_da9dbada-2fe3-42ec-9cce-95c1a6d45d55/Scripts/SDanceUnitDoFile.lua" )[/code]
1.2 Search for function SurvivalPlayer .client_onInteract( self, character, state ) , under it copy:
[code]onInteract_DanceHook(self,character,state) [/code]
1.3 Search for function SurvivalPlayer .client_onReload( self ) , before "end" copy:
[code]onReload_DanceHook(self) [/code]

SKIP BELOW IF YOU ALREADY INSTALLED FOR CREATIVE
2. Open SM game/Survival/Scripts/game/characters/MechanicCharacter.lua with any text edito
da9dbada-2fe3-42ec-9cce-95c1a6d45d55.name: Player Emotes

97690e3f-b951-4978-95c0-1006d4a2cb92.description:
This mod add the commands /import and /export like in survival game.

It allow to share and move creation from creative world to survival worlds when dev mode is enabled in survival mode.


!! THE MOD NEED TO BE INSTALLED MANUALY !!

To install you need to go to the mod folder 
(Steam Folder\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2470432450)
Then copy and paste the folder 'Data' to your Scrap Mechanic Folder and replace the file.

You can find the scrap mechanic folder by following this steps:
- go to the scrap mechanic steam page
- click the 'manage' button > manage > browse local files
Then paste and replace the Data folder.


To activate dev mode in survival:
copy paste and replace the Survival folder in Scrap Mechanic directory
!! This can create problems if you already have mod !!

If you want to avoid bugs, you can search on youtube how to enable dev mode in survival manually.
97690e3f-b951-4978-95c0-1006d4a2cb92.name: Creative Import-Export

803a7d4d-8964-4195-aef5-9c1ec7ad6f4a.description:
Takes everything to the extremes. Fun to play with & break stuff.

[u][b]Ultra Dense Block[/b][/u] - extremely heavy block. Makes things seemingly completely unbalanced balanced.

[u][b]Ultra Light Block[/b][/u] - super light block. Can whip around at extremely high speeds.

[u][b]Ludicrous Speed Engine[/b][/u] - super-fast engine. Fast spinny.

[u][b]Ludicrous Power Engine[/b][/u] - super torquey engine. Provides more torque than a controller.

[u][b]Ludicrous Speed Thruster[/b][/u] - EXTREMELY powerful. First setting equivalent to thruster on low, second 10 on low, third 100, fourth 200, fifth 400, sixth 800, seventh 1600 (!!).

Leave suggestions for new blocks in the comments.

[b]CAUTION:[/b] With great power comes great responsibility. You can create contraptions with this that can ping you out of the world, rendering it useless. Use with care. Also: the heavy blocks can and will reach a critical mass and start falling through the ground repeatedly.
803a7d4d-8964-4195-aef5-9c1ec7ad6f4a.name: Extreme Mod

b2be7b87-c100-4519-9f5d-6c265ec785ff.description:
Official ModPack:

This is the Modpack Legacy Support.
It contains parts that are old, discontinued, or ones that already have a duplicate part.
This is made so that you can load your old blueprints - DO NOT BUILD NEW CREATIONS WITH THESE PARTS - look for the better version of the same parts in other Modpacks.



LAST UPDATED: 24th September 2020 (thanks to AncientEvil for the assistance with this update!)

This update was to support 0.4 changes to the part definitions so you can load these parts with older blueprints.

- Add Neon Lightstrips

df10d497-a28e-4413-a707-5a07813aec37.description:
[b][h1]Modular Wings![/h1][/b]

[b]This mod is now in passive maintenance. Create issues or pull requests if you want to help contributing updates.[/b]
Refer to the [url=#FFFFFFhttps://github.com/DasEtwas/scrap-mechanic-mods]#FFFFFFGitHub repository[/url] at for licensing and contributing.

[h1]Your planes are terrible at gliding?[/h1]
Use the [url=#FFFFFFhttps://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1400025377]#FFFFFFDrag Reducer Block[/url] to remove drag from creations.

This mod also contains aids for checking the Center of Mass, Weight and Thrust of a creation.

[h1][b]Have working wings in Scrap Mechanic![/b][/h1]
Make propellers, planes, helicopters, whatever you can imagine!
This is the first and only working wings mod for Scrap Mechanic.
All the wings have lift proportional to their area (of the model, yes). There are no stronger or weaker ones.

The normal force on the wing is calculated using this formula:
F = v² * airDensity * area * 0.5 * sin(a)
airDensity = 2.75, but this may change.

Wings don't have additional drag.

[b]Tips:[/b]
1. Using multiple Angled Small Thing Airfoils is better for propellers because of the way lift calculations are done.
This way you can generate more thrust.

2. To avoid having lag and collision lag, use as few modular wing parts as possible. Always build big wings with the largest possible panels, avoid having many small parts, etc.

Without prior written permission, you may not publish any contents of the mod.

[b]Many thanks to Xesau, Brent Batch, shinevision, Kampftroll and Reez for helping[/b]

[b]Thanks to Question Mark for flawlessly adding russian locales![/b]

Example craft
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1489899813

[h2][b]Featured mods[/b][/h2]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1887346585

tags: wings mod, wings, aero, aerodynamics, lift, airfoils, xd, plane, airplane, aircraft, fly, parachute, chute, toolbox, drag
df10d497-a28e-4413-a707-5a07813aec37.name: Wings

4d9d663d-3216-42b1-9a9a-286ca774ce4d.description:
This Mod adds Blocks and Parts that were leaked and found in the game files!
For now there are 3 parts and 15 blocks, but more is coming soon!

To learn more about each block/part, read it's ingame description!


Join the SMLeaks discord server here:
https://discord.gg/YKSrNW567G


Subscribe to the creator on YouTube for more cool content:
https://youtube.com/thedartfrog/


Changelog:
-V1.1.1
-fixed a syntax error in the crafting recipes
-fixed the pumpkin crafting recipe so that it now gives you 1 pumpkin instead of 10
-removed unnecessary files

-V1.1:
-added 3 new parts showcasing unused QuestMarker icons
-added Antenna02 part
-added Spaceship Interior Gear
-added old Spaceship Controlboard
-added Water Barrel
-added Plastic Pumpkin
-slightly changed the default color of copper blocks

-the mod is now usable in survival (with crafting recipes) thanks to QuestionableMark's 'Modded Craftbot Recipes' Custom Game which allows Blocks and Parts mods to add their own crafting recipes! The next Raft Mechanic update will include that functionality as well, meaning you will be able to use Leaked Blocks and Parts in there as well soon.
The 'Old Indestructible Block' is of course excluded from the recipes, as it would completely break the game in Survival Mode.
It may take a bit for the mod to be caught by the Mod Database, so you might not be able to use it in Survival right as this update goes out!

Link to QMark's recipe-loading custom game:

06e58db5-bcff-4632-8ba7-65b2e6aa62b9.description:
This mod is an extention module of the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1969702041]Programmable Processor[/url]. It allows to paint on a 96x54 pixel display. Currently it supports uppercase text, drawing and filling ovals and rectagles. Please keep in mind that it is still work in progress and
things might change later in development.
In case somebody wants to know the current technical interface to do stuff feel free to get in touch :D
If you encounter any bugs let me know :)
Have fun!

[h1] HLL API [/h1]
[code]
[b]get_screens[/b]
	parameters: [ ]
	description:
		returns a list of all screens that the
		computer is connected to.
		
[b]set_screen_resolution[/b]
	parameters: [ screen, width, height ]
	description:
		sets the amount of pixels of the screen.
		be careful using this function because it
		will recreate all pixels when calling the
		function and can potentially cause lag.
		the default resolution is 96x54.

[b]set_screen_size[/b]
	parameters: [ screen, width, height ]
	description:
		scales the screen to fit into the desired
		width and height. the resolution / ratio
		of the screen stays the same -> the screen
		might get distorted.

[b]draw_str[/b]
	parameters: [ screen, text, x, y, color ]
	description:
		draws the string in the specified color on
		the screen with the left upper corner of the
		string as a reference. it currently only knows
		uppercase input text which i will fix.

[b]draw[/b] and [b]fill[/b]
	parameters: [ screen, shape, x, y, width, height, color]
	description:
		draws a shape in the desired color on the screen.
		it can draw rectangles ('rectangle' as shape parameter)
		where x, y specifies the left upper corner and w, h
		specify the width and height of the rectangle.
		it also draws ovals ('oval' as shape parameter) in which
		cases x, y is the center point and w, h specify the
		dimensions of the oval.
[/code]

The color parameter is a list with 3 numbers from 0.0 to 1.0.
06e58db5-bcff-4632-8ba7-65b2e6aa62b9.name: Screen Module

This mod add 114 new outfits you'll fined them in common, rare and epic garment boxes. The most beautiful of them are made by Fawx (new 3D model) the others are made mostly by ZabiMa_SK and me.

[h1] Installation : [/h1]

1) Go to the mod folder at: SteamLibrary\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2492054706 (a quick way to get here is by right clicking the game in steam and going 'Manage -> Browse Local Files' and then navigating two folders up to steamapps).

2) Open Fawx Garments+Zabvos0.5.1.zip

3) Extract the 3 files (Cache, Data, Survival) in : SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic
(can also be reached by right clicking the game in steam and going 'Manage -> Browse Local Files').


[h1] Frequently Asked Questions : [/h1]

1) Can I play in multiplayer with people who did not install this mod ? 

No. Like most mods, your friends will need to have matching mods in order to play together. \nBut have no fear! If you uninstall this mod and then re-install it again in the future, all of the garments you unlocked previously will remain unlocked for you.

2) How do I uninstall this mod? Or any mod ? 

The cleanest way to uninstall ALL your mods is to use the \"verify integrity\" feature in steam, found in the Scrap Mechanic properties in your Steam Library."

3) Why aren't Bovine Billy (baby woc backpack) and Back0t Craftp4ck (Bot backpack) animated ? 

I didn't manage to make the animations works on 0.5.1, i don't have the knowledge to do it.

4) Can i play with other survival mods ?

Yes, the mod is fully compatible with every other mod that doesn't touch the clothes files (basically)

5) How can i unlock every garments faster ?

Here is an unlocker made by Kriogenic : https://kriogenic.github.io/FawxUnlocker/ just follow the steps !

4) a light to carry around to see in the dark (left click to activate)

c24b0dd0-1e16-4e48-87bf-f4b3cca88db1.description:
This survival mod aims to lessen the grind of vanilla while also changing how you go about your survival game.

This pack changes some crafting recipes, changes drops from bots and mobs, adds new trades at the hideout, allows for encryptor destruction and warehouse looting, as well as doubling the daycycle (normal is 24 minutes in 1 day, modded is 48 minutes in 1 day).

The aim of the pack is a more construction focused game, while having more flexibility to allow the player to decide how they aquire their resources.

Please let me know if you find anything you might consider a bug and i will look into it.

Enjoy!
c24b0dd0-1e16-4e48-87bf-f4b3cca88db1.name: Vanilla+er

38d0ae47-a828-4c2a-a81a-025f76145e86.description:
A reupload due to technical issues with my mod tool rip.

Vanill+er is an alteration to the original game formula. It changes recipes, drops, trades, and allows destruction of the encryptor for warehouse looting.

The aim of the pack was to facilitate base building and vehicle optimization.

Edit: Slightly increased clam drops and increased clam stack size to lessen glue grind, just noticed even with the changed drop rates it was still a tad grindy.

I hope you enjoy toying around, and please provide feedback.

Change-log-V1.1.1

Most non-stacking parts stack up to 20 now, let me know if you notice a part that isn't stacking and I will fix it at a later date

Warehouse: Elevator door can be destroyed with large explosives. [emergency banana removable]

Can now craft "Banana" crates [cow crates found in the warehouse: recipe is 20 steak 10 + bananas + 1 warehouse key = 1 cow crate]

Potato plants now only give 10 spuds instead of 50, forgot to readjust these after i was finished testing the early stages of the mod.

afc4ab7f-34f7-499e-b93e-622a1ce1cfdf.description:
Welcome to Snazzy mode!

[This mod was made for ver. 0.5.1 of ScrapMechanic, unless stated this mod will not work with previous or future versions]

The mod includes overhauled craftbot recipes, adjustments to loot drops [more loot, more often] sledge hammerable large stones, custom blocks with stats set to the extremes! [All 16 combinations of lvl1 and lvl10 stats] Various recycling recipes, as well as allowing placing soil on blocks! [please note that the soil will float if placed on moving parts, this is not a bug, but a feature]


This mod also includes lootable warehouses [destruction of encryptor required]. The emergency banana inside of warehouse elevators are lootable, regardless of encryptor.  Warehouse elevator doors can be destroyed with large explosives.  Both scrapstone and metal resource rods spawn from mined rocks. More wood from all tree types, and faster refining times.


There are various minor changes as well, such as mobs dropping more resources when fed and destroyed. Health, food, and water have been doubled ( a little more than doubled). More crops are needed to trigger raids, and many more!

We hope you have as much fun playing as we had creating this mod!

-Creator: Copper Boltwire
-CoCreator: Dead-Man
afc4ab7f-34f7-499e-b93e-622a1ce1cfdf.name: Snazzy

4b0678ee-3197-4658-b190-a4df534ba528.description:
Modyfikacja dodaje różne elementy polskiej infrastruktury kolejowej.
Zawiera między innymi:
- szyny kolejowe
- czujniki torowe
- szafy aparatowe
- tablice peronowe
- elementy automatyki kolejowej
- płyty peronowe
- zegary peronowe
- płyty przejazdowe
- loga producentów automatyki kolejowej
- nasypy
- słupy sieci trakcyjnej (sieć zostanie dodana w przyszłych aktualizacjach)
- obwody izolowane
- obwody nakładane EON

Aby ułatwić budowę infrastruktury kolejowej umieszczam tutaj link do kolekcji gotowych odcinków torów:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2547163673


Modyfikacja jest wciąż rozwijana i nowe części zostaną dodane!

W PRZYSZŁOŚCI POJAWI SIĘ TUTAJ LINK DO PORADNIKÓW PODŁĄCZANIA I OBSŁUGI NIEKTÓRYCH URZĄDZEŃ!

Zachęcam do przeczytania poniższego FAQ w przypadku pytań. Czytaj opisy obiektów w ekwipunku, jest tam napisane jak je obsługiwać!





FAQ:

Q: Jak zrobić latarnię Cauera?
A: Zalecam pobrać gotowy blueprint latarni z mojego workshopa. Link: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2863811405

Q: Jak zrobić obwód torowy (obwód izolowany)?
A: Przy planowanym początku obwodu torowego ustawia się nadajnik, przy końcu odbiornik. Obwód torowy wyznacza się markerami ustawianymi w osi toru. Na końcu łączymy nadajnik z pierwszym markerem, markery szeregowo ze sobą, a ostatni marker z odbiornikiem. Odbiornik wydaje wyjście logiczne gdy wyznaczona strefa jest zajęta przez tabor.

Q: Jak zrobić obwód torowy (EON)?
A: EON podłącza się tak samo jak obwody izolowane z tą różnicą, że zamiast odbiornika jest skrzynka EON, do której można podłączyć maksymalnie dwa obwody.

Q: Czym różnią się EON-1, EON-3 i EON-6?
A: EON-1 i EON-3 działają tak, że gdy zajęta jest pierwsza strefa dają wyjście logiczne, gdy zajęta jest druga strefa to dają wyjście na detektor wyciągnięcia przycisku (mod USRK). EON-6 wykrywa kierunek jazdy pociągu i w zależności od kierunku daje wyjście logiczne lub na detektor wyciągnięcia przycisku.

Q: Jak otworzyć/zamknąć szafę aparatową?
A: Szafy otwiera się przyciskiem "E" klikając na nią od tyłu.

Q: Jak używać czujników torowych?
A: Czujniki torowe dzielą się na pojedyńcze i podwójne. Pojedyńcze wydają wyjście logiczne w przypadku kiedy koło pociągu najedzie nad czujnik. Podwójne podłącza się do panelu CTI w celu wykrycia kierunku jazdy pociągu. Czujniki ustawia się od zewnętrznej strony szyny.

Q: Jak zbudować tablicę peronową?
A: Najpierw stawia się odpowiednio wysoki słup, na niego od boku ramę tablicy, na którą od przodu zawiesza się tablice z literami. Litery zmienia się klawiszami E, Shift + E, U lub Shift + U.

Q: Jak obsługiwać zegar peronowy?
A: Zegar nie wymaga dodatkowej obsługi do działania. Wskazuje czas w grze (na creative czas domyślnie nie płynie więc zegar wskazuje stałą godzinę). Podanie sygnału logicznego do zegara spowoduje jego podświetlenie.

Q: Jak używać czujnika Panelu CTI?
A: Panel CTI służy do wykrywania kierunku jazdy taboru. Dokładny opis działania i podłączenia znajduje się w opisie w ekwipunku. Do pełnego wykrywania potrzebny jest mod USRK, w którym znajduje się "detektor wyciągnięcia przycisku" służący do wyprowadzenia wyjścia drugiego kierunku (pierwszy jest sygnałem logicznym z urządzenia).

a81e02e7-a084-43a4-933d-09f64078770d.description:
This is a Mod with tools and parts for [b]vanilla logic.[/b]

It now comes with new parts like the [b]Quick Logic Gates[/b] that are not only [b]thousands of times faster[/b] than regular Logic Gates but also open a whole new world of possibilities.

[h1]Tools[/h1]
[hr][/hr]
[list]
[*][b]Connection Copy/Paste[/b]
Copy from: light pink logic gate (or button/switch/etc.)
Paste to: light orange logic gates (or buttons/switches/etc.)
Apply copy/paste: Press E on this block

[*][b]Parallel Connections[/b]
On/Off: Press E on this block
From: dark-grey (1st) & black (rest)
To: light-grey (1st) & white (rest)
Connect dark-grey to light-grey to make a parallel connection.

[*][b]Connection Maker (by Color)[/b]
From: [custom color 1]
To: [custom color 2]
Apply: Press E on this block
[/list]



[h2]The Quick Logic System[/h2]
[hr][/hr]
[list]
[*][b]Quick Logic Gates[/b]
Works just like a normal Logic Gate, but can be [b]much[/b] faster!
(Up to 8192x faster, any more is too risky performance wise)

[*][b]Quick Logic Controller[/b]
This is the brain of the operation that makes the Quick Logic System work.
Press E or Crouch + E to change Quick Logic speed.
(Only needed once in every world)

[*][b]Interface Block[/b]
With this block you make interfaces for more Special Blocks. The size and color of the interface are important for the different inputs and outputs of the Special Block. For now it will be used with the RAM Block.

[*][b]RAM Block[/b]
This is a Special Block so it needs Interface Blocks to work. It enables (almost) unlimited storage at full Quick Logic speed and takes only a few blocks to setup.
[/list]


[b]Converting old circuits to Quick Logic[/b]
I uploaded a python script to [url=https://github.com/HerrVincling/QuickGateConverter]Github[/url], which will convert all logic gates in a [i]blueprint.json[/i] file to Quick logic gates.

[b]Information about Quick Logic Gates:[/b]
These new Logic Gates will compute multiple steps ahead every in-game tick. Depending on the setting in the controller those steps can be as high as 8192 per tick. In contrast, a normal Logic Gate only does 1 step every tick (as we all know).

[b]Upcoming features: (not guaranteed, just ideas that I'm making and testing)[/b]
-Colored connections?? ;D
-Logic Gate Mode Changer
-Parallel Connection Copy/Paste (in Beta)
-Parallel Logic Merger (in Beta)
-Paint & Wire Memory (in Beta)
-Color Connection Remover (in Beta)
-Relative Color Connection Maker (in Beta)
-More Special Blocks (Display, IC, Sensor & more)

The Beta is experimental, but has frequent updates and lots of exciting new stuff!
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2608898394]BETA LINK[/url][/b]


If you encount any bugs or issues, or if you have any suggestions, feel free to leave a comment!
a81e02e7-a084-43a4-933d-09f64078770d.name: Vincling's Logic Tools & Parts Mod

5411dc77-fa28-4c61-af84-bcb1415e3476.description:
An AI Racing System that connects to any creation!

[h1]Introduction[/h1]
Have you ever wanted to race against your own creations but have no one to race with?
Now you can! With this racing system, you can make any creation race around any specially designed track!
With a relatively simple setup and no extra downloads needed, you can now race against as many ai cars as you want!

[b]WARNING:[/b] This is a Beta: things might wrong and may cause your game to lag or cars to malfunction. Please report any bugs.

[h1]Instructions[/h1]
[b]Track Setup:[/b][olist]
[*]Build or download SMAR compatible tracks (see video tutorial)
[*]Place Track tile in a world.
[*]Go to the start/finish line of the track and place down the Track Scanner. (cross hair/target should be facing the direction you want cars to go)
[*]Make Sure track is empty and Press 'E' on scanner
[*]Wait for scan to complete [moving outside of track walls recommended]. 
[*]If message, "Scan Complete: Track Saved"  inspect racing line, If something looks wrong or error displayed, feel free to notify me. (Moving the scanning block may fix some errors)[/olist]
Note: Once track is saved, it is saved to the current world permanently until overwritten. (This means you can delete block after scan completion) Cross world & scan sharing is coming soon

[b]Car Setup:[/b][olist]
[*] Place down any car  & disconnect all bearings from engine and seat
[*] Place SMAR Driver block on creation. ENSURE SIDE WITH STEERING WHEEL IS FACING FRONT OF THE CAR AND RIGHT SIDE UP (Arrow up) 
[*] Place SMAR Engine block on creation
[*] Connect SMAR engine and driver blocks to respective bearings on creation. Same as driver seat & engine connections
[*] Connect driver block to the engine block[/olist]

[b]Race Setup:[/b][olist]
[*] Place SMAR Race control anywhere in world
[*] Connect switch logic input to Race Control
[*] Turn switch on and racers will begin to Race![/olist]
Note: Interact With Race control interface to open a rough UI that allows you to view race status and change vario
5411dc77-fa28-4c61-af84-bcb1415e3476.name: SM Auto Racers

5081324a-c1a2-4fe9-a052-3f77d93a8b06.description:
This is a FileMod that enables the lift to be placed anywhere, for example on loose creations or even on itself.


How to Install :

Go into "[Your Steam Directory]/steamapps/workshop/content/387990/2583101867/Scripts"

Copy "Lift.lua"

Go into Steam, select Scrap Mechanic, right click and click "Browse Local Files".

In the Scrap Mechanic directory, go into "Data/Scripts/game/" and paste the Lift.lua there.

If it asks to replace the file, click "Yes".

10c7ba15-aab2-4184-ab51-8aa772e8c30e.description:
This FileMod adds one more gun to the survival inventory : The (handheld)Tape Gun!

Features : 

-Handheld gun can shoot tape or explosive tape, doing the same damage as the tapebot's tape
-Select which type of tape to shoot by pressing Q
-The gun can be obtained from the trader
-Tape Bots drop 1-4 "Tape Ammo",
-Red Tape Bots drop 1-4 "Explosive Ammo"
-When shooting tape, the gun uses "Tape Ammo" and when shooting explosivetape, the gun uses "Explosive Ammo"

How to Install :

1. Open the folder : "[Your Steam Folder] / steamapps / workshop / content / 387990 / 2583437357 / FileMod/"

One way to find this folder is :

-Open Steam and select Scrap Mechanic
-Right-click, click "manage" and click "Browse local files"
-Browse back to "steamapps/"
-Then open "workshop / content / 387990 / 2583437357 / FileMod/"


2. Copy the "Survival" folder

3. Go into Steam, select Scrap Mechanic, right click and click "Browse Local Files".

4.In the now opened folder, paste the "Survival" folder you copied earlier.

5. If it asks to replace files, click "Yes".
10c7ba15-aab2-4184-ab51-8aa772e8c30e.name: [Survival FileMod] Tape Gun

d9174505-8eac-45b3-827c-d6e1144b9699.description:
Feeling lucky?
Test your luck now with this block!

Simply place a Lucky Block, press E(Use) on it and see what happens!

Effects range from causing a nuclear size explosion all the way to spawning a bunch of Component Kits.

This mod is inspired by the Minecraft mod "Lucky Block" ( https://www.luckyblockmod.com/ ).

Disclaimer : I highly recommend making a world backup before using this mod!
I am NOT responsible if you lose your world because there was a bug and you didn't make a backup!

How to install : 

1. Subscribe to the mod.
-For creative mode this is enough, but I recommend you load it in survival to get all events. (some don't work in creative due to game restrictions)
-To get survival-only events you need to do these extra steps : 

2. Load a creative world, place a Lucky Block and press U(Upgrade) on it.
-Now a GUI should open, as seen in one of the preview images. It tells you in-game what to do to install the mod.


-The script does everything automatically after pressing the button, no need to copy or verify any files.

3. If the installation was successful, you can now load a Survival world.
-You can get Lucky Blocks in Survival either by cheating or crafting them in the craftbot.
-If the Block isn't available in Survival, re-start your game. If it's still missing, please leave a comment or report it in my Discord (below).

If a mod update is released, a chat message will appear once, informing you about the update.

If you want to remove the FileMod, press the "uninstall" button in the GUI.

Known Problems : 

-Loot drops don't work in creative mode. This is a restriction from the game and not a mod problem.

-The block's inventory icon might not appear sometimes in survival. I'm not sure why this happens.

Mod Version 0.8.2

NOTE - I am currently not updating the mod as I'm waiting for chapter 2 for more features.

Check the "Change Notes" tab at the top if you want to know what changed in an update.


Join the

[h1] [url=https://discord.gg/2eACct5FDm] Scrap Mechanic Maps Discord [/url] [/h1]
for current and future mod projects, bug reports, [b] Advanced Challenge Mode [/b] and more.
d9174505-8eac-45b3-827c-d6e1144b9699.name: Lucky Block Mod

6f2bdcca-109d-4511-9e4c-530604375647.description:
This mod adds a camera to the game that can be used to take images to analyse them :)
Note: Place the camera with the round end of the AND symbol facing upwards
[h1]SMPL API[/h1]
[code]
getCameras
	parameters: []
	description:
		returns all cameras connected to the computer

setResolution
	parameters: [camera, width, height]
	description:
		sets the resolution that the camera renders

setFov
	parameters: [camera, width, height]
	description:
		sets the fov of the camera

setMode
	parameters: [camera, mode]
	description:
		sets the mode of the camera
			Camera.DISTANCE
			Camera.COLOR
			Camera.TYPE

setCastsPerTick
	parameters: [camera, amount]
	description:
		sets how many raycasts a camera performs per tick

setRange
	parameters: [camera, range]
	description:
		sets the number of units the raycast goes

capture
	parameters: [camera]
	description:
		starts the capturing process

isCapturing
	parameters: [camera]
	description:
		returns if the camera is currently rendering

getData
	parameters: [camera, x, y]
	description:
		returns the data for a specific pixel. depending on the mode...
		DISTANCE -> Number
		TYPE -> String
		COLOR -> Tupel
			(
				r: Number,
				g: Number,
				b: Number
			)

		ALL -> Tuple
			(
				hit: Boolean,
				distance: Number,
				type: String,
				color: Tuple
					(
						r: Number,
						g: Number,
						b: Number
					)
			)
getResolution
	parameters: [camera]
	description:
		returns the resolution of the camera as a tuple (width, height)
[/code]
[h1]Example[/h1]
This is a simple example that uses the camera and the screen. This is what the program is doing (in general) 1. setting up the screen 2. setting up the camera 3. capturing an image 4. render the image to the screen
[code]
import Screen
import Camera
import Math

II.setClockSpeed(10000)

screen = Screen.getScreens()[0]
(screenWidth, screenHeight) = screen.getResolution()
screen.setSize(96, 54)
print('clearing screen')
screen.fillRect(0, 0, screenWidth, screenHeight, (0, 0, 0))

range = 100
camera = Camera.getCameras()[0]
ca
6f2bdcca-109d-4511-9e4c-530604375647.name: Camera Module

0687d041-98ec-49bc-a0b8-d363abf0dfe8.description:
With this mod, you can actually use the Encryptor and Protector in the Warehouse!
The Orange Encryptor controls the logic connections.
The Blue Protector controls building/destroying blocks and parts.
When you disable both, you can take and remove parts from the warehouse.

How to install this mod : 

1. Subscribe to it
2. Load a creative world with the mod enabled
3. Place down the "FileMod Loader" part and press E(Use) on it.
4. In the opened GUI, click "Install" to install the mod or "uninstall" to remove it.
5. If it installed successfully, you can now load a survival world and use the encryptors.

Note : If you want to unsubscribe from this mod, you need to "uninstall" it using the GUI or verify game files first. If you don't do this, part of your game will break as it can't find the file anymore.

Note 2 : I will remove this mod when Axolot makes the warehouses work properly.
0687d041-98ec-49bc-a0b8-d363abf0dfe8.name: Working Warehouse Encryptors

98214b3e-1c2e-467d-8525-4f9fd6cafcec.description:
[h1]  Not working with the 0.6.0 test version (for now) [/h1]



This mod makes the wires and bearings easier to see. It adds a dark contour on wires, bearings and connection points to make them more visible. 

Do you like the mod? Remember to vote!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/CGVIOUV.gif[/img]
You don't like the mod? Let us know us why and how we can improve it with a comment or a new discussion! Thanks.

[h1] HOW TO INSTALL: [/h1]
[list]
[*] Go to:
"...\Steam\SteamApps\workshop\content\387990\2623326387"
[*] Copy the Data folder into:
"...\Steam\SteamApps\common\Scrap Mechanic"
[*] Replace the exsiting files.
[/list]

[h1] HOW TO UNINSTALL: [/h1]
The easier way is to use the steam tool to "Verify integrity of game files".

If you want to restore the original files manually:
[list]
[*]Go to:
"...\Steam\SteamApps\workshop\content\387990\2623326387\Backup"
[*]Copy the Data folder into:
"...\Steam\SteamApps\common\Scrap Mechanic"
(replacing the exsisting files).
[/list]

[h1] HOW TO INSTALL SMALL BEARINGS [/h1]
After the normal installation:
[list]
[*]Go to:
"...\Steam\SteamApps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Data\Mesh"
[*]Rename the file "bearing_connect.mesh" to something else like "bearing_connect_standard.mesh"
[*]Rename the file "bearing_connect_small.mesh" to "bearing_connect.mesh"
[/list]

(if you don't see the ".mesh" at the end of the name, just ignore that part).

[h1] HOW TO MOD UNCONNECTED BEARINGS [/h1]
This feature is experimental, the unconnected bearing uses a "generic" texture that could be used by other things.
I could not find any broken texture with this mod applied, if you do please let me know!
[list]
[*]To install, copy transparent.tga from the folder:
"...\Steam\SteamApps\workshop\content\387990\2623326387\NotConnectedBearing"
[*]Paste it in:
"...\Steam\SteamApps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Data\Texture"
[/list]

Thanks for all the feedback and support.

#wire #connection #ConnectionTool #bearing #texture #QualityOfLife #logic #controller
98214b3e-1c2e-467d-8525-4f9fd6cafcec.name: Better wires

dba9af02-8f79-4cb2-ad07-d6b94c87d456.description:
Yes you heard right an Raft like adventure in Scrap Mechanic.

Update 0.1.0 Beta

this is a in Development version do not make me responsible if it breaks your game!

Version 0.1.0 Beta

Whats New?:
- I've Added two miners one for stone and metal the other one drills for oil.
- Removed unnecessary Files from the Mod and Fixed Block not Found and no Icons Error
- Islands have been Improved
- The Start is now much more Familiar and Easier

Whats Next?:
- Eventually new Game Mechanics for Farming also Changing Hideout Recipes

DISCLAIMER: THIS MOD MAY BREAK YOUR WORLD IF YOU PLAY WITH IT ON A WORLD THAT WAS CREATED WITHOUT THE MOD BEING INSTALLED!!!


How to Install:

1. Subscribe to the mod and wait for it to download.
2.Go to your Steam library and right-click Scrap Mechanic. Click "Manage" -> "Browse Local Files"
3.This should open the folder: Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic
4.Move two folders upward to the folder: Steam\steamapps
5.Then navigate to "workshop" -> "content" -> "387990" -> "2650760178"
6.Open the "Copy to install Raft Mod" folder and copy the "Survival" & "Data" folders.
7.Repeat step 2
8.Paste two folders in the Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic folder. You'll need to 9.click replace files in destination when prompted.
10. You're done! Now go and Have fun, alone or with your friends!

Credit:
parts of the following mods were used:

- https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1406581885 Buoyancy Mod

- Also thanks to Dr Pixel Plays for working with me on this Mod and having the Idea for it.Mod and having the Idea for it.
dba9af02-8f79-4cb2-ad07-d6b94c87d456.name: The Raft Mod

This mod includes the following from the FPS game called DOOM Eternal:
-[b]Boost Pads[/b] which throw the player into the air
-[b]Monkey Bars[/b] which the player can boost themselves off of to gain height
-[b]Climbable Walls[/b] which the player can also boost themselves off of
-[b]Projectile/Melee Buttons[/b] that activate after being shot/melee'd, and deactivate after a short while
-[b]Player Teleporters[/b] that teleport the player to a given spot once they have entered an area around the part

4f8331b6-deb3-4bd2-b91b-f2a4a685a997.description:
This is the fixed version of the Take Flight Mod by sKITZo and SometimesitnotMinecraft
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1408131301

The mod uses the same UUIDs and items as the original "Take Flight" Mod.

In this version the turbine thrusters are fixed and I have reworked the textures so that they fit better to the Wings mod.

Usage: 
Uninstall the original "Take Flight" Mod and install this version. Do not use both versions at the same time!!!

CHANGES:

- All Engines and Thruster works again
- All Thruster textures revised 
- A colorable small rotor blade added
- Added a Nose Cone Electric Motor Large. 
- Some Description changes


- Jumbo Jet style passenger windows with built in switch for attaching to seats to open/close blinds.
- Propellers with built in thrusters.(2 different sizes)
- Nose cone with built in motor to adjust the spin rate.(2 different sizes)
if wanting to attach to wings sub the "fun and gun" mod and use the wing blank from there to stick to
- Jet Turbines for both inwing and under wing
(fit perfectly with the "wings" mod)

- Wooden propeller blades have the same output each as 1 vanilla thruster. (light aircraft)
- Carbon propeller blades each have double the output as 1 vanilla thruster. (heavier bigger builds)
- Colorable propeller blades each have double the output as 1 vanilla thruster. (heavier bigger builds)
- Inline wing turbine has slightly increased power
- Under wing turbine is increased further.
4f8331b6-deb3-4bd2-b91b-f2a4a685a997.name: Take Flight 2.0

[h1]InfiniTrack Blocks & Parts Mod[/h1]

Mod Version: 1.0.0
For Scrap Mechanic Version: 0.5.1

Pimp yo ride! Blocks & parts to create racing vehicles with that are both practical and decorative. They are playtested/designed with care and fit the overall look of Scrap Mechanic. All assets are made from scratch.

[h1]Current Content:[/h1]
- Interior Mirror
- Exterior Mirror
- Windshield
- Wheels of different grip/appearance
- Functioning Car Door Handle
- Modular chrome exhaust pipes 
- Chrome vanilla pipes

[h1]Future Content:[/h1]
- More shape/size variations for mirrors, windshields, spoilers, wheels...
- Headlamps
- Functioning seats with vehicle steering wheel
- More powerful, realistically sized engines
- Custom racing suspension
- Panels/Slabs
- More Spoilers
- Mudguards
- Interior parts
- Custom shapesets to create hoods or similar with
- Various metal blocks with appropriate material properties (Painted Metal, Aluminum, Titanium...)

If you have any suggestions or feedback let me know! Thanks for checking in.

[h1]Links[/h1]
[*] Rally Car 'Tigershark' [InfiniTrack] https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2685127391
fe0139ad-c6ee-40d8-ae6a-84cbbc610045.name: InfiniTrack Parts

d9e6682a-1885-44b2-9cda-11bf5fec9dac.description:
[h1] NORMAL VERSION [/h1]
This mod adds a spudgun that you can adjust in various ways.
[b]Just interact with the gun and begin tuning it however you'd like[/b]!

You can also create templates out of the guns! [b]Just press U on the gun you want to make a template of, press E on another gun and click the template button[/b]! You can also switch templates by connecting another logic input. It will inherit the template gun's stats and everything! You can have multiple templates.


[h1] HANDHELD VERSION [/h1]
I also made a handheld version! [b]Press 'R' to open the tuning menu![/b] Sadly, [b]you can't make templates of it, but you can use templates created by normal adjustable guns![/b]


[h1] ADJUSTABLE SETTINGS [/h1]
-Projectile type
-Projectile damage
-Projectile velocity
-How many times the projectile gets shot
-Spread(unique to each projectile if more than one gets shot)
-Reload time(ticks)
-Whether it shoots continuously or not


[h1] PROJECTILE TYPES [/h1]
-Potato
-Small Potato(gatling gun projectiles)
-Fries
-Tape
-Explosive Tape
-Water
-Pesticide
-Glowstick
d9e6682a-1885-44b2-9cda-11bf5fec9dac.name: Adjustable Mountable Spudgun

7533d0bd-1e25-407c-b62a-4cd4f84d26d4.description:
This mod contains some random, custom logic pieces I made.

It currently has:

- Random Signal Generator
  Generates a random on/off signal every X ticks.
  The default delay is 10 ticks, but it can be changed using number logic.

- Alert Block
  Set a text and if it gets a logic signal, the text will display.

- Number Lock
  You can set a 5-digit number code, if the code is correctly entered a second
  time, the lock outputs a 1-tick logic signal.

- Bearing Switcher
  Set an angle, speed and force. When you apply a logic signal, a
  connected bearing will rotate by the set angle, with the set speed and force.

- Reverse W/S converter
  Connect 2 logic gates (black and white) into the part and the part into an engine.
  If the white input is on, the engine spins one way. If the black input is on, the engine
  spins the other way.
7533d0bd-1e25-407c-b62a-4cd4f84d26d4.name: Custom Logic Mod

This Mod adds functional LED Matrix Displays to your game. These are mainly made for Passenger Information Displays (PIS) on trains, busses and trams. But you can use them for anything you want. You can controll them with [u]Modpack Logic[/u] or by hand.

● [Box] A-Z
● [Box] 0-9
● Box) A-Z
● Box) 0-9
● S1-S9
● U1-U9
● M1-M9
● Thin 0-9
● Abbreviations
● Punctuations
● Other Symbols

[b] Known Bugs:[/b]
none

bfba23b2-b9e9-475a-8c5f-86c4a87bca6d.description:
(Possibly) [h1]The best compatibility patch ever made in the history of mankind.[/h1]

This compatibility patch combines the features from:
• CraftBot+
• 00Fant Modpack
• The Modpack
• Ranger's Tools
• Forestry

ALL IN SURVIVAL MODE WITH RECIPES!


----------------------------------!IMPORTANT!----------------------------------------------
--                              !!THIS IS A PATCH AND CONTAINS NO MOD DATA!!                               --
-- !!YOU ARE REQUIRED TO HAVE THE MODS INSTALLED FOR THIS PATCH TO WORK!! --
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

>>Follow the instructions provided in the mod folder.<<

>>Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2781132962<<

---------------------------Changes---------------------------

1.0 LAUNCH - 3/18/22

--Global--

Organized all of the crafting list. (Fk me it took forever, no I'm not organizing the creative menu, don't ask.)
Added some and removed some recipes.
Crafting bot now scales with upgrades. (speed L1=1x> L2=1.5x> L3=2x> L4=3x> L5=4x)
Removed the cheese. (For obvious reasons.)

--CraftBot+--

Removed recycle bot because of redundancy with Fant.
Removed Anyseed and Anyglass as they break recycling in Fant.
Moved some recipes to consumable.

--Fant Mod--

Removed the super speed crafting on everything not Fant related. (And some that are Fant related.)
Removed Popcorn landmine function. (This makes the popcorn launcher more of a confetti cannon.)
Removed Round Wheel water functions. (so they can just be put in with the other Wheels.)
Some other small changes with unknown consequences (report bugs as you find them in the discussion, comment reports will be ignored.)

--Survival Player Forestry and Farming Mod--

Harder raids have been migrated with Fant. (i.e. Fant raid controller > SPFAFM raid controller)
Right clicking on beehives and corn will yield seeds as other crops do. (Fant integration)

--Rangers tools--

Remote explosives removed pending optimizations.
Removed Tool controller cos I don't

d2ba79ae-5f4b-4df1-aabd-2a2b47a923cd.description:
Vanilla pistons don't work with the smart engine (from the modpack), and the 256 block piston... well, it makes trouble to say the least.

So I (shamelessly) took the code from the 256 block piston and made a few copies that don't have as much power (which, from what I know is the troublemaker)
Also, long pistons (like the 256 block one) get weaker (?) when they are retracted and also freak out (I think it's just ghosts that live in the Scrap Mechanic physics engine) So when possible, use the shortest piston that you need.

Includes:
- 8 block piston
- 16 block piston
- 64 block piston
- 256 block piston

CREDIT FOR THE PISTON CODE:
The Modpack Continuation

Disclaimer:
Only English and Russian is supported for now, but I'll add the other languages later on (using google translate, so it may not be exact)
d2ba79ae-5f4b-4df1-aabd-2a2b47a923cd.name: Controlable pistons (for The Modpack)

eff60859-4809-42dd-83bf-6af7e7159edb.description:
[h2]This mod makes the spud gun the most overpowered item in Scrap Mechanic.[/h2]

This mod is partially inspired by the OP Tools mod, created by Questionable Mark.

[h3]How to use:[/h3]
[olist]
[*]Place a "Spud Gun Tools Activator." As a shortcut, you can find this part by searching "sgt" in the inventory.
[*]Shoot any spud gun while crouching to open the Spud Gun Tools GUI.
[*]Click the text on the left to select which mode you want to use. A yellow pointer will show which mode is selected. Use the buttons on the right to configure further.
[*]Shoot to use the selected mode.
[/olist]

[h3]Descriptions of all modes:[/h3]
[list]
[*][b]Basic Gun[/b] - It's a gun. Select what projectile to shoot.
[*][b]Super Gatling Gun[/b] - It shoots 40 times per second! It toggles, so shoot once to start it, and once to stop it.
[*][b]Explosion Spawner[/b] - Click to spawn an explosion at the point you are looking at. It can spawn explosions the size of small or large explosive canisters.
[*][b]Deleter[/b] - Click while looking at a creation. It can delete a single shape, a body, or the entire creation.
[*][b]Teleporter[/b] - Click to teleport to the point you are looking at.
[*][b]Unit Killer[/b] - Click on a unit to kill it.
[*][b]Unit Spawner[/b] - Click somewhere to spawn the selected unit.
[*][b]Pusher[/b] - Push a creation or character with a specified magnitude.
[/list]

I have recently added a [i]"Mounted Spud Gun Tools"[/i] part, which allows all the functions of Spud Gun Tools to be used by a mounted spud gun.

Have fun!
eff60859-4809-42dd-83bf-6af7e7159edb.name: Spud Gun Tools

e5e95c4f-99df-4a70-8e43-4882a22b844c.description:
This mod replaces the Scrap Mechanic radio, with the radio from Raft.

TO INSTALL:
navigate to Steam \ steamapps \ workshop \ content \ 387990 \ WILL PUT REAL FOLDER SOON

unzip Master Bank.rar

copy Master Bank.bank to Steam \ steamapps \ common \ Scrap Mechanic \ Data \ Audio \ Banks

From there, simply replace the existing Master Bank.bank file with the new one. (Also, make sure to create a backup of your original Master Bank.bank, just in case.)

TO UNINSTALL:
Either:
Verify integridy of the game files
OR
Remember that backup you definitely made of the original Master Bank.bank file? Simply replace it again with a copy of that one.

Does this work with multiplayer?

Yes, probably. I haven't tested it yet, but if both players install it the same way, it should work. I'll get back to this, once I try it with a friend.

e85898e3-9a35-422e-af89-afbe7400068c.description:
If you like OUR work and would like to see more please leave a like and favorite.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]
How to use:
In "...\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990" search "2786751439" in the search bar once there click on the folder "SMserversoftware" and the exe is located there feel free to move the folder to the desktop or make a shortcut to it. Right-click on Scrap Mechanic click properties go to "Launch options" and paste "-open "C:\Users\ (your windows name here) \AppData\Roaming\Axolot Games\Scrap Mechanic\User\User_ (your user number here) \Save\Server.db" into it. Then make a world named "Server" run the exe file and the server is now set up.
If you have bugsplat installed in your Scrap Mechanic remove the bugsplat.exe as it will mess with this software.
[hr][/hr]
[*]Q1: Is this a virus and am I safe to use it?
[*]A1: The software is 100% safe and has no malicious software.
[hr][/hr]
[*]Q2: Is it open source?
[*]A2: I have plans to make the code open source for anybody.
[hr][/hr]
[*]Q3: Does it come with any software for preventing players from clearing my worlds?
[*]A3: It does not and will not have any protections from clears as it is just an SM Server hosting software.
[hr][/hr]
[*]Q4: Is there an instructional video to help me set this up?
[*]A4: Currently no but I have plans to make one in the future.

how to install from steam:

2. Open steam library

30f35d65-684b-45ae-9c62-4bf57325403b.description:
[h1][b]Info On Joining Our Servers At The Bottom[/b][/h1]


[h1]This Mod Adds Fun Multiplayer Parts and Server Management![/h1]
[h2]Features[/h2]
[list]
    [*][b]Ban and kicks[/b]
    [*][b]Creation Protector[/b]
    [*][b]Fly tool, aka Sunsahke[/b]
    [*][b]Dressbot & Bed from Survival[/b]
    [*][b]WASD eninge and new wheels[/b]
    [*][b]Secure Switches & Seats[/b]
    [*][b]Signs & Speakers[/b]
[/list]
Manage your multiplayer world! Kick or ban badly behaving players! Really useful if you have annoying friends or are a streamer/YouTuber. Or enhance your multiplayer experience with new parts! Build amazing vehicles with the WASD engine!

[h2] Full Feature List[/h2]
[olist]
    [*] [h3]Ban & Kicks[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]Only the host can use "Big Brother"
    [*]Kicks and bans are achieved by crashing people's game
    [*]Will activate a day/night cycle
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]Creation Protector[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]Place it on a creation to protect it from being accidentally destroyed
    [*]Claim ownership of a protector to prevent griefing by other players
    [*]Protected creations can still be interacted with. /restrictions will make protectors useless 
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]Sunshake[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]Use it to fly!
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]Dressbot & Bed[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]Change your looks without going to the main menu!
    [*]Use the bed to set and teleport to spawn point!
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]WASD Engine & Sci-Fi Wheels[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]WASD engine will apply thrust in these directions
    [*]Configure advanced settings with the 'Upgrade' button
    [*]Sci-Fi Wheels allow for low-friction cars. Connect to a seat.
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]Secure Switches & Seats[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]Claim seats and switches to prevent other players form using them
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]Signs[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]Enter text to display it in your world
    [*]Can be triggered by logic
    [*]Paint the sign to change its text color
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]Loudspeaker[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]Broadcasts your message to players in a radius
    [*]Must be triggered by logic
	[/list]
    [*] [h3]Posters[/h3]
	[list]
    [*]Adam
    [*]Karl
	[/list]
[/olist]

[h1][b]Join Scrap Mechanic Servers![/b][/h1]
This mod was developed for the Scrap Mechanic Servers project. The goal is to create public servers for free for the community. Learn more about the project and how to join our public Servers on [url=https://discord.com/invite/ks7BJ934wN]our Discord[/url] or Steam groups:
[list]
    [*][b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/sm-server-adam]Adam [Australia][/url][/b]
    [*][b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/sm-server-karl]Karl [Germany][/url][/b]
[/list]
