bc9df291-debe-41e8-9512-054ca3e83315.description:
This mod adds four "Canvas Builder" parts.
Each one, when placed down and activated, builds one quarter of the entire r/place canvas.

Note - This mod does NOT download the "live" canvas, it uses a pre-generated version of it.
The current canvas that the mod contains was created on April 4, 2022, 11:30AM.

How to Use:
I [b]highly[/b] recommend only loading one part at a time, the game cannot handle the entire canvas at once.

1. Set your graphics settings as low as possible. Make sure you turn shadows off.
    Also, turn the physics setting all the way down.

2. Create a new, empty flat world and make sure there is at least 2000 x 2000 blocks of free
    space around you.

3. Place the first "Canvas Builder" around 2-4 blocks off the ground (build a pole to place it on)

4. Enable it to build the canvas. The building process can cause severe lag and may take long!

5. To build the remaining quarters, place the second/third/fourth "Canvas Builder" in the [b]exact same spot[/b](!) at the first one and enable it.

[b]!!!WARNING!!![/b]

The canvas blueprint is EXTREMELY LARGE, as you can see by the mod's file size.

Building the canvas may take a very long time and/or cause severe lag.

The game can NOT handle the entire canvas at once! If you build the whole canvas, the game WILL CRASH when you look at it!

I am NOT responsible if you corrupt your save file with this!

5a081817-b141-4439-987f-a25162d125fd.description:
ScrapVM - Finally makes it possible to run any lua string as code!

Send dynamic payloads from client -> server and vice-versa!
Make a lua executor entirely from within the game!
There are so many new possibilities, please show off your mods that make use of this!

How to use:
---
dofile '$CONTENT_5a081817-b141-4439-987f-a25162d125fd/Scripts/scrapvm.lua'
Main = class(nil)

function Main.server_onCreate(self)
    if (_G.sm.luavm) then
        print(_G.sm.luavm.loadstring([[
            print("Hello World!")
        ]])())
    end
end
---

Credits:
Prime - dev support with making scrap mechanic mods!


Post any bugs / suggestions in comments below :)
If you do post a bug, please post some way to reproduce it
5a081817-b141-4439-987f-a25162d125fd.name: ScrapVM

Changes the radio music to tracks from Metal Gear Rising: REVENGEANCE.

Rules of Nature
I'm My Own Master Now
A Stranger I Remain
The Stains of Time
The Only Thing I Know For Real
It Has to Be This Way

Sadly I couldn't include Collective Consciousness because of limitations.


[h1]Installation:[/h1]
1. Right click on Scrap Mechanic in your Steam library, then click on Properties. Click on the 'Local Files' tab on the left, then click on 'Browse'.
2. Open a new File Explorer window with the same path as the game files.
3. Click on the 'steamapps' folder in the path
4. Go to 'steamapps/workshop/content/387990'
5. Sort by latest and click on the first folder
6. Copy the 'Data' folder and paste it into the game files

Changelog \/ \/ \/
NEW INTERCITY SEAT MODEL!

Ever noticed how the intercity seat never touched the ground, Or how the intercity seat looked a little too thin?
Well now you can say goodbye to all of those problems! As i have a new intercity 3d model! bus sadly, together with that, I am scrapping the idea of a coach seat... Meaning that all of the coach seats will now be intercity seats (Without the table)

NOTE! For those of you who used the old seats (or the coach seats) you build will still be able to load your builds as the uuid is still the same!





Welcome to the NEW bus seats and fabrics mod!

Ever since the bus seats and fabrics mod glitched out and duplicated itself (along with other glitches) I've had the idea of a new bus seats and fabrics mod on my mind...

and now i'm proud to announce the release of the NEW bus seats and fabrics mod!
Hope you enjoy :)

3f6352ae-9022-4f5f-a689-bcfeabbb6179.description:
[h1] This mod update the stack size of many items. [/h1]

[i] I'm a newby at making mods, remarks and comments are welcome for any mod improvements or updates  [/i]

[h2] Summary: [/h2]
1 - How to install this mod
2 - How to uninstall this mod
3 - List of changes

------------------------------------------

[h2] 1 - HOW TO INSTALL THIS MOD [/h2]
  The only way for now to use a mod in scrap-mechanic, is to override manually the files of the game.
  (Keep in mind that you will be able to easily restore the original game files if you want with steam)

 [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZbfB5nJ_BaM] VIDEO (not mine) [/url]

  MANUAL STEPS :

    - Subscribe to this mod page (this will download the content)
    - Go to your game library
    - right click on scrap mechanic => "property" => "local files" => "browse ..."
    (keep this page open and do next steps)

    - open the explorer and navigate to : 
    "this pc" => OS (C:) => "Programmes (x86)" => "Steam" => "steamapps" => "workshop" => "content" => "387990" => folder with numbers => "OVERWRITE"
    
     - Copy "Data" and "Survival" folders (select and CTRL+C  or select => right click => "copy")
     - Paste both folders inside the other file explorer and click "replace files in destination"

------------------------------------------

[h2] 2 - HOW TO UNINSTALL THIS MOD [/h2]
    
  From your steam library: 
    - right click on scrap mechanic
    - click "property" => "local files" => "verify integrity of game files"

  2nd solution:
    you can follow the exact same steps that installation but instead clicking "OVERWRITE" folder, click "main" folder

------------------------------------------

[h2] 3 - LIST OF CHANGES [/h2]
here is the [b]nearly[/b] complete list of stack size changes

- Empty bucket : 1 => 5
- All blocks : 256=> 512
- All pipes : 10 => 30
- Industrial beams : 1 => 30
 
- Water / Oil / chemical liquids : 20 => 100 
- Potatoes : 50 => 200
- Fruits / vegetables : 10 => 50
- Seeds : 20 => 200
- SoilBag : 5 => 10
- potted plants: 1 => 5

- Ember : 10 => 50
- Beewax : 10 => 50
- Slimyclam : 10 => 50
- Cotton :  20 => 100
- Corn : 10 => 50
- Circuitboard : 20 => 50
- Steak : 10 => 50
- Glowpoop: 10 => 50
- Flower : 20 => 100
- Glue : 10 => 50

- some builing + decor object : 1 => 20
- Warehouse key card : 1 => 5

- Warehouse beams and ramps : 1 => 10
- generated shops scrap-walls : 1 => 5
- generated shops scrap-roofs : 1 => 5
- generated shops sign, light and posters : 1 => 5
3f6352ae-9022-4f5f-a689-bcfeabbb6179.name: BetterStack

Now it is over :D

Yes it works on Survival

Instructions:
1. Go To This Mod File
-> Steam/steamapps/workshop/content/387990/

2. Go To The "alwaysDay" Folder
-> 387990/2810958892/Scripts/alwaysNight

3. Copy The "SurvivalGame.lua" data
-> Right click
-> Copy
or
->Left click
-> Strg + C

4. Paste It Into The Game File
-> Steam/steamapps/common/Scrap Mechanic/Survival/Scripts/game

-> Right click
-> Paste
or
->Strg + V

5. Create A New World And Enjoy The Neverending Night
-> :D

If you messed something up, there is a Backup File.
-> Steam/steamapps/workshop/content/387990/2810958892/Scripts/Backup (Original)
231aac04-f88d-404f-a3ba-163d5e33708c.name: Always Night

773e9c26-9e63-4c97-b489-383dca672fd6.description:
[h1] Enhanced Vanilla [/h1]

Ce mod a pour but d'améliorer les fonctionnalités déjà présentes en jeu, d'en ajouter quelques unes correspondant au gameplay vanilla, et en général de rééquilibrer le gameplay.

[b][u]Instructions:[/u][/b]
    Rappelez-vous toujours que tous les changements que vous faites dans le jeu sont annulés s'il y a une mise à jour, vous devrez alors réinstaller le mod.
    Pour cela :

    Trouver le répertoire Scrap Mechanic :
	[olist]
        Sur Steam : 
         [*] Ouvrez les propriétés du jeu en faisant un clic droit sur celui-ci dans le panneau gauche de votre bibliothèque de jeux.
         [*] Allez dans les fichiers locaux
         [*] Cliquez sur Parcourir
         [*]Le répertoire doit être ouvert dans l'explorateur de fichiers.

	Dans l'explorateur de fichiers :
	 [*] Cliquez sur le dossier 'Survival'.

    Copiez le contenu du mod dans le dossier :
	 [*] Allez dans le dossier steam : 'Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990' (habituellement dans 'YOURDRIVE:\\Program Files (x86)')
	 [*] Trouvez le mod (vous pouvez également trier par dernière modification pour trouver plus facilement).
	 [*] Copiez le contenu du mod dans votre dossier 'Survival'.
	[/olist]

	Et voilà !

[b][u]Contenu du mod:[/u][/b][list]
	
[*] https://docs.google.com/document/d/19ygi7jJxG2BzfYlTsyuTWPBI_i8H233jENha6GE9xoI/edit?usp=sharing
[/list]

N'hésitez pas à donner votre avis sur le Discord: https://discord.gg/JKjdKKP

Arrière-plan de la miniature réalisé par Dalv.
773e9c26-9e63-4c97-b489-383dca672fd6.name: Enhanced vanilla

eea756fc-f802-43a2-a714-9169fb9d2c6a.description:
[For people that don't understand polish]
It's a translation for Raft Mechanic to polish language.

[Dla osób mówiących po polsku]
Własne tłumaczenie moda Raft Mechanic na język polski. Z naprawą kilku błędów i dodaniem kilku brakujących tekstów.

Niektóre z tłumaczeń były nielogiczne lub po prostu ich nie było, więc zrobiłem własne. Wiem, pomysł może średni, ale kłuło mnie w oczy poprzednie tłumaczenie.

Jak pobrać (film):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r_U9-J7PxnY

Jak pobrać krok po kroku:
0. Wyłącz Scrap Mechanic.
1. Po zasubskrybowaniu modyfikacji udaj się na dysk, gdzie masz zainstalowanego steama.
2. wejdź do "Dysk:\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2823247014" (W środku powinien znajdować się folder o nazwie "Polish")
3. skopiuj cały folder "Polish"
4. Przejdź do folderu "Dysk:\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2807590049\Gui\Language"
5. Podmień aktualny folder "Polish" wklejając poprzednio skopiowany folder o tej samej nazwie.

Język powinien być podmieniony.

Jeśli masz jakieś zastrzeżenia lub problemy z tłumaczeniem, napisz je w komentarzu.
eea756fc-f802-43a2-a714-9169fb9d2c6a.name: Raft Mechanic Polish Lang

Rudder

Paddle Wheel

85f7a979-1654-4c85-8f83-5275f4890825.description:
The mod you would need for quick flight control, remotely.
Guaranteed Flight Mode for Players when this item is used.

[h1]Item Features[/h1]
[b]Flight Controller (Recap from Thumbnail):[/b]
Left Click: Hovering - Players in Flying Mode
Right Click: Grounded - Players in Land Mode

Note: What's not recapped from Thumbnail is the Booster feature. Just left click again and hold to speed up and nocclips you forward.

[b]Alternative Booster:[/b]
Left Click:
> While Flying noclips you forward.
> While Grounded increases speed Multiplier.
Right Click:
> While Flying noclips you backward.
> While Grounded decreases speed Multiplier.

[b]Recenter:[/b]
A click always returns you to x = 0, y = 0, z = 0.

Note: In case if you get thrown into the void for a weird reason.

[b]Custom Teleporter:[/b]
Right Click to set your position first.
Left click after to teleport back to that said position.

Note: Yeah... Creators can get super creative. It'll be a gift for them.
85f7a979-1654-4c85-8f83-5275f4890825.name: Flight Tool

d73a856b-c085-4147-b06e-485d4810acd4.description:
This mod is a texture pack that replaces the male and female faces with the classic Mechanic faces from before the survival update.

This is a model swap of Male face Number 1

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
HOW TO INSTALL
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1. Go to : ...\Steam\SteamApps\workshop\content\387990\2830258909


2. Open up the folder "TEXTURE PACK"


3. Copy the "Survival" folder 


4. Find where your Scrap Mechanic is installed in, Typically its installed in "...\Steam\SteamApps\common\Scrap Mechanic"


5. Paste the "Survival" folder you copied earlier into the "Scrap mechanic" folder, replace files when asked, and then the texture pack should be installed.



ENJOY CLASSIC MECHANIC


*Ignore the Effects, Gui, Objects, and Particles folders

6fa94e82-bb42-4f13-a761-e612d9479568.description:
[b]This is a mod for general scripted mod parts used in Bunic builds, feel free to use any parts in your builds, but please let us know of any bugs![/b]

[u]This mod currently contains:[/u]
-Particle Maker; this part creates a selected particle a selected offset in the direction of the arrow
-Screen Shaker; this part shakes the screen at a selected intensity
-Player Join Indicator; this part gives out a short pulse when a player joins the world (this is useful if something needs to be reset every time a new player joins)
-Player Teleporter; this part teleports players within a select zone to a select location
-Player Presence Sensor; this part gives an output when a select number of players is in a select zone
-Animator; used for translating motion capture data into animations for in-game figures
-Screen Fader; fades the screen to or from black at set speed
-Cutscene Creator; used to create and play simple cutscenes
-Forced Player Teleporter; teleports players in aselect zone to a set position, but can force players out of seats

[h2]Parts were not designed with user friendliness in mind since they were created for one purpose only, sorry if some parts are hard to use.[/h2]
6fa94e82-bb42-4f13-a761-e612d9479568.name: Scripted Bunic Parts

d57c046b-e226-443c-9a34-d5b0e3c299c7.description:
EN:
Overhauled crafting recipes that I made for myself, but I hope you'll like them too. The ingredients (as well as the crafting time) are chosen to better match the appearance of the part, its weight and strength.
This version adds almost no crafting of new blocks, except for plastic, which is now used in many recipes instead of glue or metal.

This mod must be installed manually, but don't worry, it's very simple:
1. Click "Subscribe". The mod will be uploaded to this folder: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2641709150" ( if you haven't changed the Steam or game directory).
2. Following this path, you will see the folder "Survival", and in it "CraftingRecipes". This is the folder with new recipes.
3. Copy it and go here: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Survival".
There is also a "CraftingRecipes" folder here. Rename it, for example, to "CraftingRecipes-" and paste the copied one. Done.
(Uninstall) Just delete the new CraftingRecipes folder and rename the old one back.

More detailed information in the file "readme.txt", which you will find here: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2641709150" when you subscribe to the mod.

Other versions of this mod:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2641711251] Realistic Recipes - Extended[/url];

82ab72c4-714d-4651-9658-804d174de0b5.description:
EN:
Overhauled crafting recipes that I made for myself, but I hope you'll like them too. The ingredients (as well as the crafting time) are chosen to better match the appearance of the part, its weight and strength. Plastic is used in many recipes instead of glue or metal.
This version adds crafting of most blocks and interactive parts, as well as a few of the most necessary or just cool elements. Their list may change over time.

This mod must be installed manually, but don't worry, it's very simple:
1. Click "Subscribe". The mod will be uploaded to this folder: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2641711251" ( if you haven't changed the Steam or game directory).
2. Following this path, you will see the folder "Survival", and in it "CraftingRecipes". This is the folder with new recipes.
3. Copy it and go here: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Survival".
There is also a "CraftingRecipes" folder here. Rename it, for example, to "CraftingRecipes-" and paste the copied one. Done.
(Uninstall) Just delete the new CraftingRecipes folder and rename the old one back.

More detailed information in the file "readme.txt", which you will find here: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2641711251" when you subscribe to the mod.

Other versions of this mod:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2641709150] Realistic Recipes - Basic[/url];
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2641711625] Realistic Recipes - Full[/url]. Not finished yet.

- copy the Master Bank.bank file

Next, we go back to the navel where you have Steam installed.
...\Steam\steamapps\common\ScrapMechanic\Data\Audio\Banks
and paste the previously copied file
  Done, if you did everything right, then you will have background music in the Horror challenge.

Далее заходим  опять в пупку где установлен  у вас Steam.

и вставьте ранее скопированный файл
 Готово, если сделали всё правильно, то у вас будет, воспроизведится фоновая музыка в челендже "Horror".

6adc7c70-de63-4f47-afbf-018220f548d4.description:
Advanced Challenge/Creative Mode (ACM) v2, Mod version is V2_0.8.2.

This game mode offers lots of features for building Advanced Challenge Maps.
[b]However, that's not the only point of the mod!
It also serves as a better Creative Mode![/b]

[b]Some examples of the features in this mod:[/b]

[h2]Custom Mod API[/h2]
This mod provides custom mod API that allows blocks&parts mods to interface with the
game, control the map state, fire laser beams and more!
[b]The documentation for this API is available at: https://scrapmechanictools.com/modapis/ACM/info[/b]
More features will be added over time.

[h2]Lots of Settings[/h2]
The mod also provides a completely custom settings menu, which allows you to adjust
lots of parameters about the game - physics, multiplayer, health, etc.!
You don't want a health bar? Disable it in the health settings.
You want to play on different terrain? Change it in the terrain selector!
You want to jump higher? Decrease the player gravity in the physics settings.
You want tapebots to do less damage? Just reduce it in the projectile settings.
Or maybe you want to disable nametags and limit the amount of players in the world? There's settings for that as well.

[h2]All Vanilla Parts[/h2]
In this game mode, you can build with all parts from all the vanilla game modes!
Challenge Mode parts, Survival parts (including spaceship and warehouse parts) and Creative parts.

[h2]Custom Parts & Tools[/h2]
There are also lots of completely custom parts and tools (some very unique),
some of which introduce completely new game mechanics!
Do you like shotguns? There's a gatling shotgun, because why not!
Making lots of logic connections? Use the Advanced Connect Tool to quickly connect lots of logic.
Want to teleport? Use the Magic Wand!

You want to add a bonus feature to your map? Place some hidden ducks and let the player find them.
You want to create a (simple) cutscene? Use the Cutscene Maker!
Making sure that the player stays within an area? Use the Kill Box!
Sensing units/characters/creations in an are
6adc7c70-de63-4f47-afbf-018220f548d4.name: Advanced Challenge/Creative Mode

8661aaa9-741b-4422-ad5e-4764cf2e1b18.description:
[h1]Description[/h1]
Here Is Scrap Experimental 2.0! It's Back and better than ever!

This survival mod adds a bunch of, [i]interesting[/i] parts.
Ranging from thrusters that work on potato's,
Propellors to enter the skies,
and chests that have more storage than you can ever dream of.


[h1]Info[/h1]
The mod is currently getting ported to the new 0.6.0 modding api update.

All of the new items are available via the craftbot.
(not all of the original items are added yet but will be over time.)


[h1]Updates[/h1]
- V2.0 - Update 2 -
[list]
[*]Added an alternative Gas recipe
[*]Changed the battery recipe to no longer require glow

[*]Added Mechanical Bouy, A part which lets you change your vehicles bouyancy with the flick of a switch
[*]Added Mines, A part which lets you to remotely detonate it!
[*]Added Recoil Booster, A New utility item to get yourself to places faster!
[olist]
[*]Shoot to propel yourself!
[*]AIm to hover
[/olist]
[/list]

- V2.0 - Update 1 -

Ported the following:
[list]
[*]Spud Thruster.
[*]Megastorage Chest.
[*]Propellor.
[*]B.O.B. MK1.
[*]Spud Accelerator.

[*]Updated the Spud Accelerator with better controls
Whilst shooting there are 2 modes to use.
[olist]
[*]Without aiming: Spud Rifle.
[*]Whilst aiming: Subsonic Minigun.
[/olist]
[/list]
8661aaa9-741b-4422-ad5e-4764cf2e1b18.name: Scrap Experimental 2.0

[h1]Scrap Mechanic Survival, but ALL LOOT is RANDOMIZED![/h1]

[b]This mod changes how loot works in Scrap Mechanic Survival.[/b] Instead of stuff dropping what it's supposed to drop, it drops a completely random item. It can be any item in the entire game. Anything from a bearing to a cookbot. You could break a corn plant expocting corn, but instead get a curved pipe. You could break a beehive expecting beeswax, but instead get a [i]warehouse elevator door.[/i] The possibilities are endless.

c21b3ba1-382c-462c-b17d-04ba99c3e911.description:
Welcome to DareDevil Mode.
This will be the hardest difficulty for a perfect run. Always use senses.

[h1]Recommendation:[/h1]
Advanced Players - For Normal Run
Mastery Players - For Perfect Run

[h1]Game Rules:[/h1]
* Once you're hit or damaged somehow, you're downed.
* New Players will have Full health bar, but it's still instant downed on damaged. It's only for perfect run try. They will have to start with 3/10 Food and 3/10 Water
* Respawning Players will have literal 1 hp to show that their perfect run is lost. There's no regen on Health at any time.
c21b3ba1-382c-462c-b17d-04ba99c3e911.name: DareDevil Mode

ecf6ca62-2989-455c-a9c6-be32f3ab0976.description:
Scrap Mechanic Survival is still grindy, but in this Scrap Mechanic Survival, you don't have to worry about at least inventory management.

[h1]Inventory Management:[/h1]
[b]Stack size:[/b] 64,000, for Blocks and needed resources only.
[b]Blocks:[/b] They would require x250 more to complete a stack.
[b]Needed Resources:[/b] They would require x1,080 to x10,800 more to complete a stack.

This is an OP survival mod, and the maximum stack size value will never change.

Only Blocks, Consumables, and Resources for crafting are overstacked. 

Please note: You need to go to the test branch (or 0.6.0 or above) then find Custom games on the top right of the screen

[h1]Additions to Overstack[/h1]
*5/29: All Fittings now have overstacking feature.
*5/30: All Decor.json, Manmade, Vehicle parts, Plants, and just Interactive Scrap now have overstacking feature.
*6/1: Most Interactives now have overstacking feature
*6/25: All available items from Vanilla Chapter 1 items are now overstacked except for the buckets.
ecf6ca62-2989-455c-a9c6-be32f3ab0976.name: Item Overstack

a86ddb9a-afb4-4fd8-a6a5-67e23c0f8a65.description:
Ever wondered why the raid timers spawn as soon as you put down your 10th plant, then you end up always getting level 1 raids? Wish that you could pick up all your crops and have no raid appear after? Now you can!

Dynamic Raids allows the raids to occasionally update, meaning that any modifications to the crops will be reflected in the raid that spawns.
[i]With the right strategy, it may even be possible to completely avoid raids...[/i]

[strike]There is a side effect of the wave system being partially broken for now since the wave value resets immediately if the cell has no raid, meaning while you harvest your crops it may reset.[/strike]
Waves will now only reset between 4:00 and 4:30, instead of as soon as the raid disappears.
a86ddb9a-afb4-4fd8-a6a5-67e23c0f8a65.name: Dynamic Raids

Welcome to Scrap Mechanic Golf!

HOW TO PLAY:
1. Place a ball on a starting zone with a star symbol
2. Press E on the ball to enter golf mode
3. Adjust direction with A and D keys
4. Adjust strength with W and S keys
5. When ready, press E to shoot

This is an example mod made by Axolot Games to show what is possible with the new Mod Tools in Scrap Mechanic. If you are a Mod creator, please feel free to use the scripts and 3D props from this mod in your mods.

838b62eb-ea80-42ce-948c-031c230a4b54.description:
This mod allows you to play Survival mode with mods, while also being able to craft the modded parts in the craftbot!

[h1]How to make your mod compatible with this custom game[/h1]
[b]Step 1[/b]: Add a folder named "CraftingRecipes" into your root mod folder
[b]Step 2[/b]: Add a file named "craftbot.json", "hideout.json" or "workbench.json" into the "CraftingRecipes" folder
[b]Step 3[/b]: Add your own crafting recipes into "craftbot.json" file
[b]Step 4[/b]: Enjoy!

You can find a more detailed guide on the [b][url=https://github.com/QuestionableM/Modded-Craftbot-Recipes/blob/main/README.md]github[/url][/b] page of this custom game.

[h1]Important[/h1]
If you're a modder and want to actually test the crafting recipes in your mod, it has to exist in the mod database. The mod database updates every 12 hours. Feel free to ask [b]TechnologicNick#4045[/b] to run the update task manually.

You can also ask more questions in our [b][url=https://discord.gg/SVEFyus]Discord[/url][/b] server.

[h1]Other info[/h1]
[code]
[h1][b]Compatible mods[/b][/h1]

94438739-8a66-4cd8-9fcd-fd2d70a0a01d.description:
This mod aims to add some quality of life features to the game:

- Stack size for items increased up to 1000.
- Locker, File Cabinet, and regular Chest storages increased.
- Nights are shorter, completely ending at 4 AM and only starting to get dark at 8 PM.
- Craft times are reduced across the board.
- Refine times are shortened and drain on water reduced.
- Harvestable loot drops have been increased.
- Refining both by hand and machine now produces 20 of the material instead of 10.
- Certain enemy drops have been adjusted:
-- Totebots drop more Circuit Boards
-- Haybots guaranteed drop Component Kits plus a chance at Circuit Boards
-- Tapebots guaranteed drop Batteries plus a chance at Circuit Boards and Component Kits
-- Farmbots drop all 3
- Component Kits, Circuit Boards, and Batteries now also drop in greater amounts from all sources.
- Added crafting recipes to convert between Component Kits and Circuit Boards.
- Added crafting recipes to turn seeds into their foods and vice versa.
- Also modified soil bag and fertilizer recipes.
- Tapebots have been nerfed. They shoot less often, deal less damage, and are less accurate.


Install Instructions:
Step 1) Subscribe to the mod. No file overwriting is necessary anymore in 0.6+
Step 2) When choosing to play a game, click in the top right where it says Custom Game
Step 3) Select Quality of Life and name your world

That's it.


Looking into seeing if making a placeable chunk loader is possible, or turning beacons into chunk loaders. Also looking into reworking buckets so they stack.


If you have any other suggestions, feel free to leave them in the comments and I'll look into them. Also the changes I make won't be to everyone's taste and that is fine. This was only ever meant to be for myself and my friend. I only made it public so other people could enjoy it if that is what they wanted.
94438739-8a66-4cd8-9fcd-fd2d70a0a01d.name: Quality of Life

66bc0eab-63c7-4efa-9d07-4391505b7408.description:
This custom game open a creative world with additional command:
/import & /export

Thoose commands works the same as in survival

Transfer creation from creative to survival:
1. Launch this custom game
2. Spawn your creations
3. Look at one creation and type /export name (replace name with whatever you want)
4. Repeat step 3 or all creations
5. Go to the Blueprint folder of this mod (Steam/steamapps/workshop/content/387990/2819317540)
6. Copy the files you want (with the name you put earlyer)
7. Paste in Steam/steamapps/workshop/common/Scrap Mechanic/Survival/LocalBlueprints
8. Load your survival world with dev mode enabled
9. Type /import name (where name is the name you put to export all the creations)
10. Its done!

Transfer from survival to creative: same but inverted
1. Use /export command
2. copy blueprints in LocalBlueprints folder (warning: there are a lots of files in there)
3. paste in Blueprint mod folder
4. import with the command
66bc0eab-63c7-4efa-9d07-4391505b7408.name: Creative Import&Export GameMode

5d1aac85-b56d-46e7-b224-c6b99f5e2ce2.description:
Map Mod 2.0 - Now with more colors to help you find the rare biomes, like the desert and autumn forest.

Legend
----------
Light Brown - Desert
Dark Brown - Burnt Forest
Orange - Autumn Forest
Purple - Chemical lake
Green - grassy biomes
Blue - water
White - player location
Black - undiscovered area


Please note: Using a custom game means you'll be starting a new world. If you need the map in your current world, you'll need to use the file mod version instead, found here: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2104768903[/url]


Install and usage instructions:

1 - Click SUBSCRIBE above.
2 - Start Scrap Mechanic. Once in the main menu, click PLAY.
3 - Select CUSTOM GAME. It's a smaller button kind of hidden in the top right-hand corner.
4 - Select Xeridox's Map Mod. Start getting excited, you're almost there...
5 - Type in a name for your world, then click PLAY.
6 - From inside the game, open the chat window (default key is ENTER) then type /map and press enter. The map should open.
7 - Repeat Step 6 as needed.
5d1aac85-b56d-46e7-b224-c6b99f5e2ce2.name: Xeridox's Map Mod

db9e2b76-3270-43a1-9f2b-ac3ef285435f.description:
At request, I remade SurvivalImport for newer versions of SM, so, here you are.

Adds 4 commands:
/save <name> - Saves the creation you're looking at as an SI blueprint with the name you provide
/build <name> - Builds the SI blueprint that you named, pulls items from your inventory
/buildwith <name> - Builds the SI blueprint that you named, pulls items from a container you are looking at
/destroy - Destroys the creation you're looking at and saves it as a SI blueprint named "destroy"

SI Blueprints are located at WhereverYourSteamFolderIs/steamapps/workshop/content/387990/2823429358/Blueprints
db9e2b76-3270-43a1-9f2b-ac3ef285435f.name: SurvivalImport 2

9b2bfa2b-11dd-4e3a-821d-a99b01409cac.description:
lemonSurvival is a custom gamemode I made to change some of the design choices I personally didn't like in the original Survival Mode. This mod tries to revamp some of these issues all while trying to still feel like the vanilla game mode.

[h1]Changelog:[/h1]
-Made the start of the game slightly faster (no more putting fire out)
-Removed Mechanic Station and Dispenser Bot (Replaced with smaller POI)
-New item: Mobile Craftbot
-Crude Oil can now be mined from rocks and gotten from traders
-Most Items stack to 64
-Blocks stack to 512
-Refine Bot now outputs 3x blocks
-Manual refining times reduced to 1.5 seconds
-Scrap wheels have been replaced with normal wheels
-Soil can now be removed quicker
-All Craftbot times have now been reduced to 5 seconds
-Alternative Glue Recipes (3 corn or 3 glowpoop)
-Cheaper Scrap items recipes
-Adjusted couple more crafting recipes
-Added wedges recipe
-Added warehouse lights recipe
-Water recipe now gives out x5 water
-Cheaper Beacons
-Loot drops adjusted
-Consistent Haybot drops
-Chest space increases
-Totebot head recycle recipe
-Wood/Metal1 recycle recipes
-Dev mode/Cheat Commands (Host only)
-You can now sleep in beds to skip the night

If you try out the gamemode please let me know what you think of it and if you had any issues with it.


[h1]LATEST PATCHNOTES:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2823686440[/h1]




Here are the reasons for changes listed below (warning: contains personal opinions about survival mode):

[h2]Removal of Mechanic Station[/h2]
From what I've seen and experienced, the Mechanic Station discourages the making of bases, especially in the early game. Due to it being a large cosy interior space and the space providing the Dispenser bot needed to progress the game every player always sets up and builds a base there.

The Dispenser bot located there also means you cannot progress the game without reaching it first. This makes players sprint to it as soon as they create a new game which makes starting new playthroughs boring and repetitive. 

The POI was replaced with a much smaller gas station that still has a workbench and beds to sleep on to act as a checkpoint incase you die.

[h2]Mobile Craftbot[/h2]
An early game item that allows you to craft items on the go. It is upgradable to include more recipes such as the recipe to craft a normal Craftbot.

This lets you explore much more easily in the early game as it lets you leave the crashed ship behind.

[h2]Reducing reliance on underwater stuff[/h2]
I don't feel like the water in this game is quite ready yet. Axolot is planning on a water update in the far future after Chapter 2 so until then I have made some changes to make you swim less. 

Glue -
2 new alternative recipes
-1 glue = 3 corn
-1 glue = 3 glowpoop

Crude Oil -
-Crude Oil can now be gotten from mining rocks
-Crude Oil can now be found in ruins
-Crude Oil can be bought at the farmers hideout

[h2]Craftbot times[/h2]
Crafting times have been reduced to 5 seconds for all items.
This was changed because I think long crafting times add no challenge or anything interesting to the game other than to waste your time. This is also why manual refining time has been reduced.

[h2]Refinery Bot[/h2]
The Refinery bot was upgraded to give out 3 times amount of blocks it gets given, this was added to try reduce the grind of the game a bit more as well as to balance it around the reduced manual refining time I have added.

[h2]Scrap wheels removed[/h2]
Scrap wheels were replaced for normal wheels because those wheels just suck, it makes the car slower than sprinting. Normal wheels should allow you to make a functional vehicle to move around in early on.

[h2]Chest space increased[/h2]
Amount of slots in chests were increased.

Small Chest
20 slots -> 30 slots

Big Chest
30 slots -> 60 slots

This is to make the big chest be bigger than the inventory and to make the smaller chest more useful early on.



[h3]Planned Features:[/h3]
(things I have not added yet but I wanna add)

-Late game Component Kit/Circuit boards at hideout (brocolli and pineapple)
-Smaller beacons
-Water Gun/Water bombs

Feel free to suggest your own ideas



[h1]Credits:[/h1]
TL_Potatoe: Made the 7th image for the faster refining times
9b2bfa2b-11dd-4e3a-821d-a99b01409cac.name: lemonSurvival

a1380e74-6b66-47d8-b5fb-6b7751da3da6.description:
[h1] How to play [/h1]
once you get into the gamemode you can either load a creation or make one. once your ready to play place a publish block save your creation and then open the menu and click play!

[h1] There is an issue! [/h1]
please report it in the comments below with information on how to repeat it and also what you think is wrong

[h1] Commands [/h1]
[list]
[*] /fly - enables flight
[*] /return - returns everybody to the building world
[*] /score - displays everyone's scores on your screen
[*] /settings - allows you to change some settings (buggy during rounds
[*] /start - starts the round while in the play world.
[*] /stop - stops the round while in the play world.
[*] /maps - lists maps you can load in
[*] /map - loads in the selected map
[/list]

[h1] Notes [/h1]
[list]
[*] the publish block remembers what settings you put into it when you save,
[*] if you are trying the gamemode, /maps & /map commands may interest you.
[/list]

[h1] TestMaps [/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2871172552 cs_office but poorly made idk

9b2bfa2b-11dd-4e3a-821d-a91201409cac.description:
reltSurvival is a fork of lemonSurvival. Ditching the regular craftbot in favor of 7 smaller specialized craftbots

Craftbots include:


[h1] Mobile craftbot [/h1]
Used to start your journey, has all the essentials which will you rely on till the end of the game. Can make the Advanced craftbot


[h1] Advanced craftbot [/h1]
Now we're getting to the real deal here. Being able to make complex parts and higher level materials is this bots specialty. Can upgrade blocks, make explosives, sensors, big wheels, and other craftbots which are:


[h1] Processing craftbot [/h1]
Need some concrete? In craving for some plastic? Maybe even some spaceship blocks? This bot is here for you, processing basic materials into complex building blocks.


[h1] Resource craftbot [/h1]
After a getting an inventory full of corn and honey combs, this bot will take these not-so-useful resources and refine them into super useful glue! Not only that, it can also make gasoline, batteries, glowsticks, paint ammo, soil, fertilizer and chemicals.


[h1] Decoration craftbot [/h1]
Whoa whoa thats a lot of parts. This bot can make a whopping 238 different bits and bobs just for you, so you can fix that one shelf that just doesnt look right...


[h1] Container craftbot [/h1]
Uh-oh you ran out of inventory space during a long scavenging run? Fear not, this bot can make storage devices to dump all that weight into.


[h1] And finally,  the one and only [/h1]

[h1] Recycle craftbot! [/h1]
Those pesky totebot heads cluttering up space and lagging out your game? Well not anymore! Recycle them with this craftbot into some useful scrap metal and circuit boards. But dont be so eager, this bot requires plastic which a starting mechanic wouldnt be able to get that quickly.


[h1] Additional features [/h1]
Exploding trees to get ember trees
Farming clams by hitting them with blocks


[spoiler]Hmm, is it just me, or do these craftbots remind me of something? Nah its probably a lack of 3d modeling and texturing skills.[/spoiler]

[b] Credit: [/b]
lemonSurvival: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2823686440
Craftbot+: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2118868098
9b2bfa2b-11dd-4e3a-821d-a91201409cac.name: reltSurvival - lemonSurvival fork

This mod adds an Audio Player that lets you play every single in-game sound!

Simply select a sound from the list and apply a logic signal to play it!

More features (like setting parameters, e.g. pitch/speed/etc.) might come in a future update.

The part can be crafted in Survival Mode by using a Custom Game that supports modded craftbot recipes.

NOTE - This mod does NOT play custom sound files - it only plays all the existing in-game sounds.




Audio event names extracted from the game by me.
Full audio event list can be found on: https://scrapmechanicmaps.com/modding_help/Audio_Events

b542e410-d4c9-436b-aa3a-1cfb8c77dda3.description:
Changes the Radio music to I put a spell on you.

Manual install required for this to work but don't worry its super easy :D

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2419997528"

387990 is the folder containing Scrap Mechanic Workshop Items
2419997528 is the ID of this mod

After you've reached that location you should see files such as, "Cache", "Data", "Effects", "Gui", Objects", etc.

Copy the folder labeled "Audio" in effect folder and paste it into the Scrap Mechanic game directory at

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic/data"

A popup should appear asking that an existing file already exists. When this happens confirm that you want to replace the existing file.
b542e410-d4c9-436b-aa3a-1cfb8c77dda3.name: Hocus Pocus Radio

7ad0076e-8fcb-49e5-beb0-78e58e593c7a.description:
No more sunshakes... ONLY FANTA

Manual install required for this to work but don't worry its super easy :D

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2836529647"

387990 is the folder containing Scrap Mechanic Workshop Items
2836529647 is the ID of this mod

After you've reached that location you should see files such as, "Cache", "Data", "Effects", "Gui", Objects", etc.

Copy the folder labeled "Data" and paste it into the Scrap Mechanic game directory at

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic"

A popup should appear asking that an existing file already exists. When this happens confirm that you want to replace the existing file.
7ad0076e-8fcb-49e5-beb0-78e58e593c7a.name: The Fanta Uprising

9b65a5f6-f5bf-4a76-aa6a-b96f3656862b.description:
A fully functional copy of Creative Game, but with better terrain generation and bigger world to explore.

[code]
[h1]Available Commands[/h1]
[b]/clear[/b] - Removes all the loaded bodies in the world.
[b]/spawn[/b] - Teleports your character to spawn position.
[b]/tp [player_id][/b] - Teleports your character to selected player.
[b]/playerlist[/b] - Displays the list of all players in the world.
[b]/timeset [time from 0.0 to 1.0][/b] - Sets the current time.
[b]/timeprogress [bool (optional)][/b] - Stops the time when set to false.
[b]/fly[/b] - Toggles fly mode for your character.
[b]/seed[/b] - Shows the seed and version of the current terrain generation.
[b]/noaggro [bool (optional)][/b] - Toggles the player as a target.
[b]/noaggrocreations [bool (optional)][/b] - Toggles whether the Tapebots will shoot at creations.
[b]/popcapsules [filter (optional)][/b] - Opens all capsules. An optional filter controls which type of capsules to open: 'bot', 'animal'.
[b]/aggroall[/b] - All hostile units will be made aware of the player's position.
[b]/killall[/b] - Kills all spawned units.
[b]/dropscrap [bool (optional)][/b] - Toggles the scrap loot from Haybots.
[b]/place [harvestable][/b] - Places a harvestable at the aimed position. Must be placed on the ground. The harvestable parameter controls which harvestable to place: 'stone', 'tree', 'birch', 'leafy', 'spruce', 'pine'.
[b]/enablehealth[/b] - Makes your character receive damage.
[b]/die[/b] - Kills your character if your health is enabled.
[b]/spawnpoint[/b] - Sets a location at which the character is respawned after death.
[b]/ragdoll[/b] - Sets your character into a ragdoll state.
[b]/damage [(int)damage][/b] - Damages your character if health is enabled.
[/code]

[code]
[h1]Host only commands[/h1]
[b]/regenerate [version (auto = 0)] [seed (optional)][/b] - Regenerates the world with the specified parameters.
[b]/import [creation_name][/b] - Imports a creation from survival files and custom game files.
[b]/export [creation_name][/b] - Exports the creation you're currently looking at.
[b]/enablehealing [bool (optional)][/b] - Toggles the healing for all the characters in the world.
[/code]

Have Fun :)

Preview image was created by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198318189561]Dart Frog[/url]
9b65a5f6-f5bf-4a76-aa6a-b96f3656862b.name: Creative Terrain Overhaul

[h1][b]Handheld Laser Cutter[/b][/h1]
It can destroy blocks, parts, harvestables, and damage mobs.

Primary fire: piercing laser projectiles that destroy blocks, parts, harvestables, and damage mobs.

2d219396-688d-40a9-be11-ed6a0f36e915.description:
Welcome to the world of logic gates. Build as much as you imagine and desire. There's 11 logic gates for you to explore and experience. That could allow some maximum building power and possibilities, in a way would reduce the number of plain Logic gates into something entirely new.

There are a lot of logic gates, as said above, to explore.
[list]
[*][b]Logic Auto:[/b] The red ones, it's a unique gate. It checks for conditions to be active or if wanted, to be automatically active, all the time. Saves up 1 logic gate.

[*][b]Logic Case:[/b] The purple ones, are powerful ones. The inputs effects it's choice, and the square icons are nodes.

[*]NEW: [b]Logic Colorizer:[/b] It substitutes the Paint Tool. It can set or compare color. If compare, If colors are the same, it'll pass.

[*][b]Logic Connection:[/b] The orange ones, are substitute for the plain Logic gates

[*][b]Logic Switch:[/b] The magenta ones, are also powerful. It also saves spud ammo and is silent to use

[*][b]Logic Timer:[/b] The green ones, It does serve as an alternative version of the vanilla timer. It also serves perfect and complex uses as a different type of timer.

[*][b]Logic WiFi:[/b] The yellow ones, it is extremely powerful, however, its channels are inputted based on item IDs

[*]NEW: [b]Math Advanced:[/b] A variant of Math Variance having values of Pi, Absolute value, and so much more.

[*][b]Math Converter:[/b] This counts active items or power items or can be a counter (adds per tick) or a specifier (which categorizes logic or Power or lock in the math value from an active math item)

[*][b]Math Compare:[/b] This is simple for a math value. Compare with the second math item or a static value as Greater than, Less than, Is Equal to, or Not Equal to.

[*]NEW: [b]Math Data:[/b] That would be the Math Digit Block. It has a unique function when connected to it's own type.

[*][b]Math Operation:[/b] This item contains the most common operations; Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, Modulo, or Squared. Operate that with the second math item or a static value for an output. Any nans or infinite values goes to 0 for this item. A blocker as an operation is a useful item. it blocks unwanted variables to pass through.

[*]NEW: [b]Math Utility:[/b] This is a special Math Block and it can only sense Distance and Velocity

[*][b]Math Variance:[/b] This item hosts a static value or a random value.

[*][b]Piston Controller:[/b] The sky blue ones, Serves to control Pistons and can be automatic too. It can serve those pistons as suspensions (for example), placed as 1/10 of a block.

[*][b]Pixel Screen:[/b] It acts as the vanilla Logic Gate, but it has no icons but the screen is now colorable.

[*][b]Power Converter:[/b] It converts power into logic, logic into power or steering into power. It acts as if it's a WASD converter

[*]NEW: [b]Reciever Channel[/b] Only can be used by Remote Receiver's Channel Block. It can be a button or a switch.

[*]NEW: [b]Remote Controller[/b] This is a tool and it can be used on a Remote Receiver.

[*]NEW: [b]Remote Receiver:[/b] This is separated to 4 blocks. Remote Channel, Remote Math, Remote Power, and Remote Logic.

[*][b]Seat Controller:[/b] The lime color ones, using Master Driver Seats or Saddles, would give it the best functionality, for Mouse Controls and Jump, otherwise it'll just be a WASD converter.

[*][b]Seat Converter:[/b] Another lime color, except, it's far simpler than the Seat Controller. It includes Seated conditions and a simple WASD converter.
[/list]

There are Master Seats and Master Driver Seats in this mod. It allows for more controls for the Seat Controller. There's that reason: They have more that their Vanilla counterpart doesn't. Jumping to exit the seat has been disabled for Controller reasons.

Click on this [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2850013852]Collection[/url] for creations for this mod.
2d219396-688d-40a9-be11-ed6a0f36e915.name: Many Logic Mod Pack

2b02fc5b-8601-47b6-8392-084391ae6b25.description:
Модиффикация добавляет заставку вначале некоторых челленджей (на некоторых уровней).

[hr][/hr]
          Список челленджей с поддержкой данного мода перечислен ниже.
[hr][/hr]
[h1]Инструкция по установке[/h1] 
          1) Перейдите в папку где у вас установлен Steam.
например:  [u] SteamLibrary\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2845325938;[/u] 
2845325938 -это номер –индификатор данного мода;[hr][/hr]
          2) Откройте эту папку, в ней есть 2 интересующие нас папки:  [i] MOD_ON[/i]  для установки мода, и  [i] MOD_OFF[/i]  для его отключения.
          3) Войдите в папку MOD_ON и скопируйте в ней папку Effects ( комбинацией клавиш: ctrl+C ).[hr][/hr]
          4) Перейдите в папку где у вас установлена игра, а точнее режим челленджа к ней.
например: [u] SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\ChallengeData; [/u] 
[hr][/hr]
          5) Откройте папку  [i] ChallengeData[/i]  и вставьте туда ранее скопированный файл (нажмите комбинацию клавиш: ctrl+V), одобрите замену файлов.
[hr][/hr]
          Теперь на некоторых уровнях(в созданных мной челленджах) появятся красивые заставки.
[hr][/hr]
[h1] Отключение модификации[/h1] 
          Если вы хотите пройти с кем-то  испытания, у кого не установлен данный мод, либо предложите ему установить его, либо отключите его у себя. Для этого вам нужно произвести те же действия, но с папкой MOD_OFF вместо MOD_ON.
[hr][/hr]
[spoiler]Хорошей вам игры.[/spoiler] 
[hr][/hr]
[h1]  Данную модиффикацию поддерживают челленджи (ссылки на них):[/h1] 
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2833676492] Space adventures Part one [tr] [/tr][IMG]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1899975198392807735/28369D4AD03ED85A4325B270880D4070C57B778C/?imw=5000&imh=5000&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=false[/img] [/url]
[hr][/hr]⠀
⠀[IMG]https://imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]
2b02fc5b-8601-47b6-8392-084391ae6b25.name: ChallengeCamera

ce31c68d-15ab-4cf2-945e-088b370a812d.description:
This mod lets you experiment and have fun with mostly physics related parts!
Almost all of them are adjustable, with filters and impulse strength!

Huge thanks to ScrapMan for featuring this mod in a video!

[hr][/hr]
[b]Added parts:[/b]
• Jump Pad - [i]Makes characters and creations jump[/i]
• Pusher - [i]Pushes characters and creations away from it[/i]
• Puller - [i]Pulls characters and creations to it[/i]
• Tumbler - [i]Tumbles characters[/i]
• Forcefield - [i]Pushes back characters and creations that try to enter its area[/i]
• Conveyor Belt - [i]Moves characters and creations in its direction[/i]
• Sticker - [i]Makes the player stick to walls and ceilings, you can also move![/i]

[hr][/hr]
[b]Credits:[/b]
Scripting: Fagiano
Ideas: The Red Builder

[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]

If you have ideas for new parts leave them in the comments!
ce31c68d-15ab-4cf2-945e-088b370a812d.name: Physics Toys Pack

b60c2c52-cc0d-45a1-9df3-3a45dfc88115.description:
This mod contains everithing I found in the gamefiles and was able to use the same UUID.
That means if any of these will be in creative in a future update the mod will conflickt.
But it's also means if you save a blueprint with a part that will come in creative the blueprint will automacliy work if I remove the part from the mod.
Disclaimer!!! Not all the parts have the same functionality as in Challenge or Survival mode. Also, all the restrictions have been removed, if there is a part that still has some kind of restriction write "/restrictions" in the ingame chat to turn them of. 4ee4064f-393f-4b3e-b9d5-109f14ef3b0f.description:
This file mod adds the 4*TOWN songs from the Pixar movie Turning Red

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

1. Go to the Scrap Mechanic steam workshop subscriptions folder (by default located in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990)

2. Sort by most recent, the first folder contains the files of this mod

3. Go inside the "Copy Me" folder and copy everything inside this folder

4. Go to the Scrap Mechanic game files folder (by default located in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic)

5. Paste the copied files (use the replace all option)

UNINSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

Use the "Validate game files..." button in Game Properties > Local Files to restore the original game files

SOURCES

Nobody Like U (From "Turning Red"/LyricVideo) - https://youtu.be/mLsUEJPXubc
U Know What's Up (From Disney and Pixar's Turning Red) - https://youtu.be/74Xn1lhiQaI
1 True Love (From Disney and Pixar's Turning Red | Lyric Video) - https://youtu.be/kNwgsq5p_hs
4ee4064f-393f-4b3e-b9d5-109f14ef3b0f.name: 4TOWN Radio Mod

d0450f97-0ec0-4b28-bf1e-67b748cc36ad.description:
I will work more on this mod because I know how janky it can be but I already started modding journey.. So any suggestions on how to improve this mod will be very appreciated


about how Grappling gun works [or more exaclly how to use it]

Grappling gun have 3 work modes:

 - first (default) is grappling toward PRECISE mode
      allows you to grapple towards place you shoot in matter of few seconds
      [may not work if player is falling :/ ]

- second is swing mode which you may guess allows you to swing, it works fine but it can be better 
       so I will work more around this one in the future

- third and last one is grappling towards NOT PRECISE mode which is sounds oddly similar to first mode,
       but actually works more junky.. It's something in between two previous modes and allows you to grapple 
       like spiderman so I thought it would be cool to leave it to you and test

you can switch between modes by pressing "R" by default, or just any "reload" keybind in settings

MULTIPLAYER NOT SUPPORTED YET! I mean it's not working well on multi, but I'm working on it ;)
 - plus there is no recipes added so you can't craft it in survival, but you can test it on survival with
   unlimited inventory turned on ;D

also sorry if I wrote something incorrectly in english..
d0450f97-0ec0-4b28-bf1e-67b748cc36ad.name: Grappling gun

30f4400a-1964-4f6e-89d5-e289c42501d5.description:
This is a Concept Mod for Challenge Mode. There are 3 things in this mod; Economic Button, Economic Chest, and TraderBot.

After hearing from Scrap Mechanic Challenge Pack from Workshop "Robot's arena v0.6.0+" from ScrapMan's YouTube video, Due to limitations in Challenge mode, I thought that economic thing the creator has built is really cool, so I decided to make this Economic Pack for Challenge mode as a concept mod.

The Economic Button is a buying part in this mod. 10 slots of items are requirements to pay.

The Economic Chest is a selling part in this mod. 10 slots of items are earned in return when something connected to it is active.

The TraderBot is the powerful part in this mod. It has custom trades and can have up to 204 trades. every 5 slots counts as 1 trade. The Traderbot shouldn't be used as storaged.

There are 9 different colors of coins and they are overstacked to 64,000. They don't have any other uses except for a stuff for the interactable part only in this mod.

Best if this mod be played in Dev Mode from Custom games for full features.
30f4400a-1964-4f6e-89d5-e289c42501d5.name: Economic Pack

50340fb4-275b-45d0-9802-2df5cd95f64c.description:

50340fb4-275b-45d0-9802-2df5cd95f64c.name: Tier 4 and 5 Blocks

4da1276c-5146-48d5-bdec-baed625ca3fc.description:
Just a bunch of Duck that do random Stuff.



God Duck:
    Allows you to see from the skys.

Sensor Duck:
    A Sensor disguise as a duck.

Block Duck:
    A Duck that can be place like a block

Paint Duck:
    Paint the Duck and then interact with it, to change the entire color of a vehicle.

WireLock Duck:
    Use your hammer on the duck to Enable / Disable the WireLock. WireLock stop and use of the Wire Tool.

LiftLock Duck:
    Use your hammer on the duck to Enable / Disable the LiftLock. LiftLock stop and use of the Lift.

RGB Duck:
    Constantly Changes Colors, interact to Enable / Disable, RGB Colors for the blocks connected. 
    Warning: May Cause Lag and Cause some Glitchs to some Blocks.
    Use a Sledgehammer to destory if it Bugs.
4da1276c-5146-48d5-bdec-baed625ca3fc.name: Elemental Ducks

8420a7ba-2462-41ac-966e-da6cc84fb899.description:
[h1] Hello! [/h1]

This is a mod that gives you some useful tools to aid with your vanilla logic builds!

This mod is currently in beta, I will be adding to it in the future, right now i'm thinking of more ideas to add without adding existing tools in other logic mods.

[h1] Current tools: [/h1]

[b]Logic Gate State Shower[/b] - Shows the state of a logic gate

[b]1 Tick Hammer Block[/b] - Makes your hammer able to 1 tick logic gates

[b]Circuit Timer Block[/b] - measures the time in ticks in a circuit

[b]Self Wirer[/b] - Self wires logic gates

[b]Logic Gate Mode Changer[/b] - allows you to change the logic gate's mode by colour

[b]Logic Gate Connection Shower[/b] - Shows connections with name tags on your screen, helps in high connection count logic creations

[b]The Ultimate Connection Hider[/b] - 1st use, when it is placed down, it hides connections while wiring, 2nd use, when interacting with the tool it will hide every other connection except connections coming from a gate that is the same colour as the tool.


please report any bugs to me in the comments and feel free to give me some suggestions.

Hope you enjoy.
8420a7ba-2462-41ac-966e-da6cc84fb899.name: Vanilla Logic Debug Tools

6a2e9817-686e-4373-8c32-4d4b9add6549.description:
механика энергии:
    у каждой батарейки есть свои параметры, емкость, заряд, максимальное количество выходной энергии за тик, и входной, а так же на сколько емкость падает за полный цикл заряда

    падения емкости считаеться за полный цикл, аднако растянуто на весь цикл, таким образом если вы зарядите аккамулятор на половину, то и емкость упадет в 2 раза меньше чем упала бы, если бы вы зарядили его полностью

    вы можете подключить аккамулятор к другим аккамуляторам, и он будет выдавать энергию на них, аккамулятор будет пытаться пустить на каждый аккамулятор столько энергии, сколько может выдать за тик, деленное на количество подключеных аккамуляторов

    аккамуляторы не бояться перезаряда(если об этом не сказано в его описании, в будушем могуть быть типы аккамуляторов, которые перезаряда бояться), аккамулятор просто не возбмет больше энергии, чем сможет вместить, аднако будьте внимательны, если привысить зарядный ток в тик, и аккамулятор примит этот ток(тоесть в нем должно быть место куда принять, иначе он просто не возьмет ток) то он взрырветься

    аккамуляторы не бояться переразряда(если об этом не сказано в его описании, в будушем могуть быть типы аккамуляторов, которые переразряда бояться), аккамулятор просто не выдаст больше чем у него есть, аднако если вы попытаетесь запросить у него больше энергии чем можно запрашивать за тик, и у него это количество энергии окажеться в наличии, то вы получите 0 а аккамулятор взарветься

    запрашить энергию из аккамулятора может только потребитесь или специальный прибор(которого пока что нет в моде), если же вы хотите просто получить энергию из аккамулятора, то вам необходимо подключить к нему другой аккамулятор или power switch, чтоб аккамулятор сам передал энергию

    power switch, он выключен, но может быть включен логикой, когда выключен не пропускает ток, когда включен пропускает, так же вы можете настроить ему емкость нажатием E, и узнать его емкость нажатием U, эта емкость будет означать, сколько энергии через себя он может пропустить за тик, может быть п
6a2e9817-686e-4373-8c32-4d4b9add6549.name: The Mod

[h1]WARNING: Having file mods installed while playing with this custom game [i]could cause issues[/i]! One of the most well known ones is unbreakable crates that occur while having Fant mod installed.[/h1]

[h1]This Mod Adds Features From Axolot Games' Other Title, [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/648800/Raft/]Raft[/url]![/h1]
[b]Play the game in a completely new and different way than ever before![/b]

[h1]INSTALLATION:[/h1]

[b]1. Subscribe to this mod[/b]
[b]2. Launch Scrap Mechanic and press the custom game button above the creative game loader[/b]
[b]3. Select this mod from the list and then load into the world and play![/b]

[b] NOTE: You do not have to manually install this mod[/b]

[h1]For information on importing your old raft into the new world , read the guide [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2807590049/3391786569663862852/]here[/url][/h1]

[list]
[*]Axe
[*]Pickaxe
[*]Harpoon Gun
[*]Pulling Hook
[*]Fishing Rod
[/list]
[*]New logic blocks:
[list]

[*]Water Sensor
[/list]

[list]
[*]Propeller(small and big)
[*]Sail & Wind Sock
[*]Farms you can PLACE down 
[*]Air Tank
[*]Water Purifier
[*]Apiary
[*]Collector to collect ocean junk

[*][i]And many more![/i]
[/list]

[list]

[*]Resources such as Component Kits can be crafted now
[*]Farmbots no longer drop warehouse keys
[/list]
[/list]

[h1]Join our official [url=https://discord.gg/KckXqDD6Yz]Discord Server![/url][/h1]

[h1]For a list of compatible mods, [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2816900681]look here[/url][/h1]

Translations:

If you enjoy this mod, don't forget to rate it!

This mod makes the game a little less grindy.

Changes:
 - Block stack size increased to 750
 - Haybots now have a higher chance to drop component kits

 * Suspensions

 * Engines
 * Thrusters
 * Controllers
 * Sensors
 * Pistons
 * Sawblades
 * Drills
 * Wheels
 * Refinebots
 * Resource collectors

Note, this is the case apparantly for all custom games:
 - Blueprints usable in survival (press E when near a lift), you still need all the items required to build it.

735b1e5e-9ac3-4aca-93c6-4cc4b537c076.description:
Hide & Seek in Scrap Mechanic!

[h1]Features[/h1]

[b]Hide & Seek:[/b] Lets you play Hide & Seek on any map that has been prepared for it.

[b]Chat Commands:[/b] A set of chat commands allow the host to control the state of the game.

[b]Game Settings:[/b] A settings menu, allowing you to adjust the hiding time, game time, select seekers and more.

[b]Game Timers:[/b] Timers count the duration of the game and record how long it took for each player to be found.

[b]Custom Spawn Points:[/b] These let map builders control exactly where hiders and seekers will spawn when the game is started.

[b]Game Results:[/b] When a game ends, the results of the game are printed to the chat. These results contain the hiding time, game time, total time, each player that was found, the time it took for them to be found and the player who found them.

[h1]How to Use[/h1]

To [b]play[/b] a map, simply spawn a properly prepared blueprint ("properly prepared" = it has all the spawn points) and use [b]/hns_start[/b].
If something is wrong with the map (like a missing spawn point), a warning will be displayed in the chat.

To [b]stop playing[/b] a map, either wait for the Game Time to run out or use [b]/hns_stop[/b] to stop it manually.

When [b]building[/b] a map, [b]make sure it has at least one of each of the spawn points in it![/b]
The map will not be playable if one or more of the spawn points are missing.

The [b]Default Spawnpoint[/b] is where all players spawn when the game ends.
The [b]Seeker Spawnpoint[/b] is where all [b]seekers[/b] will spawn [b]after[/b] the "Hiding Time" has run out.
The [b]Player Spawnpoint[/b] is where all [b]hiders[/b] will spawn immediately after starting the game.

[h1]Settings[/h1]

The [b]settings menu[/b] can be accessed by the host player using [b]/hns[/b].
In it, various things can be adjusted:

[b]Hide Time:[/b] The time in seconds that players have for hiding themselves before the seekers are released.

[b]Game Time:[/b] The time in seconds after which the game will automatically end. Set to 0 for no timeout.

[b]Max Seekers:[/b] Sets the maximum number of seekers.

[b]Found Players become Seekers:[/b] Does what it says - if this is enabled, found players become seekers.

[b]Seeker Selection:[/b] Sets how seekers are selected. Modes are: [b]Manual[/b] (manually select seekers using the spudgun or hammer), [b]Random[/b] (automatically chooses random seekers) and [b]Host Player[/b] (sets the host player as seeker).

[b]Map Restrictions:[/b] Sets whether the map should be restricted during the game or not. (restricted = not buildable, not destructable, etc.)

[b]Inventory:[/b] Choose between limited and unlimited inventory

[b]Sledgehammer[/b] and [b]Spudgun:[/b] Enables or disables the hammer and/or spudgun.

[h2][b]This mod needs to be loaded in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2803050088]ACM[/url] in order to work.[/b][/h2]
735b1e5e-9ac3-4aca-93c6-4cc4b537c076.name: Hide & Seek

3. Done! To turn off the wind turbine make the secondary logic block on the basa an OR gate (Insted of nor)

4b77f148-ee91-467f-a11b-2570759c3aad.description:
Chat with people all around the world, without having to join their game!

[h2]This mod requires [url=https://scrapmechanictools.com/modapis/DLLMod/Info]DLLMod[/url] in order to work properly.[/h2]

Note - This mod is just an experimental proof-of-concept to show what's possible with the DLLMod.

It will freeze your game a little when the chat updates or when you send a message - this is normal due to how the HTTP library works.

Also, I have no further plans for the future of this mod.
I might update and improve it or I might just shut it down at some point, I don't know yet.
For now, have fun while it still works :)

WARNING
As with all global chat systems, any message you send can be seen by ANYONE!
DO NOT enter ANY personal information!!!
4b77f148-ee91-467f-a11b-2570759c3aad.name: Scrap Chat

47be694f-eca6-420f-a4f2-79617a664156.description:
Welcome to Larson's Grind-B-Gone mod!

I have created this mod to make the constant grind of procuring resources a bit less. Key tweaks are:

1) Stack sizes are now 512 for everything (well, everything I could find/think of), this means less running back and forth to unload the 20 stacks of scrap wood... or 50 stacks of 5 milk... Bigger stacks = longer resource roams!
** A few items, namely larger ones, are NOT 512; wheels, chests, etc...
2) Stone piles now have a stone:metal ratio of 1:3 intead of 2:1 - Stone is useful, but metal is used more.
3) slight adjustments to assorted loot tables, namely totebots and haybots (you'll see the difference!)
4) replaced the scrap wheel with small wheel in the start area loots.
5) Made the resource drops from clams, oil geysers, flowers, corn, beehives and cotton a bit more varied and robust, no more 1 resource per parent! * this requires that you HIT them, not PICK them (flowers and cotton)

I also, after taking the basic idea from a couple other mods, removed a TON of ground clutter to make it easier to actually SEE more than a foot or two in front of you. (this combines 2 other mods from the workshop and improves them!)

Basically, this mod combines and improves the following:

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2118192552]Remove Fake Trees[/url] by BryOnFire
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2210412816]No Grass Mod[/url] by NothingMod
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2111749421]Stacks+ (Survival)[/url] by SgtMarkoes

PLEASE NOTE: I did not use thier files/code/etc as the base of my own, I merely took their ideas and expanded upon them!

========================================================================
= INSTALLATION =
===============

Simply copy the CONTENTS of the /Modded folder into your Scrap Mechanic install folder:

......\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\

DO NOT COPY THE PARENT (Modded) FOLDER, ONLY THE DATA and SURVIVAL SUB-FOLDERS!

Allow overwriting when prompted.

========================================================================
= UNINSTALLING =
===============

Also included a complete backup of the files I modified. These are used if you no longer wish to run a modded game.

Simply copy the CONTENTS of the - Original - folder into the Scrap Mechanic install folder (see above) and allow overwriting when prompted.

========================================================================
= IMPORTANT =
============

This mod has GODMODE enabled, by default, every time you load into a game (or start a new one). If you don't like this feature, simply open chat (ENTER) and type /god and turn it off.

The information above is also included in the RTFM file inside the mod folder.

Have Fun and PLEASE RATE!
47be694f-eca6-420f-a4f2-79617a664156.name: Larson's Grind-B-Gone

bc7932e1-bc7f-4595-865c-2d2f4d94a20e.description:
Have you been annoyed by that backpack that you just cant seem to get rid of? Well you've come to the right place

This mod removes your mechanic's backpack!

It also works in multiplayer, so anyone joining your game will see your mechanic without a backpack.

This mod has to be installed manually

Insallation:

1. Right click on Scrap Mechanic in your steam library
2. Click Manage->Browse Local Files
3. Navigate 2 folders back to "steamapps"
4. Navigate to "workshop\content\387990\MOD ID HERE"
5.Copy the content from the folder given
6. Press your windows key and type "%appdata%"
7. Navigate to "AppData\Roaming\Axolot Games\Scrap Mechanic\User\User_0000000000000000"
8. Paste the file that you copied into the folder and make sure to replace the old file with the new one
9. Launch SM and play!

NOTE: Some may suspect that this mod is a virus, but believe me, it's not, it just changes your character file which is a binary file

The character is customised to my in-game character, you can change it as long as you dont select anything from under the "Backpack" tab, if you select a backpack, you will not be able to remove it unless you reinstall this mod.
bc7932e1-bc7f-4595-865c-2d2f4d94a20e.name: No Backpack
